choices: Naruto
Sasuke
Shikamaru
Kiba
Other
1.content: Here are the first four choices.
1.title: The Beginning

choices: Naruto suddenly enlarges in the night (Fast Growth)
Naruto wakes up the next morning, ready for a new day! (Slow Growth)
Kakashi has a mission for their cell
Naruto outgrows the village!
Someone else is growing too
11.content:
Naruto was booored. Being a ninja, you'd think being bored wouldn't be a problem. But when there's no missions, no one around to talk too, (Or who want to talk to you) and nothing to do, then you get bored. Naruto walked along the streets of the Hidden Leaf Village, kicking a small pebble and wondering what to do. Sasuke always went places on his own, and Sakura constantly tried to follow him, leaving Naruto alone as usual. He gave the pebble a particularly hard kick and it skidded off under a fence. Naruto almost walked past the fence with out giving it a second thought. But by chance, he glanced through a rather large hole and saw a scroll. It was laying on a pedastal in an overgrown vacant lot. Tangles of weeds and thorny plants wound around the fence and surrounding stone walls. Curious, Naruto made sure no one was watching him, then vaulted over the fence. He crept through the flora and grabbed the scroll. He slipped it into a hidden pocket inside his jacket and jumped back over the fence. He ran all the way back to his house. He kicked off his sandals and jumped onto his bed. He pulled out the scroll and tossed it lightly, from hand to hand.

"I wonder what's inside this thing?" He asked himself.

He took hold of edge of the scroll and tugged it out. Naruto was lying on his back as he did this, so when he opened the scroll an avalanche of green dust suddenly fell onto his face. He gasped in shock and sucked down most of the strange dust. He coughed and nearly choked quickly running to the sink. He turned the faucet on full blast and stuck his mouth to the stream, drinking until his throat was cleared. He gasped and tried to catch his breath. He glared at the scroll and folded it back up. Then he tossed it into the trash.

"Useless thing." He muttered to himself.

He looked out the window and saw the sun was setting. He changed into his pajamas and fixed his nightcap on his head. Maybe there'd be a mission tomorrow...
11.title: Stolen Scroll

choices: He bumbs into someone
First he finds some bigger clothes
112.content:
It seemed like he had just fallen asleep when bright morning light flooded into his room. Naruto looked blearily at his clock and saw it was about nine o' clock. He sat up and rubbed his eyes, trying to clear the sleep from them. He reached up to grab his nightcap and found nothing but his hair. He looked around and saw it lying on the ground next to his bed.

"Huh. I guess it fell off."

That never happened before...oh well.

Naruto shrugged it off and threw back his covers. His hopes were high that Kakashi would have a new mission for him and his cell. He quickly stripped out of his pajamas and put on his usual orange jumpsuit. He pulled up his pants and was surprised to see so much of his legs showing. Usually his lower legs were exposed to some degree, but now his pants were hugging tightly around his calves. And his jacket wasn't fitting very well either. He pulled it down as far as it would go, but a thin strip of his skin still showed. The sleeves were also shorter, reaching only halfway down his arms. He scratched his back, feeling the tightness around his body.

"I guess I must be getting my growth spurt!" He said, giving himself a thumbs up in the mirror. "Finally, I'll be taller then that jerk Sasuke!"

Naruto giggled at this thought and eagerly ran outside.
112.title: Growth Spurt?

choices: Naruto plays with Konohamaru (And grows a little more)
Naruto finds something else to do
1121.content:
Naruto practically leaped from his doorstep he was in such a good mood. He hummed to himself as he strolled down the street, heading for the Hokage's building, hoping to find Kakashi and the rest of his cell there with a new mission. He was deep in thought (Well, as deep as Naruto can get anyway) and he didn't even notice someone sneaking up behind him. But he wasn't very discreet, and Naruto soon heard his breathing, his heavy footsteps, and when he stopped walking, the footsteps behind him kept going for a few seconds, then stopped. Naruto groaned inwardly knowing that Konohamaru was following him. The kid never left him alone! He turned around to confront him and Konohamaru tried to disguise himself...but it wasn't very convincing. Naruto slapped his hand across his eyes and sighed.

"Alright Konohamaru! I know you're following me!"

Konohamaru sheepishly lowered his fence disguise and said, "Aw come on! Wasn't it more convincing this time?"

Naruto shook his head and Konohamaru sighed.

"Oh well. I guess I'll practice more."

"Hey, where are your friends Konohamaru?" Naruto asked.

"I'm not sure...They were supposed to meet me at the bridge, but they never showed up!"

"Hmmm...That's too bad...Well see ya!"

Naruto started walking again, but Konohamaru tagged along.

"So where are you going?"

"I'm going to see if Kakashi came back with a mission yet. I'm so bored!"

"Well, you might as well forget about it. No one's come in all day."

"WHAT?!?!?!? How do you know?!?"

"My grandfather is the Hokage! How could I not know?"

"Good point...Argh!!!" Naruto rustled his hair in frustration. "Now what am I going to do?"

"Hey! Why don't you play with me!" Konohamaru said excitedly.
1121.title: Tough Luck Naruto

choices: Suddenly, Naruto starts growing faster!
Konohamaru wants his turn to hide!
11211.content:
Naruto groaned as he looked down at the eager little boy. Konohamaru wasn't a bad kid by any stretch of the imagination but he could get annoying whenever he was begging for attention. It didn't happen as often as it used to since he started hanging out with his friends but whenever they weren't around the first person Konohamarau sought out was Naruto.

"Well...I guess we can play. But just for a little bit!" Naruto said, firm in his decision.

"Awesome! Thanks Naruto!" Konohamaru grabbed Naruto's hand and dragged him off to the training field. "I wanna play Hide and Seek! That's always a lot of fun!"

"Yeah? For who?" Naruto muttered. Not only was Konohamaru usually ridiculously easy to find (his camouflage skills left a lot to be desired) but whenever Naruto had to hide he could end up sitting in his hiding place for nearly hours, Konohamaru unable to find him. One notable game had ended after Naruto had been waiting for two hours. He had tracked Konohamaru down only to discover that the boy had given up an hour ago and had promptly forgot all about the game. Naruto had given him a few lumps for that one!

"Okay!" Konohamaru said once they arrived. "Rock Paper Scissors to decide who seeks first!"

"Alright! Get ready to lose Konohamaru!"

Both boys pumped their fists up and down three times before throwing out a symbol. Naruto cheered when his rock smashed through Konohamaru's scissors. "Told ya so! I'm going to hide, and you're going to seek!"

"Fine!" Konohamaru covered his eyes and began to count loudly. Naruto had already come to a decision about how to handle this. He was going to hide someplace easy to hide and then, when it was Konohamaru's turn, he was going to bolt and try and find something else to do. Thinking fast, he spotted a box not too far off. Chuckling somewhat evilly, he hid underneath it. About a minute passed before Naruto heard Konohamaru shout. "Ready or not here I come!"

Naruto could hear Konohamaru's feet shuffling through the dust as he looked around. Naruto was already beginning to regret hiding underneath the box. He knew it would be cramped, but this was cramped even more than it should have been! He could swear his back hadn't been pressing up against the top of it when he had first hidden! It didn't help that it was getting incredibly hot inside it, his clothes starting to feel uncomfortable on his body. He was so busy shifting around he barely noticed when Konohamaru lifted up the box in triumph. "Hah! Oh man Naruto, even for you this was a pretty dumb idea for a hiding place!"

"Hey! Like you can hide any better!" Naruto retorted, standing up.

"Come on boss!" Konohamaru said with a frown. "I could totally see you hiding under there! Your butt and your feet were totally visible!"

"Huh? No way! This box totally covers me!" Naruto insisted.

Konohamaru shook his head and said, "Nope! It's too small!" He pressed it back down over Naruto and said, "See?"

Naruto looked down and saw that the kid was right. He could see his feet poking up from under the box. "Huh...that's really weird..."

He stood up and tossed the box aside. Konohamaru snickered and said, "Uh, Naruto? Do you always wear clothes that are too small?"

"Huh?" Naruto looked over his body and his eyes widened in surprise. It was true! His clothes DID look small on him! His pants were pulled up around his calves, the bottom of his shirt rising up to show off his belly button, the sleeves pinched tight around his arms. "What the heck is going on here?!"
11211.title: All Fun and Games?

choices: Naruto's sandals had burst off his growing feet!
Naruto had tripped on a branch, breaking it and tripping. It was nothing!
112112.content:
“Heeeeeey! Naruto!” Konohamaru whined, eying Naruto suspiciously, “I know what you’re trying to do!”

Naruto looked down at Konohamaru, confused. “Heh? What the heck’re you talking about?”

“You’re trying to distract me!” Konohamaru then started walking away, turning his head slightly after a few steps, and yelled, “Start Counting! You said you’d play!”

“Ughhh… there is NO damn way that I’m gonna waste my day doing this… ” Naruto moaned, not wanting to continue playing, though, he had moaned also slightly because of his tight clothes. What was going on? Konohamaru had seemed…a little smaller.

Naruto’s chest was starting to push his zipper down quite a bit, revealing the upper part of his usually covered black undershirt, which felt as if it was straining itself against his well defined, upper body. Naruto sighed as he looked down, patting his developing abs with his somewhat larger hands, the bottom row of them slightly visible along with his belly button. His sleeves looked a bit ridiculous, almost riding up to his thicker triceps, the seams looking as if they were beginning to split. His pants were fairing no better, hugging his larger, more developed thighs uncomfortably, to the point of where if he were to sit, they would probably rip. Naruto’s eyes trailed upward from there, and he suddenly blushed, realizing how outlined his massive, unknowingly larger junk was! He knew he was well endowed… but not freaking horse hung! The young fox ninja avoided thinking about it, and then looked down at his big feet quizzically, a little confused as he noticed how much of his ankles were no longer covered by his pants. He wiggled his larger, stronger looking toes, which were now almost completely hanging over the edge of his relatively large sandals, noticing how unbelievably tight they were for some reason. He moaned in a childish fashion, realizing his feet looked as if they were bigger than just this morning! Too big... the straps were literally cutting into the skin at the top of his feet; they looked as if they’d burst at any second!

“Ah man! Seriously… I just bought these sandals last week!” Naruto whined, stomping his right, sandaled foot into the ground in a childish way, not noticing the ball of his foot push outward, slightly beginning to hang over the edge of his sandal. “And these clothes too… why’re they too small?”

After a while, Naruto, thinking of the most logical explanation (Well, in HIS opinion anyways) to explain his unbelievably tight clothes, pumped his fists into the air, smiling as he continued to do so. As he did though, without realizing it, he had partially ripped the back of his jacket, his lats pulsing uncontrollably; and, thanks to his strong, growing ass, a small rip had appeared at the back of his pants, showing off his white boxers.

“Hehehe! I must be having my growth spurt!” Naruto cheered, “Just you watch Sasuke! I’ll show you which one of us is stronger now! Believe it!” Naruto yelled, not really caring who, are what, had heard him. He sighed… realizing, in his excitement, that he was still stuck with Konohamaru. The big and still slowly growing blonde looked left, then right, smirking as he found no sign of Konohamaru. The kid was probably trying too hard to hide from Naruto, so, he could probably use this opportunity to bolt from the scene.
“I’m outta here…” Naruto muttered to himself, sprinting away as he hoped to arrive back at the village quickly. But wow; his now slightly muscular legs were really taking him there quick!

As Naruto ran, he was suddenly distracted by a loud SNAPPPP, followed by another, and then, he literally face planted into the grass. A small bump slowly appeared on his head as he sat back up, about to look at his feet.

“What the heck was that!?"
112112.title: Don't Think This is Puberty...

choices: Konohamaru quickly finds the crate becoming too small for a hiding place
Naruto tries to find some clothes that will actually fit!
1121121.content:
Naruto's eyes widened as he looked down at his feet. His sandals were in tatters, scraps of leather and cloth scattered on the grass. Flexing his toes slightly in annoyance, Naruto picked up the scraps and looked them over. "Jeez! Either these things are a complete piece of crap or this growth spurt is ridiculous!"

Naruto got to his feet, wincing slightly at how tight his clothes had become. It was starting to become impossible to consider all of this as being a simple act of puberty. Naruto wasn't the sharpest kunai in the arsenal, however, so it was taking him awhile to reach that conclusion. He scratched his head, loosening his headband slightly, only now realizing that it was cutting into his skin. He scratched at his chest, his black undershirt tearing as he did so. "Grrr! This is getting really annoying!"

He unzipped his jacket and threw it angrily to the ground, followed by his black undershirt. That done he was able to take a deeper breath, his chest inflating impressively as he did so. Unfortunately, his pants were still digging into his waist, making the relieved breath shorter than he had hoped for. He was about to rip his pants off when he realized that would mean walking around in his underwear or, worse yet, accidentally damaging both pants and underwear and walking around totally naked! That was definitely not an option!

"Guess I'll just have to deal with it!" Naruto decided, running back in the direction of the village. The once short teen was now considerably taller, his height closing in on the average adult's height! With no frame of reference around, however, Naruto was only vaguely aware of his impressive and still increasing size.

As Naruto made his way back to the village proper, Konohamaru was doing his best to find a hiding place that would fool Naruto. He was starting to get nervous, expecting Naruto to appear at any second and grab him! After checking the door to the warehouse and finding it locked, the energetic boy decided to just hide in a crate sitting outside. It was better than nothing! He moved the top of it to the side, jumping inside without looking, pulling the cover back over the top once he was fully concealed. Thankfully, there was a knothole around Konohamaru's eye sight that he could peer out of. Naruto wouldn't be able to sneak up on him this time! Getting comfortable, he leaned back and closed his eyes, ready to wait as long as necessary for Naruto to either find him, or give up.

Little did he know, he had stirred up some familiar looking green dust, the emerald particles getting sucked up into his body with every breath. There was already a fine dusting of it covering the boy from head to toe, gently glowing before disappearing into his body. There was more to this warehouse than met the eye. Something very strange was going on in the Village Hidden in the Leaves!
1121121.title: Mysterious Circumstances Arise

choices: Meanwhile, with Naruto...
Konohamaru goes back to the village, unknowingly bringing some dust with him!
11211211.content:
Konohamaru smirked, his eyes still closed as he continued to lean against a side of the small crate. "Hehehe... Naruto'll never find me..." He whispered to himself, moving his back upwards against the crate as he felt the sole of his sandals touch the other side. He barely pondered the reason for this, and continued to relax, eagerly waiting for Naruto to give up. "Any second now..."

Konohamaru's excitement slowly turned to discomfort, his clothes for some reason feeling a bit tight. A bead of sweat fell from his forehead, the inside of the crate feeling really hot all of a sudden. The young ninja suddenly found his scarf becoming unbearably tight, the sudden heat his body was experiencing making it even worse. Konohamaru tugged on his scarf, slowly but surely pulling it off of his neck; he then sighed in relief, being able to breathe better. He held his scarf in his unknowingly larger hand, and wondered why, all of a sudden, it would be so tight... He may have been seeing things, but he swore that his scarf actually looked like it was a bit too small for him. And now that he thought about it... EVERYTHING he was wearing felt tight! Really tight! It was then when Konohamaru sat up straight and felt his head push the lid of the crate up a few inches. He could see outside! Luckily Naruto was nowhere to be found, so this gave Konohamaru time to ponder what was going on. He took off his goggles, the strap ripping slightly without him noticing, and threw them, along with the scarf, outside of the crate as he also pushed the lid off and threw it too.

The young, bewildered ninja looked over himself, and, everything else around him. “UGH! This isn’t right! I KNOW I had no problem fitting in this thing earlier!” Konohamaru crossed his arms, one of his eyes slightly twitching. He was reaaally annoyed at this point. “I swear! For some damn reason, everything just looks... smaller than before...”

Konohamaru scratched his back, the tightness of his t-shirt really annoying him at this point. He didn’t even notice that it looked comically small on him, when, it was usually a little oversized. His shorts were doing no better; the ends well past his knees at this point, and hugging his thighs really tightly. Konohamaru winced as he realized he was bending his legs a lot in the crate, and as he looked up, his eyes lit up with shock as he noticed his whole head was poking out of the now small hiding place! Even his boxers were being strained quite a bit; faint tearing noises audible as Konohamaru’s visibly growing bulge popped the zipper on his shorts open. His growing body was giving him no time to focus on one thing at a time, though, as he suddenly felt a sharp pain in his feet, heard a loud stretching sound; and, right after, an even louder RRRIIIIPPPPP!!!

“I don’t GET IT!” He muttered to himself, “What the hell’s goin’ on!?” Konohamaru was right to have no idea what to think when he looked down at his sandals; the straps had literally BURST off his feet!

Konohamaru wiggled his larger, squished toes in utter confusion and realized... all he could actually see of his sandals were the straps... on a hunch, he lifted his right foot and realized that his huge, bare feet were covering both his sandals entirely! He lifted both his feet up, picking up the ruined, flattened foot wear and out of curiosity; put one of his sandals against one of his larger appendages. Konohamaru’s eyes went wide as he stared at his foot; not only was it WAY to wide for the small sandal in his hand, but also, the ball of his foot and his toes were completely passing the end of the sandal! Were his feet that big?! His sandals had fit perfectly that exact same morning... And everything was in proportion, like usual! Plus, there was still the issue of his clothes, which were nearly suffocating him; they didn’t fit either! Konohamaru, now having forgotten about the hide and seek game, was now completely distracted by what was happening to him; or his body, anyways. After attempting to stretch his upper body, which, as if he saw it coming, caused the top part of the front and back of his shirt to rip almost half way down his torso, he KNEW what was happening…

“I couldn’t be... No WAY!” The young ninja smiled; this was crazy. But AWESOME! “I’m getting... Bigg – WOOAAAH!!”

Out of nowhere, Konohamaru, finally partially aware of what was going on, felt a weird, strong tingling sensation suddenly move through his body, from head to toe, as he quickly surged up a few more inches. At this point, Konohamaru had gotten way too big for the crate, and he finally let his longer, thicker legs push forward. The soles of his bigger, bare feet pushed over the part of the crate he was facing, and he also took his arms out and put them along the top edges, which ended up falling over with the rest of the pieces of the crate anyways. As the tingling faded away, his quick growth spurt did too… though; he was still undoubtingly growing. Konohamaru finally decided to get up, slowing adjusting his footing as he did so because he wasn’t used to his new size AT ALL. I the process, though, his t-shirt completely shredded off, the remains falling to the floor.

The young ninja couldn’t help but laugh. “WOW! I’ve heard of growth spurts... but I didn’t know they happened this fast~ !” He said, flexing his arm. Konohamaru wasn’t sure... but he could swear that his bicep seemed a bit thicker, too. He also had to be at least as tall as Naruto! Well, the usual Naruto, anyways.
11211211.title: Ready or N- WOAH.

choices: He runs into Naruto...and is bigger than him!
Kiba starts to grow while he trains.
112112112.content:
A thought suddenly occurred to Konohamaru as he examined his much bigger body. He was as big as Naruto! A mischievous grin slowly stretched across his face as he imagined how shocked Naruto would be when he saw they were eye to eye (although Naruto was still about the same size he usually was in comparison to Konohamaru thanks to his own growth spurt). "I'll make him sorry he ever ignored me or tried to brush me off!" He said with a snicker, rushing towards the door of the warehouse. Of course, thanks to his new size, he clumsily ran his shoulder into one of the many crates within, knocking it to the ground. The old wood shattered on impact, releasing a cloud of dust into the air. Konohamaru coughed and waved his hand, not noticing as he sucked in more of the growth dust, speeding his growth rate up past Naruto's though the effects wouldn't become apparent until later. However, the majority of the dust merely gathered into the air like dust motes, swirling in the wake of Konohamaru's body as he ran out of the warehouse and back towards the village. The glittering trail followed Konohamaru until he reached the village gates, the shining particles flying fully in the face of another young shinobi.

"Hey! Watch where you're kicking up dust kid!" Kiba shouted, coughing as he got a face full of what he thought was dirt. Konohamaru ignored Kiba as he continued running in pursuit of Naruto, eager to show off. The dog ninja sighed and shook his head, his hands in the pockets of his hooded sweatshirt. "Man, kids these days. No respect!"

He turned and continued out of the village gates, heading to the training area to work out some frustration. He had gotten into an argument with Shino and he was eager to beat on some wooden dummies in place of his teammate. Slowly, unnoticed by him, his body was beginning to grow, stretching taller and wider with every foot step...

Konohamaru growled in frustration as his search for Naruto continued to be fruitless. He was so focused he didn't even notice the stares he was getting as he ran around in only a pair of boxers which were becoming increasingly tight on him as his body slowly continued its growth. "Where could he be?" He asked himself, looking around.

"Excuse me..." A Chunin slowly approached Konohamaru, being as cautious as if he was dealing with an escaped mental patient. "You do realize you're walking around in your underwear don't you honorable grandson?"

"Huh?" Konohamaru snapped, glaring up at the Chunin. The older man actually took a step back, slightly intimidated by the look in the young ninja's eyes. It didn't help that his body had added on some muscle making him look like a pint sized powerhouse. He put his hands on his hips and said, "Yeah, I'm only in my underwear. What are you going to do about it?"

The Chunin gulped a little. He had never really been that brave. He was more of a behind the scenes strategist type. He squared his shoulders and said, "You can't be running around like this. It's indecent. I'm going to have to escort you back to your home."

"I'd like to see you try!" Konohamaru shouted, getting into a fighting stance. All through this conversation Konohamaru has slowly been growing, his once small biceps now far more respectable, already bigger than this pencil pushing Chunin even though he still only came up to his stomach, this his head was slowly but surely inching upward. His pecs were full and round, pushing out over a slowly deepening six pack abs. His thighs were filling up the pants legs of his boxers, tearing further the already ripped boxers. His calves followed suit, pumping up and making his legs look even thicker. His feet widened and lengthened, his toes inching across the ground. Even his bulge was becoming more impressive, pushing out against the straining button while his backside pushed out against the back. Crouching down as he was, he looked even more intimidating to the Chunin. He gulped again and took a step back. "Uh...never mind...."

He turned and ran off, leaving a grinning Konohamaru behind. "Yeah, that's what I thought!" A strange feeling was welling up inside Konohamaru. He felt so...powerful. He had never felt quite like this before. He was used to be a little kid, one that no one really took seriously. Now...things were different! The young and still growing boy continued his search for Naruto, feeling more spirited now.
112112112.title: Moving up in the World

choices: Naruto makes it to the Clothing Store, realizing how big he actually is!
Meanwhile, with Konohamaru...
11211212.content:
Naruto snickered as his longer, slightly more muscular legs took him through the forest much faster than usual, his body ever so slowly swelling larger with every thunderous step. The oversized fox ninja continued running, his big bare feet leaving large, shallow imprints in the ground, his powerful soles and toes crushing every branch under them. Naruto couldn’t feel a thing though, his muscular feet being too tough to be scratched or injured by such miniscule things.

“Heh!” Naruto happily grunted, his lush, blonde hair brushing a few tree branches. “This growth spurt’s just too cool! A little sudden though…”

Though, what Naruto thought wasn’t even close to the actual fact. Besides being slightly taller than Kakashi at this point, he was unknowingly still getting bigger! He wasn’t that worried at the moment, only thinking he was a few inches taller… but, he was a LOT bigger than he imagined! How big would he, or could he possibly get? Luckily, the green dust was working through his system very slowly… at the moment, anyways.

As Naruto made it to the front gate leading into the village, he couldn’t help but tug at his remaining clothing. “Ugh… Stupid shorts! – wait… I mean pants! Aw man…”

Naruto’s pants were becoming unbearably tight, slight rips and small tears visible everywhere; one of the more noticeable ones being down the back of his pants, part of his boxers completely revealed. The young, big blonde blushed as he trailed upwards to his staggering manhood, his bulge pushing against his boxers and pants to the point of it looking like someone had stuffed an overgrown cucumber in them. His thighs and calves were showing a bit more muscle definition than usual, while Naruto also realized that… he had… a six pack?! A wide smile spread across Naruto’s face as he felt his abs for the first time with his hands, surprised. They weren’t fully developed, but either way, he had abs! And even his pecs seemed thicker than usual! Not to mention his biceps… not huge, but nice and round, the usual small bumps replaced with more full, thick looking biceps.

Before he could continue admiring himself - though, he was still slightly dumbfounded, Naruto realized that his weird growth spurt was actually becoming quite a pain… he had simply taken one step with his gargantuan foot, and the rip at the back of his pants spread and extended downwards with a loud TEARRRRR!!!

“D-Damn it!” Naruto yelled, covering his exposed, muscular ass with his large hands. His boxers were stretched to the point of his skin being barely visible through the strained seams. “I gotta get something to wear! NOW! Being bigger’s cool and all… but I don’t wanna end up NAKED!” Naruto muttered loudly to himself, blushing hard once again. “Craaap! Cuz of this damn growth spurt, I’m gonna need A LOT of new clothes… And Sandals! And another headband…” Naruto pulled out his frog wallet with one of his hands, sweat-dropping. “There goes all my money… Ugghhhh! Guess I can’t get any lunch…” Naruto whined, his stomach rumbling.

With that, Naruto sprinted through the front gate, his hands once again covering up his large tear as he made his way through the village to the clothing store; his growing feet sending small, almost noticeable tremors throughout the streets. Naruto had to be at least a few inches past the six foot mark…
11211212.title: Needing Some Clothes...

choices: Naruto runs into someone else
Naruto trains
11212.content:
Before Naruto could answer, his stomach rumbled loudly. He had been so excited hoping to get a mission, he'd run out without eating breakfast!

"Sorry Konohamaru, but I'm going to get something to eat first!"

Konohamaru frowned and said, "Fine! I'm going to look for the rest of my squad!"

And with that, Konohamaru ran off in search of his friends. Naruto reached into his pockets and searched for some money. He pulled out a few coins and was exstatic to find he had enough for a bowl at the Ramen Stand! He cheered and ran off towards the stand.

As soon as he got there, he slammed the money down on the counter and said, "Give me the biggest bowl you got!"

The clerk counted the amount of money Naruto had and opened the register. He put the money inside and slammed it closed before shouting Naruto's order to the cook in the back. Naruto sat on the stool, leaning forward slightly, his foot tapping impatiently on the bottom rung of the stool. His jacket was riding up in the back, exposing his lower back. Naruto didn't care. He was too hungry to concentrate on anything besides the smell of the ramen.

By the time the clerk set the bowl on the counter in front of him, Naruto was practically drooling. He broke open his chopsticks and quickly began to eat. Broth and bits of noodles splashed over the counter as Naruto messily devoured the ramen. The clerk watched him in disgust. In a matter of minutes the ramen was gone. Naruto slammed the bowl down and sighed contentedly.

"Thanks Ramen Guy!" Naruto called as he ran off to find something to do.
11212.title: Hungry Hungry Naruto

choices: The training paid off! (Narutuo grew a little in the night)
Naruto wakes in the middle of the night, with a burning pain in his body
112122.content:
"Even if there isn't a mission, I still have to keep in shape!" Naruto said told himself determinedly.

So he ran into a clearing in the woods, far from the village, where he could train in peace. He started by doing some stretches first, to get limbered up. After that, he began to run through the exercises Kakashi had shown him and his squad as training. Naruto was at it for hours, skipping lunch and continuing through dinner, hour after hour, almost with no breaks. Naruto had never felt such energy before! By the time the sun was setting, he was sweaty, dirty, and tired, but he had never felt better! He wiped the sweat from his gleaming forehead and jogged back to the village. He quickly made it back to his house, entered, and locked the door behind him. He proceeded from there to the bathroom, to get himself cleaned up before getting something to eat and going to bed. He didn't take long in the shower. He washed the sweat away, swept over his body with the soap and shampooed his hair before turning the water off and drying off. With only the towel on, he heated up some ramen and quickly ate that.

He yawned loudly as he tossed the towel back into the bathroom and crawled into bed, too tired to put his pajamas on. He was asleep within minutes, a trickle of drool running from the side of his mouth.
112122.title: A Hard Day's Training

choices: Naruto makes it to the clothes store
He bumps into someone on the way to the clothes store
1121221.content:
Morning comes early, and Naruto woke feeling even better than yesterday! Usually after training all day, he felt sore the next day, not wanting to get out of bed. But today he felt great! Totally re-energized! He threw off his covers and grabbed another set of his trademark orange jumpsuit. Before he pulled it on, he looked at himself in the mirror. He was a little surprised at what he saw. He had always been a physically fit young man, but he'd never had much muscle development. Now, however, he was clearly starting to show muscle! His chest was more defined, and the beginning of a six pack was already starting to form! He flexed his arm and grinned at the size of his bicep!

"Yeah! Look at that! I always knew I'd grow eventually!"

Naruto flexed in front of the mirror a little while longer, before pulling on his jumpsuit. Of course, accompanying his new growth was a significant change in clothing. He struggled pulling his pants up, the bottom of which was hugging his lower thighs. They were starting to turn into shorts! And his jacket was no better off! He pulled it down as much as he could, but his belly was much more exposed. His shirt fell just below his belly button, the lower half of the Fox Demon tattoo clearly visible. He bent down to put his sandals on and heard a tearing sound. He quickly stood back up and turned around, looking into the mirror. He groaned as he saw a huge tear, splitting down the back of the jacket. He took it off put his sandals on. His toes were hanging over the edge totally now and the straps were a little tight, but he'd live.

"I'd better buy some new clothes. No one should mind if I go shirtless..."
1121221.title: Growth Spurt Continues

choices: Naruto decides to train some more
Naruto gets something to eat
11212211.content:
Naruto stuffed his hands in his pockets and tried to walk nonchalantly towards the clothes store. He tried his best not to be noticed just yet. It didn't work. People stopped and stared at how much Naruto had changed in a few days. He was much taller than the other ninja his age, almost as tall as Kakashi or Iruka, or other adult ninja. He was also quite a spectacle due to the fact he was shirtless, showing off his new physique, and his "pants" hugged tight around his lower body, showcasing himself to the village. It didn't take long to get to the clothes store and Naruto quickly began to look around for something he could wear. This store was known for having any kind of clothes you were looking for. No matter what your style, this store usually had it in stock. It didn't take Naruto long to find a rack full of his own trademark jumpsuits. He rifled through them and was slightly annoyed at them. They were all too small. Being the only ninja who actually wore an orange jumpsuit, the store had it only in his original size. He was about to give up when he saw another orange jumpsuit hanging from the wall. This one was a much larger size. Naruto grabbed it and tried it on. It was baggy, but he wasn't worried about that. At the rate he was growing he would fill it out soon enough.

He paid for his purchase and looked around. He was thinking about heading to the assignment building to see if Kakashi had yet returned but decided against it. Kakashi would probably send for him when he returned. Whenever that might be. So Naruto sat down on a nearby bench, propped his head up on his hand and tried to decide what to do.
11212211.title: Clothes Shopping

choices: Kakashi returns with a new mission
Naruto's growth starts to increase
112122111.content:
Naruto decided to train somemore. He eagerly headed out to his spot in the woods.

Meanwhile, just coming into the village, Sakura sighed and looked around. She had been trying to tail Sasuke for the last few days, trying to find out where he was going off alone all the time, but he must've known she was following, because he quickly lost her.

"I guess I'll just have to wait for him to come back." Sakura sighed again and headed off down the street looking for something to do.

Naruto quickly ran through the exercises like yesterday, which were twice as easy now that he was bigger and stronger, and started working on his chakra control. He practiced his jutsu over and over again, making sure to get everything right. By the time the sun was setting, Naruto was exhausted, but satisfied. He felt like he had really increased his endurance. He went home happily, took a shower, and went to bed.
112122111.title: Training and Sakura's Appearance

choices: Naruto sees Sakura for the first time in a few days.
Naruto makes it to the clothing store.
1121221112.content:
Naruto woke up the next morning, his cap on the floor again. As he stretched he soon realized where his feet were, both hung almost a foot over the bed. "Wow, the training and ramen is paying off," he said as he hopped up to look at himself in the mirror. A lot taller than Kakashi or Iruka now, Naruto must have been at least 7 or 8 feet tall, in fact, his head wasn't even in the mirror. Naruto barely noticed his height though, his eyes were drawn to his incredible growth of muscle.

He gave a laugh flexing, "Even Sasuke can't beat this." Both pecs and abs were now clearly defined. With a flex of his bicep, he realized they were almost twice what they had looked like yesterday, now almost as big as his head. Bulging calf muscles also showed since Naruto had needed to sleep in underwear last night, with no pajama pants that fit.

He ran to his closet to get his new jumpsuit on, the only jumpsuit he had anymore. As he went to put the legs on, his legs almost wouldn't fit through the holes. With some difficulty he got it on, and then struggled with the new coat. After finally getting his arms through, Naruto realized that he couldn't zip it far up past his waist, and decided to leave it open today.

"I'll get another new one at the store, I need other clothes too like underwear," he said as he looked down realising the elastic was almost suffocating him.

Eating a quick bowl of Ramen, he went outside to start to head to the store. Almost immediatly people's reactions to an 8 foot tall 12 year old had him feeling uneasy, and so he started to hurry.
1121221112.title: Really Big Now

choices: Naruto concedes and goes to the hospital
Naruto is sure it's nothing! To the clothes store!
11212211121.content:
Sakura was walking through the streets of Konohagakure, heading to the clothes store to buy some new clothes. All her old ones kept getting tears and holes in them. Being a ninja was tough on clothes, and Sakura was getting fed up with constantly buying new ones.

"I really should learn how to sew..." She said to herself.

She was so preocupied, she didn't notice the massive Naruto heading straight for her. His uneasiness hadn't been abated and he wanted to get to the clothes store ASAP. Unfortunately, he wasn't really paying attention to wear he was going either.

*CRASH*

Naruto ran full tilt into Sakura, knocking her to the ground. Instantly she sprang up and started shouting.

"Watch where you're going you big idiot!"

"Sorry Sakura! I didn't see you there."

Sakura looked surprised. She slowly looked up into the face of her assailant and saw that it was Naruto! He grinned at her and she just stared in amazement.

"Naruto! But...how...and...why...are...and...how?!?!?"

"It's no secret! Just been training and eating right!"

"You idiot! You're only twelve years old! No twelve year old should be nearly eight feet tall!!!!"

"You worry too much Sakura!" Naruto said, crossing his arms.

"I'm taking you to the hospital right now! We're going to find out what the heck's wrong with you!"

With that, Sakura grabbed Naruto's arm and tried to drag him to the hospital. She couldn't budge him. Naruto laughed and lifted his arm up, taking Sakura with it. She yelped as she felt herself being lifted off the ground. She let go and dropped to her feet.

"This isn't funny Naruto! I'm serious!"

Naruto thought for a minute. What to do now?
11212211121.title: Sakura's Concern

choices: Heads home.
Goes to get more Ramen.
112122111212.content:
Naruto shrugs it off and heads to the clothing store, leaving Sakura to get angry by herself.

Walking through the streets, Naruto wonders if they would even have clothes his size. If he kept growing, he would also need clothes even bigger.

He reaches the clothing store, relieved that the weird looks end, until the store owner gives him one. "Uh, how may I help you?"

"I am looking for the biggest clothes you have," Naruto says, as if the clerk wasn't competely freaked out by his size.

"Well, uh, we do have clothes that are meant for the largest members of the Akimichi clan." he takes Naruto to that section of clothing, and begins to look through everything.

"Do you have any orange jumpsuits like this in this size?" Naruto asks.

"Uh, no, but you can custom order one, I guess," he answers.

"Uh, okay. Just make it bigger than these."

"Uhm, okay."

After a while, Naruto picks out a set of clothing from the selction, and tries it on. It was really baggy, but that was good for him. After purchasing it, Naruto...
112122111212.title: The Largest they Have

choices: Naruto takes a nap
Naruto finds something else to do
1121221112121.content:
After leaving the clothes store, Naruto pulled out the loose change he had in his other pair of pants and was disapointed to see he didn't have enough money for the ramen at the Ichiraku noodle shop. Oh well.

"People probably would've just stared at me anyway!" He muttered to himself, heading home.

He was hoping he wouldn't run into Sakura again. He appreciated her concern but he knew if he ran into her again, she would hound him until he went to the hospital. And he felt fine! Better than fine! In fact, he'd never felt better! So there was no way he could be sick! With this in mind, Naruto unlocked his house and went in, locking the door behind him. Naruto laid down on his bed and stared at the ceiling. It had been a pretty boring week so far. Sakura had come back, but Sasuke could be gone for weeks on his own, sometimes not even showing up for missions! And Kakashi had been gone a long time too. But that wasn't anyting to be surprised at. Who knows? They could both be gone doing something together. That had happened before.

Naruto decided not to worry about it anymore. They'd get back when they got back. He quickly made himself up a bowl of instant ramen and ate that. It was a good lunch, but he still had some time in the day left.
1121221112121.title: Thinking at Home

choices: She sneaks into his house and he wakes up
Naruto wakes up and leaves. Sakura follows
11212211121211.content:
As Naruto slept peacefully, his body began to once again grow. His feet slowly hanged off the sides of his bed, his body grow ever bigger for a twelve year old fox ninja. And as he dreamed, Naruto couldn't help but smile as he dreamed of himself.

He was massive in size, standing a decent 10ft. in height. Sasuke was sitting on the ground, tired and exhausted after Naruto easily beat him in all fields of Ninja training. Chakra control, speed, traps, Ninjutsu, Genjutsu, and more. And Sakura was in his arms. They were both kissing tenderly as she snuggled into his big chest. To him this was the paradise he always wanted. "Ahh...Sakura. Your so cute in my arms!" He drooled in his sleep as he spoke.

Meanwhile, Sakura hadn't gotten over how great Naruto had looked. Sure he was bigger than a kid his age should be, but watching such a big, strong body at work was something Sakura couldn't get over. Sure she like Sasuke. But what girl wouldn't like the new and improved Naruto?

Quickly she headed towards his home, since Kakashi was missing and Sasuke was doing who knows what meant she could go see Naruto.
11212211121211.title: Falling for the big blonde

choices: Sakura watches Naruto train
Kakashi/Sasuke returns
112122111212111.content:
Sakura thought she only had eyes for Sasuke. But she couldn't get Naruto out of her mind! She kept seeing his huge muscular body, and though it wasn't natural, she was beginning to stop caring.

"I have to see him again." She decided, thinking to herself. "Just for a little while."

She ran over to his house and tried to peek into the window. Nothing. The looks he got on the street probably prompted him to close the curtains. Drat! She moved to the door and tested the doorknob. Locked. Double drat! She checked the back door and the windows. All locked. Dammit, this was getting frustrating! Enough was enough! She pulled out a hairpin and began picking the lock. As a ninja, she had no trouble silently picking the lock. The door quietly swung open. She got inside as quickly as she could and closed the door behind her. She looked over and saw Naruto asleep on his bed. He looked even bigger! She especially noted his bulked up muscles. All thoughts of Sasuke were, at least momentarily, removed from her mind as she saw this perfect specimen of a man in front of her. She walked over to the side of the bed and watched him as he slept, his massive chest rising and falling with every breath. He was blushing. She wondered what he was dreaming about.

Suddenly, he shifted in his sleep! Sakura quickly stepped back and looked around for a hiding spot. She didn't want Naruto finding her in his home without knocking. He'd start to think things about her! She quickly dived into the closet, hiding herself up on the shelves, her body just fitting in the tight quarters. She was in darkness as the closet afforded no light. She heard the bed creak in protest as Naruto got up. She heard his huge feet hit the floor with a thump and the bed creaked again as he stood up. She heard a loud "Ouch!" as Naruto hit his head on the nine foot ceiling. She then heard excited movement as Naruto admired himself, as best he could, in his mirror. Then she heard the door open and close as Naruto went back out. She breathed a sigh of relief and jumped out of the closet. That was close! But she didn't really feel like she had enough time to watch. Naruto was probably going to train now. She badly wanted to see that!

She quickly exited his house and followed him at a safe distance.
112122111212111.title: Peeping Tom!

choices: As Naruto finishes, Sakura is unable to pretend shes hiding
Sasuke arrives to challenge him, and Sakura wants Naruto to win
1121221112121111.content:
Secretly she followed him all across town. Even though Naruto's ninja abilities have enhanced, he was still clueless when it came to being spied on. His tight clothes could hardly hide his powerful body. "Heh he! I can't wait to start training! At this rate I may even get Sakura to pay attention to me!" Naruto smirked as everyone who saw him stared in wonder and awe of his size and muscles. To them he must be a Teen-aged Giant!

Sakura followed him quietly, seeing all the people that seemed to drop what they were doing and watch him move. She had been following him on the roof tops, and was thankful that Naruto was as clueless as can be. 'I'm surprised that no one is following him like I am.' Sakura thought as she watched them continue with their daily lives. And of course Naruto did the same. He went to the Ramen shop and bought over fifty-seven bowls of Ramen! She didn't even think Naruto had a stomach big enough to fit that much! 'His new body must need a lot of nutrients' She thought as she followed him through town as he left.

And of course he went back to the clothing store to find himself clothes. However, unlike the last few times Naruto found out that it would take a week to prepare clothes for his growing body. They were planning to make 10 through Twenty five feet clothes since he had come through the last three days for over several different sized clothes. 'I would agree with them. At this rate he'll actually grow into a giant! And only Choji's clan is known to do that! And that's using jutsu and chakra! He'll be a permanent giant!' Sakura thought as he left disappointed. And the thought of him becoming bigger was more enthralling than ever to her! Quickly she followed him.

Soon Naruto arrived at his training spot. He was planning to train so he could grow even more! "And once I get big and strong enough, they'll have no choice but to make me the first twelve year old Hokage!" Naruto laughed as he flexed a bicep.

'Oh please!' Sakura thought as Naruto went back to the 'I am going to be Hokage speech' again. 'But they could always use a man like Naruto as leader.' Sakura thought as she watched him.

Quickly Naruto began to train. Brining out a dozen Kunai knives he through them as each marker with 100% percent accuracy. And as he through more and more, he increased his speed. Allowing him to slice through the ones already on the marker. He did that over twenty times, the beads of sweat showing on his head.

Then, Naruto began to practice his chakra control. He tried staying upside down on a tree over an hour, tossing Kunai into the markers as he flexed. Then, he decided to do something new. With his new found Chakra accuracy he used it to float above a lake. Allowing him to 'Walk on Water' thanks to chakra control. And he finally finished with a "Shadow Clone Jutsu!" and transformed himself into one hundred Clones. All of them began to fight and punch each other until they were too tired to punch, kick, headslam, pound, and more.
1121221112121111.title: A normal day in a not-so normal fox boy

choices: It's getting late, Naruto heads home
Sakura ponders on her relationship with Naruto
11212211121211111.content:
As Naruto sat on the ground, sweat covered and panting, Sakura couldn't hide any more. She never thought she'd be in this situation and wasn't really prepared for it. But she knew she had to say something now or never. She moved out from behind the tree she had been hiding behind and cleared her throat.

"Ahem!"

Naruto quickly stood up and turned around, a kunai in his hand. He lowered it when he saw Sakura blushing at him.

"Sakura? What are you doing here?"

Sakura gulped and took a deep breath. She smiled and said, "I was just watching you train Naruto. You're really something else!"

Naruto grinned and laughed.

"Aw, that was nothing! I'm probably still growing! Pretty soon I'll be able to do twice as many things as that! Twice as fast!"

Sakura twitched just a little. Despite his new and improved body, he was the same annoying Naruto. Maybe this wasn't such a good idea after all...

Naruto narrowed his eyes at Sakura suddenly and said, "Why are you being so nice of all a sudden?"

Sakura frowned and said, "What do you mean, "all of a sudden"? I'm always nice!"

Naruto frowned and said, "Yeah, like when you're always hitting me in the head!"

Sakura jumped up and whacked him on the head. "That's because you deserve it you idiot!"

Naruto rubbed his head and said, "See? What's wrong with you today?"

Sakura just hmmphed and turned her back on Naruto. She'd had enough of him! She stomped off, heading for her house.

Naruto just sat there staring at her as she walked away.

"What did I do?"
11212211121211111.title: Looks Aren't Everything...

choices: She decides to see him & tell him she loves him(Hes bigger)
She decides to go home for now, she'll tell him tomorrow
112122111212111112.content:
As Sakura ran off towards her home, she couldn't help but think about how rude she had been to him. "I guess he is right about me being rude." Sakura thought aloud as she stopped running, sitting on a bench thinking about what to do next. 'I like Sasuke, but he never wants to be near or with me. The only time hes ever there is to show off, compete with Naruto, or show his superiority. Other than that, I might as well be nothing to him.' Sakura thought as she layed on the bench, watching the birds fly through the sky.

'But Naruto is different. I never seemed to realize it till now, but Naruto always seemed to be trying to get my attention.' Sakura thought as she looked at all the times he always seemed to ask her for help, or was blushing near her. 'Maybe the reason he acts like that is...' It finally dawned on her just what it was. 'Maybe he likes me!?' Rising up, Sakura blushed as she finally realized what it was that Naruto felt for her.

'And I think I like him too.' Sakura thought as she looked back at Narutos house. 'Maybe I should tell him how I feel?'
112122111212111112.title: A surprising revelation(Well not that surprising)

choices: Sakura finds Naruto training (He's bigger)
Sakura can't find Naruto until the following day (He's much bigger)
1121221112121111122.content:
Sakura was about to go after Naruto, when she saw the sun was setting, setting the sky aflame with red and pink light. She sighed and decided to wait until tomorrow. Naruto wasn't going anywhere and it was obvious Sasuke wasn't coming back anytime soon. She yawned and headed for home. She figured Naruto would be back here in the morning to train some more. He was determined to make himself as strong as possible to become the Hokage. Sakura smiled. Naruto may be single minded, but he was passionate. She locked her door behind her before heading up to her room and falling asleep.

Meanwhile, Naruto was just finishing up his dinner at the Shikiraku Ramen Stand. It cost him a fortune due to the amount of ramen he ate, but the owners gave him a discount, no doubt intimidated by his immense size. Naruto was starting to get used to his size and wasn't worried about the looks he got anymore. One day, the entire village would have its eyes on Naruto and acknowledge him as the next Hokage! But in order for that to happen, Naruto needed to become stronger. Not being very interested in it, Naruto had quickly forgotten about the dust that had fallen out of the scroll he had swiped. All of it had been sucked into him when it fell on his face and the scroll itself had long since been disposed of. No one would ever know why Naruto was growing like he was and Naruto didn't care how he was growing as long as he kept on growing.

He squeezed through his front door and flopped down on his bed. Instantly the mattress groaned loudly and the frame broke, dumping the mattress on the ground. This didn't bother Naruto much. He just shifted his large body around and fell asleep. His arms and his legs were long since hanging off the mattress. And in the night, Naruto continued growing...
1121221112121111122.title: There's Always Tomorrow

choices: She jumps near him and tells him her feelings
He hears her and tells her he knew she was there
11212211121211111222.content:
Although Sakura wanted to go and see Narutos giant body training, she was forced to wait until the next day. Her mother 'asked' her to go see how her aunt was doing. And by the time she had gone and done that, her cheeks were squeezed, she was forced to help her clean the house, and she ended up having to walk all ten of her dogs. By the time she was finished, it was already 10:00pm. Naruto was done at home.

'I hate seeing her.' Sakura thought as she went to sleep, awaiting tomorrow when she would she Narutos big muscular body standing before her, getting bigger with each breath he took. As she woke up, she decided she had to tell Naruto how she felt. And she was hoping to spy on him training as well. Getting up, she took a shower, ate breakfast, cleaned her teeth, and was off like a bullet.

"I can't wait to see how Naruto looks!" Sakura thought as she ran towards the training site upon the rooftops, carefully watching her steps as she daydreamed about the clueless, predictable, Naruot. As she arrived, Sakura quickly hid herself upon a tree. What she saw left her breathless.

Standing in tight fitting clothes was a towering 15ft. Naruto. His muscles bulgining as they seemed to strain his clothes. Thankfully, the clothing store had prepared as fast as they could to make him clothes. After all, does anyone in the village want to see a overgrown, musclebound 12 year old?

Sakura drooled at the sight as she saw him flexing his muscles with each jutsu or attack. His clothes ever so slightly ripping as his body continued to grow with each movement. Narutos smile seemed to seduce Sakura in ways she never even knew. It was like everything was perfect this way! 'I just love this new look for him! Forget him growing big! I want him to grow as big as a mountain!' Sakura thought as she started to move out of the tree, wishing to show Naruto that she was in love with him. And that she wanted to stand near his towering frame.

'Its now or never' Sakura thought as she prepared to jump. Either she tells him now or she'll never tell him. Thats when...
11212211121211111222.title: Sakura Observes

choices: Sakura proves it
Sasuke shows up
112122111212111112221.content:
Sakura steeled herself and leapt from the tree directly in front of Naruto. He stopped dead in his tracks looking down at her in surprise. He was still breathing heavily from the exercise.

"Hey Sakura. What are you doing here?"

Sakura blushed as she realized what she had done. But she had to say it! It was burning inside her! She took a deep breath and said, "Naruto, I think I'm falling for you!"

Naruto stared at her in surprise, a blush of his own creeping into his face. He couldn't believe it! Sakura had finally did the very thing he'd always hoped she'd do! He was about to go into a dance of happiness when a new thought suddenly occurred to him. Sakura was being nice again. That was suspicious. Especially if Sasuke had got back and was just playing some kind of sick prank on him. He couldn't be sure. Meanwhile, Sakura just stared at him, her heart pounding, wondering what he was going to say.

"I don't know." he said, crossing his arms. "This could be a trap. You have to see it from my point of view."

Sakura sighed and realized he was right. This was so unexpected it was suspicious. She'd have to do something to prove to Naruto she wasn't someone in disguise. But how?
112122111212111112221.title: Prove It!

choices: He apologizes and she forgives him
She gets angry and runs off....finding a 12ft. Rock Lee
1121221112121111122211.content:
Since Naruto didn't seem to think it was the real her. Sakura decided she had to decide it once and for all. "YOU IDIOT!" She shouted as she pounded him in the head, giving him a large bump.

"OW!" Naruto moaned as he crashed down on the ground, rubbing the bump. "WHY'D YOU DO THAT!?" He asked her.

"Because if you can't tell the real me from a imposter! Then how could you say that you ever liked me your dork!?" Sakura shouted at him, her arms at her sides as she looked at him. She gave him the angriest stare he had ever received. It was at that moment that he realized it was in fact Sakura. Not Sasuke.

"I'm sorry Sakkura!" Naruto said as he rised up, still rubbing the bump. "I didn't mean to do that. But I once turned into Sasuke and tried to see why you liked him and even get you to kiss me." Naruto told her, not realizing that he let his second darkest secret out.

"I mean I know Sasuke would never impersonate a person unless he was on a mission-WAIT A MINUTE!? YOU WERE SASUKE THAT ONE TIME I NEARLY KISSED HIM/YOU!?" Sakura screamed. At first she had forgiven Naruto, but now she learned that that one time was actually Naruto pretending to be Sasuke. Within a instant Sakura began to pound Naruto in the head until all that was left was bumps. You coldn't even see his eyes!

"I'm sorry!" Naruto said from beneath the bumps, unable to speak properly. Now that he got her angry, what is he gonna do?
1121221112121111122211.title: Naruto you idiot!!!

choices: She talks to Lee
Naruto comes looking for her to apologize
11212211121211111222112.content:
Sakura stormed out of the clearing leaving the beaten down Naruto by himself. She fumed and stomped and ran until she'd put quite a bit of distance between Naruto and herself. She leaned against a tree and sulkded, arms crossed.

"Why? Why does he always insist on acting like a total idiot?!?" She asked herself.

Everything had been going good for a few seconds. But you'd think even Naruto wouldn't be so stupid as to let a secret like that get out.

"I should've known he would try something like that!" She said, turning around and punching the tree. "He's so obnoxious! He's so annoying! He's so stupid!"

With every insult Sakura slammed the tree. After about fifty insults Sakura had expended all her anger at Naruto. Slowly she walked through the trees heading back towards the village. Halfway out of the woods, she heard a huge booming sound. Surprised she looked around and saw some trees in the distance vibrating, rocking, and some even falling over! Curious, she jumped into the tree tops and silently made her way to whatever was causing the ruckus. She came to the edge of a clearing and nearly fell out of the trees at what she saw. It was Rock Lee. But not the Lee she knew. He was huge! Like Naruto...no, just a little shorter by a few feet. She goggled at not only his height but his enormous musclulature. He was wearing a green vest that reached halfway down his torso as well as a pair of green shorts. Obviously the only thing that would fit him...His arms were stil wrapped up in bandages but he wasn't wearing his headband around his waist like he usually did. It was far too small. Sakura couldn't see it anywhere on him, but it was probably small enough to wear as a wristband to him. Maybe even a ring!

Sakura discreetly pinched herself. A flash of pain erupted in the spot. No, she was indeed awake.

"Why is it that every guy who's ever liked me is growing like this?" She thought to herself.

Lee wasn't paying attention to her. He was busy training himself on some new training dummys. The old ones were far too small for him. These new ones looked like they were made from trees! Sakura nearly swooned watching him work. His muscles buldged at every movement, pumping bigger as she watched. She had no doubt that even though Lee was smaller he could probably take down Naruto...

"I wonder if I should talk to him..." She thought to herself. "He might be a better bet than Naruto..."
11212211121211111222112.title: Massive Rock

choices: Naruto goes after Sakura to apologize. He and Lee fight
Naruto returns home angry at himself only to find a 12ft. Sasuke
112122111212111112221121.content:
Looking at the big hunk Sakuras resolve grew strong as she looked back at that incident when her, Naruto, and Sasuke first became Team 7. 'I guess I will talk with him.' Sakura said as she walked over to Lee.

He was completly oblivious to what was going on as he slammed a foot into one of the dummies, splitting it in half. 'He IS stronger than Naruto.' Sakura thought as she saw how easy it was for him to do that. Then, with a big huff she spoke "Hey Rock! I like how your training!" As soon as her voice reached his ears, Rock Lee had completly did a tornado like twist. His body crashed into the ground as he looked up at the sight of Sakura. 'He's nearly as bad as Naruto when it comes to surprises.'

"Hi Sakura! How do you like the new me!?" Lee asked pridefully as he got on his feet before Sakura could even blink. "I've been training! I even beat Neji!"

"Wow, I see you had some results." Sakura told him "And you even beat Neji! What did he do when he lost?"

"He ran home like a baby! I never saw him like that before!" Lee said as he sat down indian style.

"Really? He doesn't seem the type-I mean never mind that!" Sakura shouted, causing him to topple over. "I need to know, when did this happen? The same thing happend to Naruto."

Lee got up shocked as he heard those words. "So Narutos a giant too?" He asked her.

"Yup, hes even bigger than you. I'd say about three feet." Sakura told him. "But seriously, what happend?"

"Well I was training one day and this strange dust came out of nowhere. It pressed itself against my face and when all of it was going to cover me it left and I heard a voice saying 'I must find him. The one I first touched' Then it vanished." Lee told her.

"I see. So that explains some things about whats changing you two. But that leaves even more questions." Sakura thought aloud. Looking at Lee, she smiled. "Is it alright if I watch you train? Me and Naruto got into a fight about how stupid he is."

"Sure! Anything for the beautiful Goddess of the Hidden Leaf!" Lee told her as he got up, returning to punching and kicking the dummies.

Sakura blushed as she heard him call her a 'Goddess'. 'Truthfully your a REAL GOD Lee. Both you and Naruto.' Sakura thought.
112122111212111112221121.title: Finding out some info

choices: They fight to a draw
Something interupts the fight...
1121221112121111122211211.content:
Naruto felt really bad about what he had said to Sakura. He didn't like to think that she hated him for something like that.

"I'll just go and apologize." he said to himself. "I'm sure she'll understand."

At least, he hoped she would...

Naruto's mind was so clearly elsewhere, he only heard Lee's training by chance. Sudden thumps, the ground shivering slightly, trees rustling, a slight splitting sound heard from far away.

"What the heck is that?" Naruto wondered aloud.

Suddenly, a huge splitting sound rent the air and Naruto heard Sakura scream! Instantly he was running towards the sounds.

Lee had split another dummy. Sakura had yelled out in delight, clapping at this impressive feat. Lee blushed as he heard Sakura cheering, moving on to the next dummy. It was like a dream come true!

Unfortunately, that dream was about to be shattered into a nightmare! Naruto crashed onto the scene, looking around wildly for the source of Sakura's troubles. Sakura jumped back, nearly getting bowled over by Naruto.

"Naruto! What are you doing?!?"

Naruto looked down at Sakura and said, "I heard you scream! Are you in trouble?"

"Hardly!" She said, turning her head and hmphing.

"Listen Sakura, I came here to apologize for--"

Sakura simply covered her ears and turned her back. She'd had enough of Naruto's big mouth for awhile!

"Aw come on Sakura!" Naruto said, pulling her arms down. "This is serious!"

"No! Leave me alone!"

"But--"

"She asked you to leave her alone! You should respect her wishes!"

Naruto looked up and was shocked by what he saw! Rock Lee was standing before him, just as muscular, if not as tall.

"Hey Bushy Brows! What happened to you?"

"I have been training! Now please leave Sakura alone!"

"This isn't any of your business! So butt out!"

"That is it! I have had enough of you! We will fight now, for Sakura's affections!"

"Fine by me!"

Sakura quickly skirted to the edge of the clearing to watch the fight. It was so exciting! She'd never imagined boys would fight over here! Then again, she probably never would've cared unless Sasuke was fighting.

"I don't know who to cheer for!" She thought, looking from one titan to the other.
1121221112121111122211211.title: Battle for Sakura

choices: It ends in a draw....and in comes a 12ft. Sasuke! Why is this happening!?
Naruto wins and grows even bigger!
11212211121211111222112111.content:
Both boys were off like a bullet as they jumped at one another. "Shadow Clone Jutsu!" Naruto said as he summoned a dozen clones that were tossing kunai at Lee.

Even with their perfect markmanship, the kunai simply broke into pieces as they collided with Lees muscles. Getting as close as he could to two of the clones, Lee unleashed a powerful set of kicks and punches on the both of them. "Hiyaah!" Lee said as he slammed a fist right into clone ones face and a kick between the others leg.

"Bastard!" Squealed the one that fell over from the pain between his legs, the other was knocked out cold as the two of them vanished into a puff of smoke.

Thats when of them grabbed Lees arms from behind. "Gotcha! Huh?" Clone 5 said as he felt Lee start to spin around into a twister. "I'm gonna hurl!" Clone 5 said as he let go to cover his mouth, vanishing into smoke.

"Take that!" Lee said as he suddenly bent over, rubbing his stomach as the twister vanished. That's when he felt what hit his stomach hit his face. The clones were tossing big boulders that exploded on impact, causing the small microscopic precious gems cut him. "Lotus tornado!" Lee said as he got on all fours, heading for all of the clones as a tornado.

Suddenly each of the clones put their hands together as a giant ball shaped tornado appeared in each of their hands. "Rasengan!" All of them said as their attacks collided, covering the place in a massive dust storm.

'Who won?' Sakura thought as she looked on. Thats when she saw him.
11212211121211111222112111.title: To the victor goes the spoils

choices: Sasuke knows about the dust
The dust finds someone else to touch...
112122111212111112221121111.content:
Sakura peered as hard as she could through the dust. Suddenly, out of it, she could see someone standing! He didn't look as big as Naruto so she figured Rock Lee had won! Then the smoke cleared a little more and she saw she was mistaken. There were two other bodies on the ground around this other figure. Sakura looked to the left of the standing figure and saw Naruto facedown on the ground, looking exhausted. She then looked to the right and saw Lee on the ground just as exhausted. Finally her eyes traveled to whoever it was that had just appeared. Her jaw dropped as she saw who it was.

"SASUKE?!?!?" She cried out.

She had enough time to think, "What the hell is going on?" before she fainted dead away.

Meanwhile, blowing through the village, an innocent looking cloud of dust moved across the sky. One could almost hear a discontented sigh coming from the cloud. If you looked hard enough you could even see what appeared to be a misty figure in the center of the dust. And if you listened beyond the wail of the wind, you could even hear a voice.

"Where are you? The one I first touched..."

The figure remembered fondly the first time she had touched the small figure of that ninja boy. Then she had been bundled up and tossed away like nothing. And so she had searched looking for him. She had thought she had found him wearing green, but she had been mistaken. And then again, she thought she had him, wearing blue. But once again she was mistaken.

"Where are you?" She whispered, floating through the sky above the village.

Back in the clearing, Lee and Naruto were just waking up.

"Oh my head!" Naruto complained. The last thing he remembered was the collision between his Rasengan and Lee's Lotus. So who had won?

He stood shakily up and looked around. He saw Lee bent over an unconcious Sakura. But there was someone else with him. Someone that looked very familiar...

"SASUKE?!?!?" He yelled out.

Both Sasuke and Lee turned to him. It looked like he had interupted one of them, but he didn't care!

"Just what the heck are you doing here?!?" he yelled out, pointing an accusing finger at him. "You leave for all this time and then just come back, looking like that?!?!?"

Sasuke was about the same size, height wise, as Lee, but not nearly as muscular. Thanks to his leaner build he was able to wear a bigger version of his usual outfit.

"Do not interupt Naruto!" Lee said. "Sasuke was about to tell me something very important!"
112122111212111112221121111.title: And Sasuke Makes Three

choices: Meanwhile, the dust finds Shikamaru and Choji
Sakura wakes up and is told the situation
1121221112121111122211211111.content:
"Now that I get to talk, I'll tell you whats going on." Sasuke told them.

"So whats been happening!? Why am I a giant!? Why are you two giants!? Whats going on!?" Naruto roared as he moved over to the unconcious Sakura. He gently place her in his huge arms, gently holding her.

"For starters. What I found was actually quite interesting. It appears that the dust is in fact the "No-tailed demon Angelmaru." Sasuke told them.

"Wha!? You mean its a demon like the one inside me!?" Naruto gaped wildly. Things were getting shocking.

"You have a demon inside you?" Both asked at the same time.

'Me and my big mouth!' Naruto thought as he explained the Nine-tailed Fox. What it was and its power.

"Well that explains some things." Lee said as both him and Sasuke thought of all the inhuman things Naruto can do.

"Yeah, thats nice and all but what is a No-tailed Demon? I heard there are only nine0tailed demons." Naruto told them.

"Well, it appears that she vanished thousands of years ago. Unlike other tailed demons, she has this power that affects others but not herself. In a sense, it turns one into a giant over a certain amount of time. She was sealed because of this power and her soul exists as dust, making any male that touches her bigger." Sasuke explained.

"But then why is she looking for Naruto?" Lee asked him.

"I think its a bond she made when she touched him. She not only makes him bigger but also wants to greatly turn him into a bigger giant. It just so happens shes blind as a pile of dust and can't tell who we are utnil she touches us." Sasuke told them.

"Okay...so what should we do so this will stop?" Naruto asked them.

"She'll only stop when she finds you Naruto. That means she'll turn half the males in Leaf village into giants if she has too." Sasuke explained.

"I don't want there to be more giants! There's hardly room for three of us!" Naruto shouted, moaning over this revelation.
1121221112121111122211211111.title: It has a name you know

choices: The three original giants plan a maneuver against Angelmaru
Choji goes to Shikimaru's house (Growth ensues maybe?)
11212211121211111222112111111.content:
As this palaver happened in the clearing, Angelmaru drifted down into the Leaf Village, sensing a male prescense. In fact, it was Shikimaru who was laying down inside his house, eyes shut, tuning the world out. It wasn't often anymore that he got to sit down and relax, what with all the missions his cell had to go through, and this was sure to be the only time he'd get peace and quiet since Ino was gone searching for Sasuke. That girl did not know when to shut the hell up! All day it was Sasuke this, and Sasuke that, blah blah blah on and on with no end! Just thinking about her babbling high pitched voice made Shikimaru shudder. It was also nice to get away form Choji's constant smacking, slurping, and crunching.

Thinking these things, Shikimaru didn't notice Angelmaru floating in. Her voice lightly whispered, "Where are you...my one, my bond..."

Shikimaru failed to hear this and sighed, breathing in deeply. He instantly choked and sneezed as the dust surrounded him. He thought he heard a young woman sobbing before the dust blew out his window. He looked around, slightly dazed from being violently brought back to earth from his thoughts. He scratched at his shirt, feeling uncomfortable. He shrugged and laid back on his cushion, thinking about nothing in particular...

Meanwhile Angelmaru eddied in the wind around the village, passing several women out doing their shopping. She paid no mind to them and quickly floated up past. Almost by chance, she felt another male prescense. What passed for her heart now leapt and she quickly blew over to whoever it was. In the back of her mind she couldn't help but think this was going to be a dissapointment.

And indeed she was right. The prescense she had felt was Choji who was reclinging under a tree and eating like always. He was focused on his snack, his back turned to the dust floating towards him. Shikimaru had expressed a need to be alone for awhile, so Choji was waiting it out under the tree before heading over to Shikimaru's house. He brushed absently at his clothes as some dust, probably from the road (yeah right...) covered him. He heard the wind sighing (or is it...) as the dust blew away into the sky. He coughed a little and rearranged himself under the tree before going back to eating.
11212211121211111222112111111.title: Lazy and Fat (For now...)

choices: Angelmaru finds more people to grow
Meanwhile, the other three try to find more people like them
112122111212111112221121111112.content:
Having finished all of his food, Choji smiled happily beneath the tree as he rubbed his stomach. "Ahh! Nothing better than a highly nutritional meal!" Choji said as he looked into the empty bags of potato chips. Nothing remained inside the bags. Choji had made sure to eat every speck. He didn't even leave a crumb for a Mouse to eat.

"Now I better go check and see how Shikamaru's doing. He always goes to sleep when no ones around." Choji said as he got up. However, he didn't notice the changes that had changed his body. His once large stomach appeared to be smaller. His arms and legs seemed to be shaped by biceps instead of fat. And his cheeks lost a little fat. He even stood at least four inches taller. But his baggy clothes easily fit his growing body. The boy quickly ran off towards Shikamarus house. He was completly oblivious to everything happening to him as he ran off to Shikamarus.

His leg muscles carried him easily as he ran. His body moving swiftly and agile like a cat. "Wow! I need to eat those chips more often if they make me feel this great!" Choji said as he quickly arrived at Shikamarus. And it only took him half the time it usually did. Arriving at his friends home, he knocked on the door.

Shikamaru meanwhile was sleeping peacefully. He didn't notice the transformation that was changing his body. His clothes became tighter as his body began to grow. His shirt became tighter as he grew bigger. His biceps and pecs bulging as his shirt began to rip in spots. With each breath his body grew larger and larger. The sides of his shorts began to rip on the sides. His powerful leg muscles revealed as they began to strain his clothes. His socks had stretched on his feet to the point that his toes had ripped through the socks. He smiled pleasantly as he felt his body reach from one side of the 6'5 couch to the other.

He grunted as he heard a sound at the door. "Great, just great." Shikamaru said as he stood up. He rubbed his eyes, still drowzy from his lack of sleep. "And I was dreaming I had married a non-nagging, not pretty/not ugly girl, and not dumb or smart girl." He didn't notice how small everything was as he walked over to the door. Opening it, he grouched and said "Who is...WHA!?" Shikamaru said as he saw a skinnier, yet muscular Choji standing before him. His friend stood a few inches shorter than him. But he could tell it was him. After all, who else in the world has whirlpool shaped symbols on their cheeks?

"Hey Shikamaru! Your so big!" Choji said as he butted through, looking around as he rubbed his stomach.
