"What happend to you? And what do you mean?" Shikamaru said as he looked at him and then himself. "Whoa! I don't believe it!" Shikamaru said as he flexed a bicep. "Is this really me? What happend to us?"

"I don't know. But I do know one thing: And thats that i'm hungry!" He said as he rubbed his stomach.

'That's Choji. Thinking with his stomach first and his head later.' Shikamaru thought as he tried to find a answer for what changed them. Whatever it was, he'd most likely let it slip by and snooze at the perfect chance to know. After all, simply cause he's bigger doesn't mean hes going to work.
112122111212111112221121111112.title: Not so fat anymore. The other is still lazy though

choices: One of the group members finds Choji and Shikimaru
A group member finds a new giant...
1121221112121111122211211111122.content:
As Choji and Shikimaru basically ignored their new bodies, the original three were discussing the next course of action.

"Okay." Sasuke said. "First we need to find out how many people have been affected by the demon."

"Right!" said Lee.

"Who put you in charge?" Naruto stated angrily. "I'm bigger than both of you! This isn't fair!"

"Alright Naruto." Sasuke said. "And have you just spent the last five days learning about this demon?"

"Uh...no..." Naruto said, his eyes looking elsewhere.

"Then shut up and let me finish!" Sasuke said.

Naruto grumbled and crossed his arms but didn't put up any more fuss. Before Sasuke could finish, Sakura groaned and slowly woke up. She sat up and rubbed her head. What a dream she had! So many giant versions of people she knew! It was...real? Sakura looked on the three giants who were looking down at her. She nearly fainted again at seeing all three of them. But she kept her cool this time and said, "What happened?"

"You fainted." Sasuke said.

"Well, yeah, I can see that. But what's the deal with you? Why are you a giant too?"

They quickly told Sakura an abreviated version of Angelmaru, the no tailed demon, and her need to bond with Naruto, her blindness, and that she took the form of a mysterious dust. Sakura pandered on this for a moment.

"That's really strange. So what are we going to do?"

"It was Sasuke's idea that we should first find out if there are others like ourselves." Lee said.

"That's a good idea." Sakure agreed. "But then what?"

"First, let's just concentrate on finding out who Angelmaru touched. Then we can discuss what to do about her." Sasuke said.

Everyone agreed and they headed back for the village. Sakura didn't have much of a problem keeping up with the giant boys due to her agility and they were quickly at the border of the village.

"Remember, any male can be affected." Sasuke said. "So be prepared for what we might find."

They all nodded, Sakura especially (she wasn't going to faint again!), split up. Naruto checked the north side of the village, Lee the west side, Sasuke the east side, and Sakura the south side. They agreed to meet back within half an hour with anyone they found.
1121221112121111122211211111122.title: The Search Begins

choices: They all meet up and Sasuke explains the full situation
Gaara comes to the village and AngelMaru appears
11212211121211111222112111111221.content:
Each of them headed out towards a different part of village. As Sakura checked her part of the village, she couldn't help but think back to all three of those big hunks. 'Were this not so shocking, I'd probably be all over the three of them.' Sakura thought as she checked the village. That's when she saw Iruka and Kakashi talking. Problem was, they were at least ten feet tall. "Just how many people will that dust affect!?" Sakura said aloud. That's when the two of them turned.

Both were wearing overstretched clothes that could hardly hide their bulging muscles. Both their pants were a bit torn on each side. Their biceps bulged with muscle. Even their chests were covered by too short shirts. You could see their abs all the way from where Sakura was. Everyone around them simply walked away and stared back.

"Sakura?" Iruka asked as they looked in her direction. "Whad do you mean 'How many people will that dust affect?'"

"Oh boy!" Sakura thought aloud as she jumped from where she was at. Now she was standing with her Sensei and her former teacher, her face was blushing. "So you heard me?" Sakura asked them

"Yes we did. From what we gathered our natural senses seem to have been enhanced as well." Kakashi told her. "Now explain:What did you mean in that statement?"

So Sakura explained to the two of them what was going on. Both stood with sweatdropped remarks as they heard her talking about Giant Naruto, Giant Lee, and Sasuke and fighting and stupid remarks by Naruto. "I see. So we were affected by this dust?" Iruka asked her.

"Yeah, so will you head back with me to our meeting spot? Were trying to find people shes affected." Sakura told them.

"Sure. I don't get exactly whats going on. So I better hear what Sasuke has to say about this." Kakashi told her.

Nodding, the three of them headed back towards the edge of Leaf Village.

---Meanwhile, with Naruto---

Naruto jumped from house to house. Each landing was so powerful that the roofs cracked underneath his immensly powerful muscles. And as soon as he jumped from those spots, the spot collapsed. Naruto chuckled at his work and said "It's great being big!"

As Naruto moved through the village, he caught in his eye Shino and Kiba. Both of whom stood at least twelve feet tall. Naruto Groaned as he saw that even Kiba's dog Akamaru was larger than his original size. "Just Great!" Naruto said as he jumped towards them.

With a startled shock, both Kiba and Shino stared up at Naruto. Their muscles bulging in their clothes, their leg pants ripping at the sides. Shino's shirt no longer covered half his face. And Kiba took off his favorite coat, having tossed it since it would tear with his growth. "So whatever's going on affected you too. Like some kind of Swarm of Locusts that continue to multiply." Shino stated, unable to keep his bug puns out of his speech.

This earned him a punch in the head from Kiba. "Just shut up with the bug puns for once!" Kiba said as he looked at Naruto. "So it happend to you too though didn't it?" Kiba asked him.

"Yeah. It's really weird and I don't understand exactly whats going on. But me, Rock Lee, and Sasuke are big just like you. If you want to find out more I suggest you follow me back to our meeting spot! After all, its impossible to resist a guy this big!" Naruto smirked as he flexed his muscles.

"Yeah, yeah. Your all that." Kiba groaned as Naruto left, not even bothering to wait for an answer. "Damn him! C'mon Shino!" Kiba said as he jumped off after him.

Shino shrugged and said "Like a fly buzzing after its meal." And jumped off after them.

---Lee's time---

Lee had found nothing! No one in the village seemed to have been affected that he could find. This was so stupid! He could be back there, impressing the beautiful maiden of Leaf Village but no! "There's no one affected around here." Lee said as he decided to go back to the meeting spot. And so he left, not realizing that Angelmaru had flown by a few seconds later.

She cried sadly and said "Where are you? The one I first touched?" And continued on her journey.

---Meanwhile with Sasuke----

Sasuke could hear the sounds of people as they talked all throughout his section of leaf Village. After all, with these new bodies came new senses. He could probably hear a pin drop a mile away. He listend in, wanting to hear anyway say something like "I'm bigger!" Or "Wow your huge!"

"Nothing yet." Sasuke said as he stared across the village from a roof. That's when he heard it. It was a voice saying "No matter how much I eat I keep getting bigger and more muscular!?" That's was all it took for Sasuke to leap off towards the home where that sound came from.

He arrived in front of Shikamarus home. Wanting to be courteous, he knocked on the door. "Coming." Said a grouchy voice that mumbled "Man, can't anyone let me rest today?"

As the door opened, Sasuke looked in and saw a seven foot Choji. And at the door was at least a 7'5 Shikamaru. Looking up at Sasuke, Shikamaru rubbed his eyes and said "So something changed you as well?" Shikamaru asked as he let him in.

"Yes. But thats not the point. You two are growing because of a demon known as 'Angelmaru'" And so he told them about the demon, the dust, and how Naruto was fifteen feet tall.

"So why'd you come over here. If you haven't noticed I was busy being lazy and Choji is eating me out of house and home." Shikamaru told him. It was true that Choji was eating him out of house and home. Empty bags of chips, no pop, milk, or any liquids, the ketcup, mustard, pickles, chicken, fruits, and everything else was gone. All that food was being used to fuel Choji's growing hunger.

"If you come after me I promise to get you all the food you want." Sasuke told them. Choji's ears raised as he heard those words. Looking up, he smiled and shouted "I'm in!"

"And you can see who else has been changed." At that note, Shikmaru stood up and said "Okay then. I'm in. After all, I want to see just how many people are in the giants club."

"Giants club?" Sasuke asked him.

"Yeah, well what else are you gonna call it? The freakishly huge teenager club?" Shikamaru asked him.

"No, the name you thought sounds much better." Sasuke as he turned and left. Followed by Choji and Shikamaru.
11212211121211111222112111111221.title: Choji and Shikamaru. Along witha few others

choices: While they talk, Angelmaru drifts their way...
They continue discussing uninterupted
112122111212111112221121111112211.content:
Half an hour passed and everyone gathered in the biggest clearing in the forest. There were many different sizes all around, though Naruto, being the first, was the biggest. The newcomers were shocked to see all the different giants the village had. Shino, Kiba, Sasuke, and Lee were the second largest group at twelve feet. Kakashi and Iruka were the third, and Shikimaru and Choji were fourth smallest. Yet Shikimaur and Choji were still growing, so no one knew how big they'd end up. Kakashi sweatdropped at the size of some of the boys and said, "For the first time in the last few days, I actually feel small."

Iruka laughed a little and agreed. Sasuke suddenly yelled out, "Alright everyone! Sit down and I'll explain everything!"

Everyone sat down and waited to see what Sasuke had to say. He stood in front of the group and said, "Alright. First, I'm going to explain what we're up against."

He quickly ran through Angelmaru's story and what her plans were. Then he began to outline an interesting new theory.

"Since Angelmaru is blind she focuses on the chakra of a male person and bonds with them, giving them size and strength, while taking a small portion of their chakra into her own. This way, she can remember who she's already touched and compare it to any new chakra she gets. That means no one here, except Naruto being the original, will be affected by Angelmaru again.

"Alright! Yes!" Naruto jumped up, happy that he would be much, much bigger than anyone!

Everyone else just sweatdropped.

"Anyway, at the rate Angelmaru is absorbing chakra she'll soon be strong enough to travel outside the village. There are only two ways to stop her from leaving. The first way is to block her path ourselves. This plan is risky, because anyone she accidently touches will grow more. Through all of my research I couldn't find out if this process of growing was reversible or not. The second way is to find out where Angelmaru came from and send her back."

"I know where she came from." Naruto said. "I found the dust in a scroll in some run down backyard."

No one knew what he was talking about. It seemed no such place existed...

"So she was sealed in the scroll and Naruto broke the seal." Kakashi said.

"Then we'll have to try and seal her in the scroll again." Sasuke said.

"That might not be so easy." Kakashi said. "Angelmaru is a demon and it takes considerable stamina and chakra control to seal a demon. The one who does it is likely to die."

"Isn't there someway we just kill it?" Naruto asked.

"Demons are too powerful to kill outright. We'd probably have no chance." Iruka said.

So they were once more at an impass.
112122111212111112221121111112211.title: Conference of the Large

choices: She merges with Naruto who grows to 100ft. takes Sakura as his bride
She merges with Naruto and he grows along with the rest(Who are 1/2 his size)
1121221112121111122211211111122111.content:
Angelmaru cried tears of sorrow(more likely dust) as she flew across the sky. She had touched several people and yet none of them are the one she first touched. Her sadness continued to swell. Even though her power and ability to see was growing, she was unable to cope with the fact she could not find him. "I have looked everywhere for the one I first touched, yet I am unable to find him? Where are you?" She said as she flew towards the forest that Naruto and the group were at.

---In the forest---

All of the giant Ninja and Sakura were thinking of how to deal with Angelmaru. Sure they were all massive and hundreds of times more powerful: But can they do anything to stop a pile of dust that makes you grow bigger?

"Do we have anything that can tell us how to destroy her? Like that scroll for instance?" Sakura asked them, breaking each of their lines of thought.

"Yeah! That may be able to stop her if we have that scroll!" Kiba stated.

"So what did you do with it Naruto?" Iruka asked.

"Lemme see." Naruto thought back to what he did with the scroll. Now that he remembered back, he could recall that after the dust he had seen words appear. They words appeared upon the scroll only to vanish seconds later as the scroll disentegrated. "Now that I think about it.." Naruto told them of what had first happend. He had found the scroll, opened it, got covered in dust, and a group of words appeared as it disentegrated. "Now I remember!" Naruto said triumphantly.

"Whad do you remember?" Sasuke asked him.

"That it said 'Only the merging of first and Demon shall end it.'" Naruto told them. All of them groaned at this(Except Sakura. She was already purring about the thought of a bigger Naruto).

"So that means the only way to stop her is to let her merge with Naruto and make him bigger!" Sasuke said angrily, this would not great for him if Naruto lorded over himm like some kind of god.

That's when she appeared from behind a group of trees. Looking at them, Angelmaru smiled as she spotted Naruto's chakra. "You are the one I first touched." She said happily.
1121221112121111122211211111122111.title: Angelmaru searches and finally finds him!

choices: Naruto takes his rightful place as Hokage
Angelmaru's not done yet! Naruto grows even bigger!
11212211121211111222112111111221111.content:
All present watched in mingled horror and fascination as the dusty Angelmaru floated gracefully towards Naruto. As she swirled, the dust formed the image of a slight girl with long free flowing air and an airy kimono. The rest of her features were obscured as the dust approached Naruto.

"I've searched everywhere for you, my first, my bond." She rose from the ground and her invisible lips met with Naruto's. Naruto's body began to glow with a blue chakra energy as all the pieces of Angelmaru's chakra were being absorbed into his body. The glow faded and everyone present heard a content sigh and the whisper, "Peace at last..."

Everything was still as the blue chakra energy faded from Naruto. Nothing seemed to happen. Then, Naruto began to grow! His clothes quickly began to tear off as he grew in height and muscle! Within seconds he cut off all light in the clearing as his mammoth back reached towards the sky. The other smaller giants and Sakura all ran out of the way of Naruto's expanding feet. Naruto stretched higher and higher his pecs bursting with power, his abs cut deep and powerful, his biceps bulking with limitless power! Sakura nearly swooned at the magnificent sight. Then it was over. Everyone stared in awe at the gigantic Naruto. He grinned as he saw all the others looking up to him, awe evident in their faces. Naruto loved it. His toes were bigger than all those others down there. He bent down and everyone moved back except Sakura, too in awe to move. He gently scooped her up and brought her to his face.

"Well? What do you think of the new me Sakura?" His voice echoed with power.

"I-I love it!" She yelled out happily.

"Then you can come with me as I take my rightful place as Hokage!"

With that Naruto's huge feet moved and carried his monumental body towards the Hokage building.
11212211121211111222112111111221111.title: A New Force Is Born

choices: To give up his post and make Naruto 'Emperor' of Leaf Village
To run away like a coward, still allowing Naruto the rank of 'Emperor'
112122111212111112221121111112211111.content:
Naruto held the tiny doll-sized Sakura to his chest, her small frame tenderly snuggling into his collossal unstoppable form. He looked down to his that his privates were covered by a loinclothe. It was designed with the Leaf Village symbol and two angel wings:representing the fusion of him and Angelmaru(Hence the name). Naruto loved the feeling of his body free in the air. At this size, he didn't even feel the need to dress beyond the loinclothe. This was 'fully dressed' to him now.

Naruto took one step towards the village and laughed as he felt the tremendous power that radiated from him. As his foot landed, a quake covered the forest from his simple step. But to Naruto it was noexistant. He laughed as he walked towards the Hokage's Headquarters. Sakura smiled and giggled as she watched him in action.

Everyone else had stayed and looked up in awe and surprise. Sasuke was angry now that Naruto could lord over him how big and powerful he is, Iruka and Kakashi looked up and kept saying "Naruto, you idiot.", Lee started crying "I lost my one ture love!", and the others were staring in awe and admiration of the new Naruto.

---Meanwhile---

The Hokage was having a field day. Ninja's growing huge, a giant Naruto who keeps sending his bills to him, and the constant threat that another village might invade in this time of weakness. He sat down and fell on the small table, totally spent from all his hours of trying to solve the problem. "I just wish someone would appear and take this task off my hands!" He groaned "This was fine when I was younger. But I don't want to thousands of different paper work! This isn't fair!"

That's when he felt it. "A tremor?" He thought as he saw his room shake. Some of the antiques fell as the tremor happend again and again. It was getting louder and driving a throbbing pain into his head. As he felt the tremors getting louder, The Third knew it was no longer a Tremor. 'Please don't let it be who I think it is' He thought as he went to the Balcony. That's when he saw who it was. 'Darnit! This is going to make my job so much harder.'

Naruto's giant body walk down the main street through the Leaf, allowing him to reach the place with only damage on things in the middle of the street. Looking down at the small Hokage, Naruto opened his mouth to smile. "Hey Hokage! I think it's time a newer, bigger, and stronger Hokage took over!" Naruto said as he flexed his free arm. Sakura drooled as he flexed the other arm, watching the free show of her boyfriend's power.

Thinking it over, the Hokage knew he couldn't beat him. At that size, not even outsmarting him would beat him. And he doubted that anyone could beat him at that size. So he did the most logical thing he could think of...
112122111212111112221121111112211111.title: Naruto goes forth to Confront the Third

choices: Sakura starts filling out the paperwork and learns something shocking
Naruto appoints the giants as members of his new government
1121221112121111122211211111122111111.content:
The Hokage stared steelily at Naruto while he thought about the situation.

"This is my chance to retire at last!" He thought. "I've been doing this for long enough, let someone else take over. With Naruto at this size and strength we won't have to worry about invasion either. I have to handle this just right though..."

He coughed and said, "I obviously am no match for you at your current size and strength Naruto. Therefore, I shall willingly hand over the title of Hokage and all responsibilites it connotates over to you. In fact, I'll do more than just that. Along with the prestige and governing abilities of the Hokage I present you with full power and authority over the entire Leaf Village. Recreate the government as you see fit. Also, before I step down, I'm obligated to inform you of the current events of the village."

Before he could continue, Naruto lowered Sakura to the balcony and said, "Sakura can take care of that!"

Sakura seethed when she heard that! He was just foisting the hard work onto her! Unthinkable! Then Naruto continued by saying, "My first step at recreating the government is appointing Sakura as my second in command! She'll handle the tougher problems since she's a lot smarter about that stuff then me!"

Sakura blushed at that remark. She was willingly led into the inner office where the Hokage briefed her on the possible war and the other issues that were defined and repeated in the mountain of paperwork. Sakura looked at the sheer volume of it and despaired. Naruto bent down to the balcony and said, "Don't worry Sakura! I know you can do it! I'm going to collect the rest of my new government."

And with her confidence renewed, Sakura listened intently to the Hokage and began to study the paperwork. It didn't Naruto long to get back to where the other giants were...
1121221112121111122211211111122111111.title: Peaceful Coup

choices: Ten Years Later...Naruto rules the World with Sakura at his side(The End)
11212211121211111222112111111221111112.content:
Quickly all of the Giant Ninja followed Naruto after he left. They wanted to be sure he didn't do anything stupid. After arriving at their destination, they were shocked to hear with their new senses what the Hokage had said. He was letting Naruto become 'Emperor!' of the Hidden Leaf! This was unheard of, and each of them was talking amongst themselves about what to do next.

Naruto called out to Sakura, wanting to see how his Queen was doing. Quickly she returned to where he had placed her. "What is it Naruto?" She asked happily at the sight of his titan body.

"I need to tell you something." Naruto said. And so he explained all about the Nine-Tailed Fox. How the Fourth died to seal it inside him and how he has had it in him ever since. Shocked by this info, Sakura had a feeling of total shock. Yet, she remained calmed and placed a hand on one of his big tanned muscular legs.

"It doesn't matter to me if thats whats inside you. Naruto, deep down I think i've always liked you. Only I could never admit it." Sakura told him happily. Some people would think she would be unable to accept him or even like him before he became a giant. But that was not true. She loved him even before he grew big, but Sasuke was her greatest obsession.

"Thank you Sakura." Naruto said as he tenderly plucked her up and kissed her. "I'll always protect you no matter what." He placed her against his chest, allowing her to feel his muscles and heartbeat.

"Thanks Naruto. I'll always stand by your side." She said as he began to put her down after allowing her that wonderful feeling. And so she left to do the paper work. And using her Jutsu made 20 shadow clones to help. Something much easier to do the younger you are.

That's when Naruto turned his attention to a throne. He didn't care where he slept. As long as he could sleep. That's when he saw the perfect spot. Using his fists he aimed at each of the past Hokage's head statues and smashed them, all except for the Fourths. He would never do that to him. Pounding into the mountain. He stopped afer shaping a massive chair, big enough for his godly body. That's when he sat down. He felt no pain thanks to all these powered up muscles.

Looking across the town he smiled and said "I am the Divine Emperor!" His voice trembling across the village. "And I shall rule alongside my goddess for all times!" Naruto smiled as he preeched "And those that do not worship me or your goddess shall suffer divine judgement!" Everyone in the village quaked in awe and fear of his power and began to bow. All except the giants.

"Thats fine and all, but don't expect me to bow down. Takes too much work." Shikamaru said as they all moved around Naruto.

"I could care less who rules! As long as I have food!" Choji said with a smile. Both of them had grown tremendously fast thanks to sleep and food. Both were equally Nine feet tall.

The others also told him how they felt. Even though some didn't like it, Naruto is god. And trying to disobey him may not be the greatest idea.

Naruto looked down and smiled. "Since you all are evangelists of your god. I shall grant you each a rank befetting you." Naruto looked down at each of them.

First he turned to his rival Sasuke. Now nothing but a bug willing to serve him. "For you Sasuke, I shall make my Prophet of War. You shall lead my armies against those that defy me." Naruto said.

"Fine." Sasuke grunted as he looked up at him. He didn't like that he was Naruto's servant. But he had to admit, he had one of the biggest positions his servants would get.

"For Kakashi and Iruka I shall give the ranks of the Prophets of Wisdom. You will teach all children in the village all that is to be a Ninja. And that I am absolute! Nothing will distub my rule!" Naruto told the two of them.

Both of them looked at each other and looked up at Naruto like a idiot. They had the same exact jobs. Only now they would also teach that Naruto and Sakura are divine beings who rule over all.

Naruto then turned to Shikamaru and Choji. "You two shall be my Prophets of Silence and Destruction. You shall carry out the deaths of those I deem unworthy. This job will require the two of you to work rarely unless in the middle of a crisis." Naruto told them.

Both looked at the other and smiled. This meant they didn't have to worry about working that much, and even though Shikamaru thought it would be a pain to work alot in a time of crisis. At least it meant he didn't work 24/7.

"Now for Rock Lee." Naruto said as he looked at his former rival over his goddesses love. "Since you opposed me you will be my Prophet of Pilgrimages and will always travel the land. You will never see Sakura unless its a emergency." Naruto told him.

"Nooooooo!" Lee said as he got down on his knees. Now he would never again see Sakura! This wasn't fair at all! Why did he get to become a god!?

"As for the last two." Naruto said as he looked at Shino and Kiba. He thought it over, unsure of what to do with them. "They will be the Prophets of Something or other." Naruto said with a half-thought. "They will help with anything that the others needed.

'Idiot' Both of them thought as they saw he ran out of ideas for Prophet names. Same stupid Naruto would never change no matter how big he got. This meant they might be working 24/7.

"Now go forth and perform your divine duties!" Naruto said with a roar. Scaring all of them to flee away to begin their new existances.

Naruto sat back into his throne with a smile. "Just like I wished it. Thank you Angelmaru." Naruto said as he looked over his kingdom. Soon every village will bow before him, then the nations, and finally the rest of the world. All was as he wanted.
11212211121211111222112111111221111112.title: Your divine duties

112122111212111112221121111112211111121.content:
Ten years have passed since Naruto took over as Hokage. It had only taken five of those years for the world to recognize Naruto as Emperor over all the world. Most nations willigly submitted to Naruto and his Prophets but there are always some who fight and deny the inevitable. Any nation that couldn't be crushed by the force of Naruto's Prophets was crushed by Naruto himself. No weapon could penatrate Naruto's skin and rock hard muscles. Once complete rule had been established, Naruto had moved his Prophets to the different areas to rule. They in turn were ruled by Naruto who's throne resided in the capitol of the world, the Hidden Leaf Village. Sakura had overseen the problems in the village and their solutions. New laws were passed, old ways were dissolved, and all came to love Naruto and the work he did. Iruke and Kakashi kept teaching the young the ways of the ninja and the ways of Naruto. Everyone was happy and looked eagerly to what was sure to be a bright future.

Naruto needed to get away at times with Sakura of course. Being twenty-two their relationship had been cemented in the best way they could. Naruto was feeling worn out from a particularly hard day of rule, so he laid down with Sakura over his right pec above his heart. A light breeze rifled the hair of the sleeping pair as they dozed in the setting sun.
112122111212111112221121111112211111121.title: It's Going to Be a Wonderful Life

choices: ...The Hokage comes out.
...Naruto realizes the Hokage isn't there.
112122111212111112221121111112211112.content:
Naruto continued walking towards the village, and he was elated by his new size. He loved it, the whole feeling of being so big, letting his feet fall where ever they do, and knowing that people are notcing him, and have to look up to him. He only wished he could be bigger, and be able to see on forever, and be more fearsome. Al he had on covering him was a loincloth that covered his privates that had a leaf symbol with Angel wings, showing Angelmaru's and Naruto's fusion.

However, he couldn't tell, but he was still growing, albeit slowly. Sakura could, she could feel his shoulder expanding, and she could see herself rising. As he walked to the Hokage's office, he expected to be as tall as it, but when he got there, the building was half his height! It was amazing to himself how big he had gotten. He looked to the Hokage Mountain, and saw that the huge mountain came to just below his chest!

However, Naruto had more important business to attend to.

"Hey, Old Man, Get out here!" Naruto yells, and Sakura covers her ears from the noise. "Oh, sorry Sakura, I didn't mean to," Naruto speaks very softly to Sakura.

After a few minutes...
112122111212111112221121111112211112.title: Not Done Yet

choices: It is Naruto's group
It's another ninja group
11212211121211111222112111112.content:
Sakura slowly woke up. "What a dream, first Naruto was a giant, then Lee, and now Sasuke," she thought. But when she opened her eyes and saw that she was being held by Naruto and theother two were giants, she silently said, "Crud."

"Oh, Sakura-chan, you're awake," Naruto said, looking down as she sat on his massive arms and used his chest as a backrest.

"Can someone tell me what happened here?" Sakura said. And Sasuke went on to explain about Angelmaru.

"Oh," Sakura said. "Wow, an entire village of giant men," Sakura thought, "I like that thought."

"So, what do we do?" Lee asked Sasuke.

"We try and find her before anymore get big," Sasuke said.

Elsewhere, Angelmaru was still looking.

"Where are you my first," she thought, "Oh how I long to bond with you again." As she drifted a bit more, she sensed another male. "Maybe it's you!"
11212211121211111222112111112.title: Sakura wakes up and is told the situation

choices: Angelmaru avoids them and hits Naruto
Angelmaru hits both and makes them bigger
112122111212111112221121111121.content:
"Uh, Naruto, was this dust green?" Sakura asked.

"Yeah, why?" Naruto asked.

"Because it's coming for us right now!" Sakura yelled, pointing at the cloud of dust.

"What do we do?" Lee asked.

"Either let it have Naruto or try and intercept it," Sasuke said. He and Lee exchanged glances. Neither wanted an even bigger Naruto. So both made a move to intercept the dust.
112122111212111112221121111121.title: It is Naruto's group

choices: Sakura knocked out.  Angelmaru is within her
Sakura left with Sasuke to talk to Tsunade, Angelmaru doesn't have her
1121221112121111122211211111211.content:
Sakura watched as the other giants rushed at the dust. But as they were near it, it went over their heads and struck Naruto. As it hit Naruto, he collapsed and was out like a light.

"He wasn't even going to try and avoid it," Sakura said, walking off Naruto's body to the other giants. "What now?" Sakura asked.

"Hope it doesn't make him grow too big," Sasuke said.

In his mind, Naruto was before the gates of the 9-tail Fox. But he was not alone this time. Also present was the body of a beautiful, but blind woman.

"Oh my loves," she said, "Ky-kun, how I missed you."

"Angel-chan?" the Kyuubi's voice said, "So you were also sealed within something."

"Ironic that I was released by your host," she said, "I hadn't realized when he did that you were within him. Otherwise I would of helped you even more."

"I usually sleep when the brat does something," Kyuubi said.

"Wait, you know each other?" Naruto finally said, "And why aren't you more monster like, like the Kyuubi?"

"Simple, I was a human who became a demon through a powerful Jutsu. I was granted the gift to help my friend and love become even stronger. And he did as a result," Angelmaru said. "But now we are united once more. Who is his mate?"

"My mate?!" Naruto yelled.

"Do you recall the small person he was holding when you attacked?" The Kyuubi asked.

"Yes, a female chakra, I sensed it," Angelmaru said, "She's his mate?"

"Don't you touch Sakura-chan!" Naruto said as he charged at Angelmaru. She easily dodges and struck Naruto with her walking stick.

"Never mind," Angelmaru said to the Kyuubi before walking to Naruto. "Because you are the holder of my love, I will not harm you, but you will be punished."

Outside,
Sakura and the others watched as Naruto began to shrink to a smaller size. "What's going on?" she wondered.

Inside.
"Now, I am off to find my eyes," Angelmaru said before vanishing.

"Wait, what did she mean by that?" Naruto asked.

"She can tell which female you truly desire as a mate and will join with her," the Kyuubi said.

Then Naruto woke up and saw
1121221112121111122211211111211.title: Demonic lovers?

choices: Take it
Don't take it
11212211121211111222112111112111.content:
Lee and Sasuke were standing over the tiny Sakura.

"What happened?" Naruto asked as he looked up to the two. He had to of been only 7 feet tall now.

"Well, after it hit you, you shrank some and then the dust began moving and went into Sakura," Lee said, "Why did you shrink anyway?"

"I made Angelmaru angry by trying to attack her when she talked about Sakura," Naruto said.

"What did she want with Sakura?" Sasuke asked, "My research said she only desired males to enhance."

"Because Sakura's close to my heart," Naruto said, "And Angelmaru was the one who helped the Kyuubi become so powerful. They were lovers."

"So she's going to make Sakura her host so she can make you bigger easier?" Lee asked.

"Don't know," Naruto said.

In Sakura's mind. Sakura woke up in a forest filled with cherry trees.

Okay, what is this?" she wondered, "Where am I?"

"You are talking with me," Angelmaru said walking out of nowhere, "And we are in your mind."

"Who are you?" Sakura asked.

"I am Angelmaru and I have a deal to make with you," Angelmaru said.

"Why me?" Sakura asked.

"Do you love the first one I touched?" Angelmaru asked.

"Well, uh, he's a really great friend and. . ." Sakura began.

"Of course you love him!" Inner Sakura said appearing.

"Interesting personality you have," Angelmaru said, "Now that I know you do, I have a deal to make with you."

"What sort of deal?" both Sakura's asked.

"For me to bind myself to you and your body," Angelmaru said, "In return, you, through me, can make men grow or shrink."

"Any other prices?" Sakura asked.

"You are wise indeed," Angelmaru said, "The host of my love, you will only make grow, unless I prevent you."

"Who's that?" Sakura asked.

"The one you call Naruto," Angelmaru said, "He angered me when I was talking with him just a few minutes ago. So, he was shrunk. So, do we have a deal?"
11212211121211111222112111112111.title: A deal with a demon

choices: Tell them the truth
Lie and do one of Angelmaru's requests
112122111212111112221121111121111.content:
"All right," Sakura said, "We have a deal." Angelmaru smiled and Sakura bent over in pain. "What is this?"

"I am binding myself to you," Angelmaru said, "I apologize for the pain. It won't last much longer.

Outside, Sakura's body also convulsed and grabbed her stomach. When Sakura released her hands, Naruto looked at her stomach.

"What is that?" Lee asked, regarding a mark on Sakura's belly. It appeared to be a heart with wings on it. And surrounding it were eight dots, not unlike Naruto's seal.

"It looks like a sealing mark," Sasuke said, "What could be going on in there?"

In her mind, Sakura got up and looked at where Angelmaru was. But in Angelmaru's place stood a new Cherry tree.

"Angelmaru?" Sakura asked. Quickly, a face emerged from the trunk.

"Yes, we are one now," Angelmaru said, "If you desire to grow or shrink any man, simply ask me mentally and I will."

"Awesome!" Inner Sakura screamed.

"What about Naruto?" Sakura asked.

"Either take him to your home and shrink him to normal until he apologizes or grow the other two I touched, and still wait for Naruto to apologize," Angelmaru instructed.

"Maybe," Sakura said before leaving.

Outside, Sakura slowly woke up. She looked at the giant men around her.

"Hey guys," she said.

"Sakura-chan, are you all right?" Naruto asked.

"Perfectly fine," Sakura said getting up. Angelmaru's old form fell off of Sakura.

"What happened?" Sasuke asked.
112122111212111112221121111121111.title: Take it

choices: Naruto and Sakura go and grow Naruto's choice
Lee and Sasuke overheard her explain. Lee wants to get bigger too!
1121221112121111122211211111211112.content:
"Well, if I'm going to do it, I might as well do it now!" Sakura thought looking at Lee, Sasuke, and Naruto. But which one should she do? She was kind of stuck with Naruto now, since Angelmaru loved the Nine Tailed Fox, but that didn't mean she wasn't allowed to have any fun! It didn't take long to decide. If she took Naruto back to her home, she would pass through the village and would be able to scope out those worthy to grow. It was exciting to have such power over the village. She grabbed Naruto's hand and said, "Oh, nothing really happened. Angelmaru decided bind with me for now, that's all. But I've got something I need Naruto's help with back home so we're going to head over there now."

Naruto looked surprised, but allowed himself to get led by Sakura back to her house. This was going to be sweet! Sasuke and Lee watched them go. When they were out of sight, Lee turned to Sasuke and said, "What do you think?"

"Tailed Beasts don't just decide to bind with people 'for a little while'. Something's going on with Sakura that she's not telling us." Sasuke said.

"Lets follow them!" Lee said. "That way we can find out more about the situation!"

Sasuke agreed to that plan and they quickly took off after Sakura and Naruto, hiding themselves in the trees. Despite their new size, they were as agile as they had been before, perhaps even more so.

Meanwhile, Naruto couldn't believe his luck! Sakura was taking him back to her house! At last, all those fantasies he had were going to come true! Naruto was so focused on imagining what they were going to do together, he didn't notice Sakura constantstly looking around her. She saw Shino collecting bugs, Kiba walking his dog, Neji training, Konohamaru and Moegi and Udon playing, she saw Kakashi reading his book and Iruka leading a group of students into the Academy building. In short, she saw a whole lot of men waiting to be changed! They were both so focused, they didn't see the stares they were getting from the villagers at Naruto's large size. Finally, they made it to Sakura's house. She locked the door after Naruto entered and ran upstairs to her room before her mother could say anything. Once she was in her room, she locked that door as well. She turned to Naruto and said, "Okay Naruto, it's time for you to pay!"

Naruto was so shocked to hear this, he didn't exactly comprehend it. "What?"

Sakura concentrated on Naruto's body and thought, "I wish Naruto would shrink back to his normal size!"

Angelmaru heard the request and instantly started manipulating the dust in Naruto's body to shrink him. Naruto was dismayed as he felt himself getting smaller and smaller until he was his normal size.

"Aaaaagh! What the heck happened?!?!? I was supposed to be the biggest!"

Sakura laughed and said, "Well you should've been nicer to Angelmaru!"

"What? What did I do? What are you talking about?" Naruto asked desperately.

Sakura pointed an accusing finger at him and said, "You threatened Angelmaru before she bound herself to me. Because you were so rude, she told me to use her powers to shrink you until you apologized!"

Naruto swiftly ran over to Sakura and said, "Well I am sorry! I only said those things because I was concerned about you Sakura!"

Sakura blushed and said, "R-Really?"

"Of course!" Naruto said, grabbing her hands. "I wouldn't want anything bad to happen to you!"

Sakura giggled happily and said, "Thanks Naruto!"

Naruto gave her the puppy dog eyes and said, "Now can you make me big again? Please?"

Sakura smiled and said, "Sure!"

She concentrated on his body and thought, "I wish Naruto would grow back to his fifteen foot giant self!"

Naruto shouted with happiness as he felt his body start to swell up again. Sakura got a front row seat as Naruto's body increased in height and muscle. Naruto's jacket gave up the ghost and burst into shreds, revealing his chiseled and cut torso. Soon his head cracked against the cieling leaving a huge dent. Naruto quickly sat down and took Sakura into his arms. "Thanks Sakura!"

Sakura blushed again and said, "You're welcome."

Naruto released her and sat her on his huge leg, asking, "What do you want to do now?"

Sakura had a glint in her eye as she said, "You know I can make other men grow too!"

Naruto looked worried and said, "But you won't grow anyone bigger than me right?"

"Of course! Now that you apologized I'm not allowed to shrink you any smaller. Only bigger!"

Naruto had a huge grin on his face after hearing that.

"But I'm sure there's some people you think deserve to be bigger." Sakura said. "I'll let you pick who I grow first."

Naruto thought about it. There were a lot of nice deserving guys who would love to get bigger. Finally Naruto thought of someone.
1121221112121111122211211111211112.title: She's Up to Something...

choices: They find Kakashi and make him grow
Lee and Sasuke find them and want answers.
11212211121211111222112111112111121.content:
"Sakura, let's grow Kakashi," Naruto said.

"Why him?" Sakura asked. She had planned on growing Kakashi, but not for a while.

"If you make him, say 8ft tall, his clothes, more importantly his mask will be destroyed. He will be too shocked by his growth to cover his face," Naruto said. With each sentenced finished, Sakura's smile grew.

"Naruto, that's genius," Sakura said hugging Naruto's massive body, "I'd make you bigger if I wasn't worried about you getting out of my room without destroying it." Naruto chuckled at that line.

"Then let's get going," Naruto said. With that, he showed great flexibility as he got through Sakura's door and exited the house.

"I wonder if his flexibility comes natural or the demon-fox did it?" Sakura thought, "Will Angelmaru change my body's abilities?" She gave a shudder, realizing something she forgot to ask.

"Naruto," Sakura yelled as Naruto was standing up and stretching comfortably. He quickly knelt down and looked in.

"Yeah Sakura?" he asked. She walked up to him and whispered her concerns into his big ear.

"So, did being binded with the nine-tails make you act different?" she asked.

"Uh, I'm sorry Sakura, but I don't know. I was a baby when it was sealed within me. I can tap its power and it sometimes influences my body if too much is released, but I don't have an answer to your concern," Naruto said. Sakura looked down with his answer. She looked worried now. "Hey Sakura, listen to me, no matter what is within you, you will always be you. You need to believe that. When I look in your eyes, you're still the same beautiful girl I've known." Sakura's smile returned and hugged Naruto. "Now you're just smaller," Naruto added with a laugh.

"You can say some crazy things sometimes, but you do know how to make me smile," Sakura said, "Now, let's go find Kakashi."
11212211121211111222112111112111121.title: Questions from one Jinchūriki to another

choices: Sakura chooses a guy and goes to town
Akatsuki gets wind of Angelmaru and come looking for her
112122111212111112221121111121111211.content:
Sakura, feeling a lot better, decided to put all thoughts of Angelmaru and her influences behind her. If anything bad did happen, she knew Naruto would be there to help her through it, no matter what the cost to himself. So she brushed aside worried thoughts and instead focused on the mission ahead of her. It didn't take long to find Kakashi, still sitting in the same spot, reading his book. Luckily, Kakashi always focused entirely on his Icha Icha Paradise books whenever he was reading, so he didn't notice Naruto and Sakura. They both hid behind a nearby billboard and spied on Kakashi.

"Okay Sakura, go for it!" Naruto whispered excitedly.

"Okay!" Sakura closed her eyes and thought, "I wish Kakashi-sensei would grow eight feet tall!"

"Did you do it?" Naruto asked.

"Yeah, now we just have to wait..."

It didn't take long. Within seconds Kakashi started to grow. At first, he didnt' notice it, but he couldn't ignore it when a loud ripping sound erupted from his pants. Setting the book down and standing up, Kakashi was surprised to find that his pants had torn down the legs, revealing his boxers which were getting progressively tighter.

"So Kakashi-sensei wears boxers..." Sakura said under her breath.

"What does it matter?" Naruto said.

"It's just a thing girls have! You can tell a lot of things about a guy by judging his underwear!"

Naruto looked thoughtful and said, "I didn't know that..."

Both turned their attention back to Kakashi as his shirt pressed tighter and tighter against his expanding chest until it ripped down the middle revealing his bigger muscles. Sakura blushed and said, "I love this power so much..."

Naruto looked a little miffed and said, "I'm still bigger."

Sakura grinned and said, "No one can match my Naruto!"

Naruto grinned back at that comment.

The moment of truth was at hand. Kakashi was standing with only his boxers and his mask still on. Naruto and Sakura leaned closer as the growth started subsiding. Soon...soon...

"Good thing my mask is stretchy." Kakashi said, pulling on it a little. "If it wasn't, it surely would've ripped by now."

Naruto and Sakura both did a face fault. Leave it to Kakashi-sensei to go to such lengths to keep his face hidden.

"No way!" Naruto said. "There's no way that mask can take that much growth and not rip! Make him bigger Sakura! That mask is going down!"

Sakura sweatdropped and said, "Let's just leave it alone Naruto. Kakashi-sensei's obviously thought of everything. Besides, there are plenty of other people to grow and it's my turn to choose."

Naruto sighed and said, "Alright. If nothing else we can always shrink him and force him to take off the mask!"

So the pair set off to find another growable guy.
112122111212111112221121111121111211.title: Revealed at Last?

choices: Sakura finds someone else to grow
Sakura is found out by Kakashi, Sasuke and Lee are with him
1121221112121111122211211111211112112.content:
Sakura looked around and soon found the next person to grow.

"Iruka-sensei," Sakura said, as she watched him cleaning off the blackboard after class from the outside tree.

"Hey Sakura, why him next?" Naruto asked.

"Two reasons, one, in case Sasuke and Lee find out what I can do, we'll need some level headed people keeping things calm. And he was the one who made you a gennin, right?" Sakura said to Naruto.

"Good points," Naruto said. He knew when Lee found out about this he would want to become stronger, not just to impress Sakura but to defeat Neji Hyuuga as well. And Sasuke would want it to kill Itachi.

"Angelmaru, make Iruka-sensei grow to nine-feet tall," Sakura invoked. A knock on Iruka's classroom door caused Sakura to jump down. Inside they heard another set of footsteps.

"Hey Iruka," came a female voice.

"Anko," Iruka said, "How are you today?"

"I've been better," Anko said, "I was slightly angry at you leaving so early today. Tonight, you won't escape me so easily."

"We'll see," Iruka said. Following this, Naruto and Sakura heard them passionately kiss.

"Iruka-sensei and that scary procter," Naruto said, "Who knew Iruka was a masochist?" Sakura laughed quietly.

"Let's leave them alone," Sakura said, "We don't want to be discovered."

With that, Naruto and Sakura left the couple, in search of the next man.

Elsewhere

"Master," Zetsu spoke to Pein.

"What is it Zetsu?" Pein asked.

"It seems Angelmaru has been released and is in Konoha," Zetsu said, "And the nine-tale Jinchūriki has grown to over ten feet."

"My plan does not require that tail-less demon, but we can still use it to become even stronger," Pein said, "Send out Itachi, Kisame, Sasori, and Deidara to capture Angelmaru, and the Jinchūriki if possible."

"Yes master," Zetsu said before disappearing.

"With Angelmaru's power, the power of Uchiha Marda will be unstoppable," came a voice in the shadows.

"My self, if I have to hear about his 'power' one more time, I'm seriously going to cut his penis off," Though Pein.

Elsewhere still
"So, back to Konoha then?" Kisame said after Zetsu delivered the message, "I can get that Miato Guy back quickly."

"We'll need to meet up with Sasori and Deidara before we make an attempt," Itachi said, "With luck, the demon will remain hostless."

"If not?" Kisame asked.

"We might fair better against Jiraiya-sama," Itachi said
1121221112121111122211211111211112112.title: Akatsuki gets wind of Angelmaru and come lookin...

choices: Go to Lady Tsunade's office
Have Lady Tsunade meet them at the training area,
11212211121211111222112111112111121122.content:
Naruto and Sakura were walking through, looking for another man to grow.

"I still say Shikamaru," Naruto said, looking down at the street below, "We owe him for his actions during the invasion."

"He'd be to lazy to use his new size," Sakura replied, sitting on Naruto's shoulder. "We need to find someone else."

"What about Rock Lee or Sasuke?" came a voice from behind.

"Na, they're already big enough in my opinion," Naruto answered before realizing Sakura didn't say that. Naruto turned around slowly, Sakura enjoying the ride, also turned with him. Before them stood Kakashi-sensei, being dwarfed by Rock Lee and Sasuke.

"So, you can make people grow now Sakura?" Kakashi asked in a pleasant tone, like he was asking how training went.

"Uh, yes I can," Sakura confessed. She would of tried something, but Naruto's renewed height plus Sasuke and lee knowing he was shrunk earlier would dismiss any lie.

"Oh Sakura, please make me bigger!" Lee said, with his copyrighted smile.

"Uh, no," Sakura said. Lee's head dropped in sadness.

"Sakura, Naruto, I'd like to continue this elsewhere," Kakashi said, "I'm worried about the weight stressing this roof. It may not hold. Why don't we go see Lady Tsunade?"

"Lady Tsunade?" Sakura repeated. "Oh no, if she finds out she may want me to shrink everyone back to normal or make certain male shinobi grow larger," she thought. She looked at Naruto's face, who was looking back. His smile told her no matter what, he would help her get out of this jam. "But his bog mouth might just get me deeper in it," Sakura thought.
11212211121211111222112111112111121122.title: Sakura is found out by Kakashi, Sasuke and Lee ...

choices: Find Lee begging Sakura for height and Naruto glaring at Sasuke
Find 7ft tall Sasuke and Lee
112122111212111112221121111121111211222.content:
"All right," Sakura said, "But why don't we meet that the training area with your favorite memorial? I doubt any room could hold all of you guys." She glanced at Naruto, who got the message.

"See you guys there," Naruto said before leaving.

"Well, this will be interesting," Kakashi said, "I'm off to inform Lady Tsunade. I want you two to follow them, but don't attack. Sakura might either shrink you back to normal or she'll make Naruto bigger." Lee and Sasuke exchanged looks. Neither wanted to return to normal, at the moment, and they really didn't want an even bigger Naruto to deal with.

"All right," Sasuke said.

"Yes Sir," Lee said before both left.

Kakashi hurried along to Tsunade, only stopping when he passed Anko's house.

"Oh wow Iruka, I love this new 9 foot you. You know just how to hold me and touch me," Anko said.

"Wow, Icha Icha Tactics live," Kakashi thought before going on to Tsunade. When he got to her window, she was easily shocked at seeing the giant Kakashi. She was even more shocked at hearing what Sakura had become.

"So, including you, there are five giants?" Shizune asked as she, and Tsunade were carried by Kakashi to the predetermined training area.

"Yes," Kakashi said, "I believe I'm the shortest at eight feet. Naruto is the tallest at 15ft."

"This could be a break we're looking for," Tsunade said, "We're low on strength after the invasion. From what you reports so far, everything is increased when you grow. This might help us regain face in the world."

"It would seem so," Kakashi said. "Here we are," he said when they arrived. The two ladies jumped down and looked around. "Where are the others?" Kakashi spoke allowed.
112122111212111112221121111121111211222.title: Have Lady Tsunade meet them at the training area,

choices: The trio wait for Kakashi
Someone else finds Sasuke, Naruto, Sakura, and Lee
1121221112121111122211211111211112112221.content:
The small group looked around the area where the memorial was standing and tried to find the other giants.

"You'd think they'd be able to spot..." Shizune said, holding Ton Ton close to her.

"Ooink!" Ton Ton agreed.

"I think I see something over there." Kakashi said, pointing.

Sure enough, Sakura was sitting by the memorial with her legs and arms crossed, her head turned from Lee who was on his knees before the girl, hands raised, begging.

"Please Sakura! I am begging you! Just a little taller! Do I not deserve that?"

"For the last time NO Lee! Now stop hounding me or I'll shrink you!"

Tsunade sighed and shouted, "Get up Lee! What would Guy say if he saw you like this?"

Lee jumped up and bowed to Tsunade and said, "I am sorry Lady Hokage."

Tsunade patted him on the shoulder and he pulled out of the bow. She looked over about ten feet and saw Sasuke and Naruto staring daggers at each other. "What's their problem?"

Sakura blushed and said, "Well...they got into a fight over how big I made Naruto. I don't know if Sasuke's jealous or if he just doesn't think what I'm doing is right, but they got into a fight and haven't been talking."

Tsunade sighed again and said, "We don't have time for this! You two! Get over here now!"

Sasuke and Naruto slowly walked over to Tsunade, both now looking everywhere except at each other. Once the whole group was together Tsunade said, "So Sakura is a Jinchuriki now is that it?"

Sakura nodded. Tsunade smiled and said, "Good. Angelmaru, from what I've read in my studying as a medical ninja, is the most docile of the tailed beasts. I don't think you have to worry about her taking control of your body or hurting you in anyway."

Sakura sighed in releif as she heard this. Naruto smiled and gave her the thumbs up. Tsunade continued, "And from what I've seen, Angelmaru's powers are exactly what this village needed after Orochimaru's invasion. With our shinobi forces down, increasing the size and strength of the ones we do have is a top priority now."

Sakura frowned. She had been afraid of this. Now Tsunade was going to force her to use Angelmaru's powers the way she wanted instead of using them freely. Tsunade said, "But since the power does come from Sakura, I think it's only fair if she gets to decide who gets to grow."

Sakura looked up in shock as Tsunade smiled at her. Sakura smiled back and said, "Thank you very much Lady Tsunade."

"Don't mention it. Just make your choices carefully. I'm afraid I'll have to hold you responsible if anything happens that threatens the village or its people."

"I'll be careful. I promise!" Sakura said.

Tsunade turned and said, "Well then I'll be going back to my office. I've got to start assigning missions and changing a few of them. I would like you to send me a list of those that you grow though, so I can use them effectively."

"Of course Lady Tsunade."

"Alright Shizune, Kakashi. Let's get out of here!"

Tsunade and Shizune were hoisted back onto Kakashi's shoulders. He turned and said, "I would like to talk with you three when I get back."

It was obvious he meant Sasuke, Naruto, and Sakura. They all looked at each other, wondering what Kakashi wanted to talk to them about. Before anyone could ask, however, he was gone, heading back towards the Hokage's office.
1121221112121111122211211111211112112221.title: Tsunade's Generosity

choices: "Sure," he replies
"No," he replies.  Shrink him to force its removal
1121221112121111122211211111211112112221.content:
"Well, I must go and do 1 million push-ups to keep in shape," Lee said with his signature pose, "See you later." With that, Lee ran off.

"Something tells me we don't need to work out much to keep in shape," Naruto said.

"Quiet," Sasuke said, looking up at Naruto, "He might here you and come back."

"Good point," Naruto said before sitting down. Sakura went and sat on his leg, while Sasuke leaned against a tree.

"You know Sasuke, I think the next time we take the Chuunin exam, it will be easier getting the scrolls," Naruto said with a smile. Sasuke gave a smile back.

"No other team will stand much of a chance on a physical level," Sasuke agreed, "But unfortunately for you, it also requires brains to be a chunnin."

"And who's plan was it that saved Kakashi-sensei from Zabuza'a water prison?" Naruto asked.

"Will you stop using that as a reason?" Sasuke asked, "One brilliant idea doesn't make you a genius." Naruto started looking angry.

"Okay, both of you stop it right now," Sakura said, "Or I'll shrink you back to normal, or worse." Both stared at her.

"You can make us smaller than our normal bodies?" Sasuke asked. His info on Angelmaru never revealed that.

"Usually Tail-beasts can't use every ability they are capable of," came a voice from the shadows. Kakashi walked out. "I wouldn't be surprised if she could."

"Hey Kakashi-sensei," Sakura said, "You wanted to ask us something?" "Something tells me, being the shortest on this team won't be that bad," Sakura thought, looking at her tall teammates.

"Yes, when I ran into Sasuke, he was first shocked to find me. And more shocked that my mask didn't rip," Kakashi said, "So I wanted to know, did you make me grow just to see under this mask?"

"Yeah, that was my idea," Naruto said.

"Well, like I said before, you could of just asked me to remove them," Kakashi said.

"Will you sensei?" Sakura asked.
1121221112121111122211211111211112112221.title: The trio wait for Kakashi

choices: Naruto, Sakura, and now Sasuke continue their village growing escapades
Tsunade contacts Sakura with a request
1121221112121111122211211111211112112221.content:
"Sure, why not?" Kakashi said, putting his finger under the top part of the mask.

His students all clambered close to him and leaned over (or looked up in Sakura's case) and watched attentively. With one swift motion, Kakashi lowered the mask and revealed his face at last. His students stared and Naruto said, "Is that it?"

"Well what were you expecting?" Kakashi asked sweatdropping.

Through each of their minds raced the different pictures they had imagined under Kakashi's mask. Each one now seemed completely absurd and crazy. What was under Kakashi's mask was a face. A very handsome and heart melting face (to Sakura at least) but just a face.

Kakashi pulled the mask back up and said, "There. Satisfied?"

"Yeah...but why the mask?" Naruto asked.

"I have my reasons." Kakashi said.

They all decided to just leave it at that. They had seen what they had wanted to see after all.

"Anyway, now that Lady Tsunade and Shizune are back what do you three plan on doing?"

Naruto and Sakura looked at each other and Sakura said, "Well, me and Naruto are going to keep looking around the village for guys to grow. I can't really say for Sasuke."

Sasuke shrugged and said, "I'll probably come along and put my two cents in. I've got nothing better to do."

"Well, just stay out of trouble." Kakashi said. "I've got some reading to catch up on..."

And with that, Kakashi was gone again.
1121221112121111122211211111211112112221.title: Kakashi's True Face Revealed

choices: They find at least one member of Team 10
They run into another person or team wanting growth
1121221112121111122211211111211112112221.content:
"All right, who do I grow next," Sakura asked, sitting on Naruto's shoulder so the guys ca walk at a normal pace to them and still talk.

"Well, who else did you guys do?" Sasuke asked.

"Iruka-sensei, right before he went on a date with that scary proctor of the second exam," Naruto said, "He's it."

"What about someone on Kurenia's team," Sakura asked.

"Sounds interesting. I wonder if Shino's bugs will mind more room?" Naruto said.

"Or can I make Akumaru grow as well," Sakura said with a smile, before looking at Sasuke.

"Sounds like a good choice," Sasuke said, "Any clue where they are?"

"Nope," Naruto said.
1121221112121111122211211111211112112221.title: Who do they look for

choices: Sure
No, make Gaara bigger instead
1121221112121111122211211111211112112221.content:
Naruto, Sasuke, and Sakura got to the edge of the village. "This is going to be fun," Sakura said with glee.

"Just don't make Naruto bigger," Sasuke said.

"Why not!" Naruto asked, glaring down at Sasuke.

"Because if you get any bigger, you won't have clothes on, you'll cost a fortune in food, and at 15 ft, you don't need to be without any reason," Sasuke said.

"Those are some good points," Sakura said, patting Naruto's ear.

"I guess," Naruto said. As they continued on their way, a yell brought their attention downward.

"What the heck happened to you!?" yelled Temari of the Sand. she was accompanied by her younger brothers, Kankuro and Gaara.

"I did," Sakura said as Naruto knelt down. Sakura slid off Naruto's shoulder.

"You!" Kankuro asked, "How could you do this? And when did you get this ability? It's no transformation." Sakura looked at Kankuro. Did she really want to tell them what she was now?

"She gained a new ability," Naruto said, looking down at the three gennin, "You get me, right Gaara?" Gaara looked at Naruto, then at Sakura.

"So, you now contain a demon within you as well?" Gaara asked, "Who's life was sacrificed to seal it?"

"What? How did you guess that?" Sakura asked.

"No life was sacrificed," Sasuke said, "They joined with each willingly."

"You're lucky then," Gaara said, "My mother was."

"You're mother?" Sakura asked, then thinking on how weird Gaara looked during the invasion. "He must be like Naruto," Sakura thought.

"Yes, I sense the Shukaku within him," Angelmaru said.

"So, you can make people bigger?" Temari asked, showing some interest in being taller.

"Yes, well just guys really," Sakura said.

"How come?" Kankuro asked.

"It has something to do with how my demon came into existence," Sakura said, "It involved something with her love and wanting to make him stronger." "I don't need to tell them about Naruto's demon or our demons were lovers," she thought.

"Wow, so could you make me bigger then?" Kankuro asked.

1121221112121111122211211111211112112221.title: Either Hianta, Tenen, or Ino

choices: Hinata faints from that last line
Hinata runs away, Only Sakura follows her.
1121221112121111122211211111211112112221.content:
As Kakashi was running with Tsunade towards the training area, they caught the attention of Hinata.

"What was that?" Hinata thought as she was training by herself. She quickly used her Byakugan and saw that Kakashi was a small giant, and was carrying the Hokage with her assistant. "Isn't that Naruto's sensei?" she wondered, "Wasn't Naruto taller than normal these past few days? I should follow them."

Despite her good speed, Hinata could only keep Kakashi just within range of her byakugan sight. When she eventually caught up with them, she had to hide as Kakashi was coming back. She hid behind a tree. Either none of the ninja didn't notice or care about Hinata's presence, for they didn't stop when they passed her. Hinata was able to pick up some of their conversation as they passed.

"Naruto being 15ft tall," Shizune said, "The ramen shop is going to have a love and hate this." Tsunade laughed at that.

"I think our hunger is altered when this happens to us," Kakashi said, "It seems another good thing since. . ." But what else Kakashi was lost as he was too far away.

"Naruto-kun's 15ft tall! I have to see this!" Hinata said and went in the opposite direction of Kakashi. She soon came to the training area and heard a voice call out.

"502! 503! 504!" Rock Lee said, "And barely a sweat!"

"Great Bushy-brow, now would you stop that? It's annoying watching you go up and down like that," Naruto said. Sakura was sitting on his arm.

"I actually agree with Naruto," Sasuke said.

"But I must keep my promise. If sakura didn't make me grow, I must do 10000 push-up!" Lee responded, before counting aloud again. He was up to 550s.

With the sight of these three giant males, Hinata did what any girl like her would do: Scream her head off. This caused Lee to stop his self-inflicted punishment. All three looked and saw Hinata in the tree line, looking more shaky than she was after her fight with Neji.

"N-N-N-Naruto," Hinata stuttered as she slowly approached, "How did this happen?"

"Uh," Naruto said. He didn't want to tell about Sakura, as that was her secret.

"A special power," Sasuke said calmly.

"Who's?" Hinata asked.

"Mine," Sakura said, "I can make any guy as big or small as I want."

Hianat seemed to blush as she said, "You mean you could make Naruto bigger than this?"

"Yep," Naruto said, "We're sort of an item now, Sakura and me."
1121221112121111122211211111211112112221.title: Hinata

choices: Hinata snaps and attacks Sakura
Someone comes in on the conversation
1121221112121111122211211111211112112221.content:
"Item." That thought ran through Hinata's mind like the Akamichi clan to an all you-can-eat-buffet. She lowered he head and ran off.

"Was it something I said?" Naruto asked aloud, showing his usual "blunt as a brick wall" insights to this type of matter. The other three realized what had happened: Hinata had a crush on Naruto and he just broke it bad.

"If Kakashi-sensei comes back while I'm gone, tell him I'll be back in a few," Sakura said hopping down and going after Hinata.

"Okay, what did I miss?" Naruto asked again. Lee and Sasuke looked at each other, then Naruto.

"You think being bigger could make some more stupid?" Sasuke asked.

"Well, at least oblivious to the obvious," Lee replied This started Lee and Sasuke chiding Naruto for a bit.

Meanwhile, Sakura was moving quickly and heard a girl crying. She moved towards the noise and found Hinata crying into her knees.

"Hinata," Sakura said, quietly approaching her. Hinata heard Sakura and for a moment, her mind flashed with anger. Hinata slowly rose to her feet and looked at Sakura.

"How long?" she asked.

"How long what?" Sakura replied.

"How long have you had this gift? How long have you loved Naruto-kun!?" Hinata yelled, her tears were back.

"The gift I received from a demon," Sakura said calmly, "One of the powerful tail-beasts bonded with me. As for Naruto, I guess it's been growing for a while."

"But it's not as long as my love for him!" Hinata said, "I've cared about Naruto since the Academy, when all you cared about was Sasuke Uchiha."

"Well, part of me is sorry you had to find out in such a bad way," Sakura said, "Naruto can be pretty dense at times."

"I know," Hinata said. "But still, you weren't watching him all those years. You don't know how lonely he was in this village. No one approaching him. No one wanting to be his friend."

"Not even you. You watched him and did nothing to help ease his pain," Sakura said coldly, "But there were others who weren't held back by fear. That was one reason I made Iruka-sensei bigger as well. He cared about Naruto and treated him like a younger sibling. So I might of been blinded by an infatuation with Sasuke, but you still did nothing. Who's crime is worse: The blind one who didn't see the pain or the one who did see and did nothing?"
1121221112121111122211211111211112112221.title: Hinata runs away, Only Sakura follows her.

choices: Hinata snaps again and attacks again
Kakashi is waiting at the memorial with the others, Lee left.
1121221112121111122211211111211112112221.content:
"SHUT UP!" Hinata cried out before saying, "BYAKUGAN!" Hinata then made a swift attack on Sakura.

"Crap!" Sakura thought deflecting the attack with one hand. As Sakura retreated a little, her hand now hurt.

"How does that feel?" Hinata asked, "What ever you feel now will hurt even more. Once I defeat you I will take that demon and Naruto will be mine forever!" Hinata then gave out a sadistic laugh.

"She's nuts!" Sakura thought. "Not going to happen," she said, "On either point. Naruto never noticed you. If you try and force him to love you, it won't be a real love. You'd only be fooling yourself." Hinata's anger rose and she attacked Sakura again.

"You don't know anything about Naruto-kun!" Hinata yelled attacking with both hands. Sakura barely had time to duck and avoid the attack.

"Her attack was sloppier than the first," Sakura thought, "If I can get her angry enough, her attacks might be weakened and give me a chance. I just have to avoid her until then." She dodged another attack.

"Tell me why Naruto would like you over me?" Sakura yelled backing up.

"Because I'm gentle and caring unlike you! I wouldn't harm a hair on his head!" Hinata said back.

"He doesn't mind that," Sakura said, "He learns from making a mistake. By punishing him, it enforces that. Besides, have you really seen Naruto in a fight?"

"I saw him against Kiba," Hinata said.

"Yeah, from what I've seen, that was a low mark on his fights, especially at the end. I've seen him battle a missing-ninja and outwit him, saving Kakashi-sensei's life. I've seen him help change the outlook of an entire town, and not Konoha. I've seen him face things that would make you die from shock. It nearly made Sasuke, but Naruto's voice gave Sasuke a beating that made Sasuke even more powerful. Then there was his fight against Neji, you recall that right? Remember how he won?" Sakura asked. Sakura's words were making the desired attack. With every point, Hinata got angrier and lost focus on using her Gentle Fist in favor of just punching the pink haired enemy. Sakura's last point made Hinata miss Sakura completely, giving Sakura a chance for a powerful punch to Hinata's face.

"I saw it," Hinata replied, wiping her now bloody nose.

"Do you recall his drive to win? How he never stopped fighting, even when Neji was winning? How he used his inner power to undo what Neji's Gentle Fist did to him?" Sakura asked, "Naruto is more than he seems."

"What do you mean?" Hinata asked, her Byakugan deactivating.

"You said you were there, don't you recall everything? It was pretty hard to miss," Sakura chided.

"My heart was still injured from Neji's attacks. I didn't see the entire fight," Hinata confessed.

"Then you didn't see his burst of chakra, revitalizing him," Sakura said, "Do you know why?"

"No," Hinata said.

"Then you'll never know him for who he really is," Sakura said.

"And what is that?" Hinata asked.

"A true hero," Sakura said before leaving to return to her squad and Lee.
1121221112121111122211211111211112112221.title: Hinata snaps and attacks Sakura

1121221112121111122211211111211112112221.content:
"Tell me what you know!" Hinata yelled, snapping again and tackling Sakura. Sakura was taken by surprise and as a result, also had a broken nose. She was able to get Hinata off of her and got back up.

"It's for him to tell you," Sakura said.

"I want to know now!" Hinata said, activating her Byakugan and attacking Sakura head on. Sakura was worrying about avoiding this when something stopped Hinata.

"What is this?!" Hinata asked looking at a red slimy tube that was holding her back.

"The heir to the Hyuuga clan should have a bit more control," came a voice. Sakura behind Hinata and saw a tall white haired man coming at them. Behind him was a toad and his tongue holding Hinata.

"Thank you, who are you?" Sakura asked.

"You can call me Jiraiya," Jiraiya said.

"Wait, Jiraiya, the legendary toad hermit and partner to Lady Tsunade?" Sakura asked.

"You know of me," Jiraiya said with a smile. He touched the tongue and it disappeared. He looked at Hinata. "I think you should go home and think on your actions," Jiraiya said, in a uncharacteristic voice. Hinata shook slightly from fear of Jiraiya's tone and she quickly ran off. Jiraiya smiled. "That voice always works," he said before looking at Sakura. "What's your name again?"

"Uh, Haruno Sakura," Sakura said.

"Nice to meet you, Sakura. May I see your stomach?" Jiraiya asked.

"What!? Why?" Sakura asked.

"Because Tsunade wants me to look at your seal Angelmaru used on you. I'm better in this area than either of my comrades," Jiraiya said.

"All right," Sakura said, lifting her shirt up.

"Now focus your chakra," Jiraiya said. Sakura did and Jiraiya examined the seal. "Hmm," Jiraiya said.

"Is something wrong?" Sakura asked.

1121221112121111122211211111211112112221.content:
"In away, yes," Jiraiya said. Sakura dropped her shirt.

"What is it? Am I going to be all right?" Sakura asked.

"That seal was a merging seal instead of a containment seal," Jiraiya said sitting down.

"What's the difference?" Sakura asked.

"The 4th Hokage used a containment seal to contain the Kyuubi within Naruto's body," Jiraiya said, "They are not meant to be one. A merging seal destroys one of the parts of it, either the host or what is sealed away."

"So I'm going to be destroyed and Angelmaru takes my body?" Sakura asked.

"Or Angelmaru's going to die and you get her powers," Jiraiya said, "What happened when she joined with you?"

"Well, I was in a forest with sakura flowers everywhere. She came out and we talked before I agreed to this," Sakura said, "When she started the joining, I lost sight of her. When I looked back, she had become a tree. Right after that I woke up."

"That isn't very clear either way," Jiraiya said, "Can you talk with her?"

"Yes," Sakura said.

"Then ask her and judge her response," Jiraiya said. Sakura nodded and closed her eyes.

"Angelmaru," she asked.

"Yes, Sakura?" Angelmaru answered.

"Which of us is going to be destroyed?" Sakura asked.

1121221112121111122211211111211112112221.content:
"Neither of us will be," Angelmaru replied.

"But I thought a merging seal would do that," Sakura asked.

"It is and it already happened," Angelmaru said, "My body was destroyed and I am part of your mind. You can hear my thoughts and I yours. To join with someone, some body must be sacrificed. I did that with mine to complete it. I can never be removed from you. We are one, but my voice and will are not able to affect you, so you are and will be in complete control."

"Then why did you say for me to ask you to grow people?" Sakura asked.

"So you would get a feeling for how to grow people," Angelmaru said, "Now my thoughts are hazy. I must rest."

"All right," Sakura said. She opened her eyes and told Jiraiya the news.

Find more men to grow
1121221112121111122211211111211112112221.content:
Out from the trees steps a disgruntled Kiba holding akamaru, the puppy was shaking from looking at the sheer size of the giants sakura created. "Hey Sakura, do you think me and Akamaru could get in on the action? Your power I hear only works on men, both me and Akamaru are ready!" Kiba was a little bit over-excited to be bigger. Akamaru just let out a happy bark and let his tail wag. "I don't know... Kiba has always been loyal to my knowledge, but he seems a bit eager to grow..." Thought sakura as she pondered his wish. "CMON Sakura! make him bigger! Kiba is trust-worthy I just know it! I want to see if your power works on dogs too! Just dont make them any bigger than me...." Naruto interjected, almost guessing sakura's thoughts. "Alrite, Naruto I'll leave this choice up to you. How tall should I make Kiba?" Sakura said.

"Naruto I want to be as big as you!" Kiba forced himself to say. "No way! I may let you grow and all but I'm still going to be the biggest shinobi around! Sakura, lets make kiba 13 feet tall, and akamaru proportional to that." Naruto made his decision. Even a massive 13 foot Kiba couldn't compare to him anyways. "Ok, Kiba I'm trusting you won't be a wrong choice here... Angelmaru, I wish Kiba was 13 feet tall and Akamaru was proportional to that!"

Kiba all of a sudden looked down and the ground was getting farther and farther away, his clothes ripped to shreds as he began to grow muscle all over his body. He flexed a bit and watched his new biceps grow into boulders on his arms and let his pecs bounce up and down. He stood there stark naked at 13 feet tall with a 6 foot tall akamaru to match. "That felt great!" Kiba said, looking over his new body ignoring the fact that all the other giants had kept their underwear on when they grew.

"Eww Kiba!" screamed sakura, at that height his underwear should've stretched out but not left his body. Even Narutos stayed on a he was bigger. "OOO sorry! Forgot my boxers today..." "I have a solution to this." whispered Angelmaru in Sakuras head. A grey sarong was conjured up over the lower half of kibas body, bearing the angelmaru symbol. "Well that works too" Said Kiba, kind of disappointed he didnt get to show off ALL of his new size to the village.
