1121221112121111122211211111211112112221.content:
"Well, I must go show Guy-sensei my new body," Lee said, "May your meeting go well." With that, he gives them his signature pose and runs off.

As he hit the tree line, a voice cried out, "Oh crap!"

"Sorry Shikamaru!" Lee yelled.

"What was that?" Shikamaru thought, "First I see a giant Kakashi carrying Tsunade and her assistant. Now a 12ft Rock Lee? This is too troublesome." But when he made it to the clearing, he was the equally-tall-to-Lee Sasuke, and the even taller Naruto. "Spoke to soon," Shikamaru said.

"Hey Shikamaru!" Naruto yelled as he approached.

"Idiot, our voices are naturally louder now. You don't have to yell so loudly," Sasuke said.

"I kind of need to agree with Sasuke there," Sakura told Naruto, who looked sad, "You need to learn to control your voice, especially if I make you bigger." Naruto's smile returned. Sasuke gave a worried shudder of a bigger Naruto.

"Wait, did you just say you could make Naruto bigger?" Shikamaru asked, looking at the 15ft blonde.

"Yep, not so much of a powerless ninja now?" Sakura asked.

"Oh, Shikamaru's true comment on Sakura when we went after Sasuke," Naruto realized in thought, "That's why she doesn't want want to make him bigger."

"So, how did gain this power?" Shikamaru asked.

"A demon bonded with me," Sakura answered, "Angelmaru."

"Kind of like you, Naruto?" Shikamaru asked.

"What do you mean?" Naruto asked in a worried voice.

"Come on, your comment to Gaara before the third exam, what you did during it, what you did when you fought Gaara," Shikamaru said counting off his reasons, "The nine-tails disappearing when you were just born and people calling you a monster when we were kids. I may be lazy, but not stupid."

"Damn, I didn't even think of those things," Sasuke thought.

"So, you figuring out Naruto's secret aside, do you want to become more powerful?" Sakura asked.

"Why would I?" Shikamaru asked, "It will probably just mean more missions to do."

"As I recall from the Forest of Death and your fights against Kin and Temari, you lack much physical strength. Normally, you're back up by Choji. But when you're alone, you suck," Sakura said.

"Your point?" Shikamaru asked.

"You could use some more power," Sakura said, "You're chakra levels will rise, while the cost per jutsu will remain. Most everything on you will become bigger and stronger."

"Most everything?" Shikamaru asked.

"Well, I haven't seen everything on any of these guys," Sakura admitted.

"Wow, so you're not a slut like Ino would of been in your place," Shikamaru said.

"So, do you want to grow bigger?" Sakura asks
1121221112121111122211211111211112112221.title: Shikamaru

choices: Kakashi appears
Someone else appears
1121221112121111122211211111211112112221.content:
"I assume that whether I want this or not, you're going to make me grow?" Shikamaru asked.

"Probably," Sakura admitted, "So, do you want it?"

"Fine, just don't make me taller than Naruto," Shikamaru said.

"Wasn't planning on it," Sakura thought.

"Angelmaru, make Shikamaru grow to Sasuke's height," Sakura invoked.

"So, when is this going to. ." Shikamaru started when he felt his clothes becoming tighter and tighter. "Should of changed removed the shoes," Shikamaru said. Finally, his feet broke free and he was quickly gaining height. His clothes started ripping quickly as his muscle was built up. When it all stopped, only his underwear was remaining, just barely hanging on. "That was interesting," Shikamaru thought, seeing he was looking Sasuke in the eyes.

"Nice work Sakura, you're getting the hang of it," Naruto said, kneeling down.

"Thanks Naruto," Sakura said, hopping on his shoulder. "How do you like the view?" Sakura asked the new giant.

"It's nice," Shikamaru said, "I can see what you meant by power. It feels good."

"Why did you make him as tall as me?" Sasuke asked.

"Would you prefer I shrink you?" Sakura asked.

"No, I just wanted to know," Sasuke said. Despite their difference in size, Sasuke, for the first time, feared Sakura.

"Because he can still move easily on the streets at this height, food won't be that bad a problem, and it's a good benchmark height," Sakura said.

"Well, I have a meeting to go to with my team for a mission," Shikamaru said looking at the clouds, he gave Sasuke a glance, "I'll be informing them on this. So, Ino might come hunting for you."

"Thanks," Sasuke said. Shikamaru gave a nod to Sakura and Naruto before going home for some clothes.

"So, where is Kakashi-sensei?" Naruto asked.

Sakura picks the group for her personal defense
1121221112121111122211211111211112112221.content:
As though to answer his question, Kakashi appeared before them.

"Alright, what did you want to ask us Kakashi-sensei?" Naruto asked.

"It's about Sakura. And her safety." Kakashi began.

Naruto laughed and said, "Come on Kakashi-sensei! Why would Sakura need to worry about her safety when I'm here to protect her?"

Sakura smiled and said, "I have to agree with Naruto. Who would want to hurt me anyway?"

Kakashi sighed and said, "Can't you think of anyone? Anyone who might want something from you."

Naruto and Sakura shook their heads but Sasuke answered Kakashi with one word, "Akatsuki."

Kakashi nodded and said, "They're currently looking for the tailed beasts and Angelmaru is one of them. I wouldn't be surprised if they were on their way now to find you."

Sakura looked pale at the thought. Sure, she could easily shrink the Akatsuki members (all of them being male) but where was the guarentee they wouldn't be able to sneak up on her? How much stronger was Naruto and Sasuke now? Stronger than the Akatsuki members? Who knew? Naruto wasn't looking worried. Only angry. Obviously the thought of Akatsuki coming after Sakura enraged him.

"What should we do Kakashi-sensei?" Sakura asked.

"We have to be prepared for their arrival first of all. I've already discussed this with LadyTsunade and she agrees that Sakura should never be left alone. Naruto shouldn't be either, but he's in a better position to protect himself. If they can, they won't miss an opportunity to capture Naruto as well. Both of you are Jinchuriki."

Sakura and Naruto nodded, agreeing to this plan.

"We also thought it would be smart to have our defenses increased. Therefore, Lady Tsunade would like you to choose a group of shinobi you trust and increase their size greatly. More so than Naruto even."

Naruto and Sakura both instantly started protesting. Kakashi stopped them with a raised hand and said, "This is neccesary to have a show of force if multiple members of Akatsuki arrive. It'll also force them to be more offensive. They're not fools, though, and will probably have at least one member sneaking into the village to quickly capture Sakura. Since she can't call up a physical manefestation of Angelmaru like Naruto can do with the Nine Tailed Fox, they'll believe her to be an easy target. Therefore you'll have a small group of bodyguards, no less than two shinobi, and no more than five. I'm going to assume Naruto and Sasuke will be part of that group."

Sakura nodded and Kakashi said, "Alright then, let's get started."
1121221112121111122211211111211112112221.title: Prepare for Akatsuki

choices: Who makes the cut for Sakura's body guards?
Who's on boarder patrol?
1121221112121111122211211111211112112221.content:
"All right," Sakura said, "Besides Naruto and Sasuke, who else would be good?" She was walking between Kakashi and Sasuke, with Naruto at her side.

"You already got Lee and Shikamaru big," Naruto said.

"Hyuuga Negi would also be a god choice," Sasuke said, "The byakugan's power would be useful here."

"Hey Kakashi-sensei, do you know if my other sensei is in town?" Naruto asked.

"Other sensei?" Sasuke thought. "The one who trained you between the exams?" Sasuke asked.

"Ebisu might be," Kakashi said.

"No, the perverted one who writes your favorite book," Naruto replied. Sakura and Sasuke looked a bit shocked at that statement: The one who helped make Naruto strong was a perverted writer.

"Oh, you mean Jiraiya-sama," Kakashi said.

"Yeah," Naruto said.

"He may be," Kakashi said.

"Who's he?" Sakura asked.

"Someone who made Itachi run away during his fight," Naruto replied, "He was a teammate to Orochimaru and Granny Tsunade under the Third. If he's even normal size, he'll be helpful." Sasuke recalled the man Naruto spoke of.

"So he's the one who saved Naruto then," Sasuke realized.

"Good choices," Kakashi said, "And remember not to make them too big. If one of them is fast, they'll be hard to catch."

"Where are we headed right now?" Sakura asked.

"To see Lady Tsunade and inform her of your choices," Kakashi replied as they came to the village.

High above, a clay bird was soring. A blond haired man with mouths on his hands smiled sadistically.

"Hmm," Deidara said watching the group through his eyepiece, "This looks like it's going to be a bang." With his surveillance over, he flew back to where his team mates are.

"Sasori-sama, Kisame, Itachi," Deidara said.

"You're late. What did you find?" Sasori said.

"Both the targets are together," Deidara said, "Itachi's target is about 15 feet tall. His brother is close to 12. Kakashi Hatake is 8 ft. They were walking in a guard pose, with the pink girl in the middle."

"If they are walking like that, then they know we're coming," Itachi said, "We can't assume they'll remain this size."

"So, what do you plan?" Sasori asked.

"I know the layout the best," Itachi said, "I'll sneak in while you three make a front assault."

"The girl isn't your target," Sasori said.

"Yeah, hmm," Deidara said, "I think my art will work well on them, no matter the size."

"If they know we're coming, then they will likely make an enlarged attack force to stop us," Itachi said, "Both of your art forms will be needed there."

"I like this plan," Kisame said, "And I'll be able to kill that green beast."
1121221112121111122211211111211112112221.title: Sakura picks the group for her personal defense

choices: "I want Neji, Shikamaru, and Jiraiya."
pick another 3 men
1121221112121111122211211111211112112221.content:
On top of Lady Tsunade's office, a meeting was called.

"You all understand what your job is?" Tsunade asked the men before her, "If you aren't a chunnin or above and not chosen to help protect Sakura Haruno, you are assigned to guard the civilians in the monument."

"Why would these people want Sakura?" Kiba asked Shino and Neji.

"Have you been blind to what's been happening?" Neji asked him.

"What?" Kiba asked.

"Naruto Uzamaki, Sasuke Uchiha, and Rock Lee are all over 10 feet tall," Shino said.

"Wow, Sakura did that?" Kiba asked.

"It seems so," Neji replied. In another part of this group, the jounin-senseis were talking.

"I just couldn't believe it when my youthful Lee grew like that," Guy said.

"I know the feeling," Asuma said, "It was the same with Shikamaru. His appearence nearly made Ino faint. Being told Sasuke was like him did. Choji just laughed at them."

"You're lucky you'll be able to fight them," Kurenia said, "I recall the last time I fought Itachi. It wasn't good."

"I'll be careful," Asuma said.

"Yeah, don't worry Kurenia," Anko said, "They'll be fine." And in a low whisper added, "Plus, if you're lucky, Asuma will be able to keep his enlarged form. And let me say on Iruka, somethings grow a little out of proportion." Kurenia quickly blushed and looked at Asuma.

Near Tsunade, Jiraiya had a serious look on his face. "We'll need to be extra careful," he said, "Itachi can make a fire that will even destroy a giant shinobi."

"I take it, you want to help protect Sakura then?" Tsunade asked.

"Not just her, Naruto as well," Jiraiya said, "Losing him was hard. Losing his son. . . Let's just say I don't want to deal with that pain." He then began scanning with his telescope.

"I understand really well," Tsunade said, "See them yet?"

"Yeah, they'll be here in less than a minute," Jiraiya said, moving the telescope around, "Iruka, Rock Lee, and that Nara boy will also be here with in a minute."

True to his prediction, Iruka's group landed on the rooftop. Those who hadn't seen these giants before, backed up. Some of the women present didn't, enjoying the sights. But if they were shocked before, when Naruto's party landed, with Sakura in Kakashi's arms, that was nothing to the even taller Naruto.

"Wow," Kiba said, "This is insane."

"I know," Neji said.

"All right, Sakura, have you decided on who is your bodyguard group?" Tsunade asked.
1121221112121111122211211111211112112221.title: Who makes the cut for Sakura's body guards?

choices: "I want Kiba, Iruka, and Asuma
She picks a different three.
1121221112121111122211211111211112112221.content:
Sakura didn't hesitate. She simply said, "I want Neji, Shikamaru, and Jiraiya."

Tsunade nodded and said, "Excellent. Along with Naruto and Sasuke that makes five. One more than I had hoped, but we shouldn't be short handed. Now go ahead and change them as you like, but don't make them too big. Remember, we're also developing a defense force."

Sakura nodded and said, "Angelmaru make Neji ten feet tall."

Sakura didn't make Neji as tall as Sasuke and Lee, for Lee's sake. Within seconds Kiba jumped back from Neji's growing body, bursting his clothes and leaving him in his underwear.

As Neji pulled on a spare, larger, outfit (which he had been advised to bring) Sakura turned to Jiraiya. He held up a hand and said, "Don't even think about it. I'm happy just the way I am."

"Come on Pervy Sage!" Naruto yelled. "Don't you want to be stronger?"

"I'm strong enough Naruto." Jiraiya replied. "Besides, we need someone at normal size to be speedy and at least somewhat unnoticable."

"He has a point Naruto." Sasuke said.

Tsunade clapped her hands and said, "Alright. That just leaves the defense force. Before you choose, we don't want a large number of gigantic shinobi as they could prove to be as bad for the village as Akatsuki. After Sakura chooses three shinobi, her and her bodyguards will walk through the village and wait for the inevitable sneak attack. No doubt the main force of the Akatsuki will attack before that. It'll be up to the defense force to hold back or eliminate the attacking Akatsuki members with the rest of the shinobi acting as back up. Everyone got that?"

"Yes Lady Hokage!" Everyone chorused back.

Tsunade grinned and said, "Then let's get started! Sakura, who do you want in the defense force?"
1121221112121111122211211111211112112221.title: Three More Chosen

choices: Follow Team Sakura and meet up with Itach
Follow Defensive team and meet up with Kisame, Deidara, and Sasori
1121221112121111122211211111211112112221.content:
"I was thinking of Iruka-sensei, Kiba and Asuma-sensei working with Kakashi-sensei," Sakura said. Tsunade nodded in agreement.

"You know, this girl is pretty bright," Jiraiya noted to Tsunade, "Naruto might have some competition for Hokage."

"Good choices," Tsunade said.

"Angelmaru, please make Kiba 10 ft tall, and are you capable of making male animals bigger?" Sakura asked.

"Yes," Angelmaru said, "That's how Ky-kun got so big."

"Then keep Akamaru proportionate to Kiba's size," Sakura said. And with that command, Kiba also ripped out of his clothing.

"Wow, that's a rush," Kiba noted.

"Aren't you going to put some bigger clothes on?" Neji asked him.

"Didn't bring any," Kiba said, holding the tiny Akamaru in his hands before Akamaru grew so, to Kiba, he was back to normal size.

Sakura then looked over where the sensei's were. Guy was looking expectedly for some growth. "Hell no," Sakura thought, "Lee's bad enough." Her eyes then came to Asuma. "Please make Asuma-sensei 10 ft tall Angelmaru," Sakura invoked.

"She's looking over here," Kurenia muttered, "I wonder which one she's going to make grow." She looked quickly at Asuma as he ripped through his clothes in his growth.

"That was interesting," Asuma said.

"All right, the primary defense force is decided," Tsunade said, "Kakashi will lead Kiba Inuzuka, Iruka Umino, and Asuma Sabutori there. ANBU black ops will be the second line with the rest of you being the third line, unless you're protecting the citizens in the monument. Neji Hyuuga and Shikamaru Nara will help guard Sakura, so you two stay here. Everyone else dismissed." With that, the defense force left.

"I feel so small," Kakashi thought at being the shortest of his team, "That hasn't happened since my early days on Minato-sensei's team."

Shikamaru and Neji walked over to Sakura and the others.

"All right," Tsunade said, "You are to personally guard Sakura Haruno and Naruto from being captured by the Akatsuki."

"Hey, I can't move my body right now," Naruto said.

"That's because Jiraiya is hiding in your shadow," Tsunade said, "They won't be able to see him, so they won't count on his presence." She turned to Sasuke. "If your brother is one of the attackers of your group, do not let your want for revenge take over. Your mission is to protect your friend. If you end up fighting and killing him, so be it. But do not instigate the fight. Shikamaru is your leader until Jiraiya comes back out."

"Great, I knew I'd have to be on more dangerous missions if I was grown," Shikamaru said.

"You would of been chosen anyway, so at least you got to decide to grow on your own," Sakura said.

"So, where do you want me to take them?" Shikamaru asked Tsunade.

"Within a mile of the village," Tsunade said.

"All right," Shikamaru said before thinking. "All right, we'll have a Naruto Shadow clone in front. I'll be next. Then Sakura with the real Naruto. Then Neji, using his Byakugan to watch our back, and Sasuke in the back."

"I like it," Naruto said.

"All right, go," Tsunade said before the remaining shinobi left and she herself went to wait with the ANBU line.
1121221112121111122211211111211112112221.title: "I want Kiba, Iruka, and Asuma

Jiraiya attacks Itachi now
1121221112121111122211211111211112112221.content:
Team Sakura was mving at blinding speeds, due to their immense size. Sakura was being held by Naruto as they ran.

"I feel so helpless among these giants," Sakura thought, "I don't know if I could shrink the enemy if they attack. What if I mess up?"

"You won't," Angelmaru said, "You have a great deal of potential within you, you only need to believe in the power you have and what I've given you." Sakura smiled at this.

"What is it Sakura?" Naruto asked.

"I'm just a little worried about this mission," Sakura said.

"Don't be," Naruto said.

"Actually, she should," Shikamaru called back, "Unless you really think being this much bigger will be much help in the long run against some of the strongest missing-ninja in all the hidden villages. I doubt it. People of that level are not only strong but smart."

"That's why I asked you to be one of my guards," Sakura said. Shikamaru was about to reply when Neji called out.

"Watch out in front!" he yelled. The front Naruto Shadow clone looked back at Neji. But as he did, he was destroyed by a kunia to the skull. Shikamaru and Naruto stopped and looked at Itachi Uchiha standing before them, his sharigan active.

"Great," Shikamaru thought, glancing at Naruto's shadow, "When will that pervert come out?" Neji and Sasuke caught up.

"Don't look in his eyes," Sasuke said, "He'll catch you in a genjutsu."

"Foolish brother," Itachi said, "I don't need that technique to kill you and take the girl. Even with your larger size, you still lack hatred."

"Behind us!" Neji yelled as another Itachi used the Great Fireball Jutsu. While dodging, Shikamaru used his Shadow Possesion Jutsu and caught the two Itachis.

"Nice work Shikamaru!" Naruto yelled. But his yell was cut short as both Itachis disappeared.

"They were both Shadow clones?" Naruto yelled.

"No surprise," Shikamaru said, "Sasuke, Neji, either of you see anything?"

"I can't find him," Neji said.

"That was the real him before," Sasuke said, "I saw a blur of hand movements right before we dodged the fire attack. That's when he switched out."

"Great," Shikamaru said.

"Just hand over the girl and Naruto," Itachi's monotone voice came from nowhere, "The rerst of you will be allowed to live."

"And miss a chance to kill you?" Sasuke asked. Then Itachi landed right next to them.

"I doubt you could," Itachi said. Sasuke's eyes widen in shock.

"Run, it's a bomb!" He yelled, retreating back as Shikamaru, Neji and Naruto with Sakura backed off as well. With in a moment after, the Itachi Shadow clone blew up, and smoke covered the area.

"Crap, Naruto, hold on to Sakura really tightly!" Shikamaru yelled.

"Oh no," Sakura thought.
1121221112121111122211211111211112112221.title: Fighting Itachi

choices: Get Jiraya out to see if he's grown from this
Keep moving, and run into someone in woods
1121221112121111122211211111211112112221.content:
As Naruto and Sakura moved backwards, trying to escape the smoke screen, Sakura felt a normal size hand take her wrist.

"Naruto!" Sakura thought and screamed. Naruto raised his other hand to hit Itachi, but he was gone.

"It seems a new plan is in order," Itachi thought, before leaving.

"He's gone," Neji said.

"Great," Sasuke said with a mixture of delight and anger.

"Wow, I feel funny," Naruto said holding Sakura to his body.

"Is Naruto moving me up his body?" Sakura thought. But she soon realized she was getting closer to the others eye level. With the sound of Naruto's pants ripping off, she knew what happened.

"Great," Shikamaru said quietly to Neji and Sasuke, "Now Naruto's even bigger."

"At least this explains why Itachi fled," Neji said. Sasuke nodded in agreement as the three of them watched Naruto grow higher and higher. When he finally stopped, Sakura was standing in the palm of his right hand.

"Thanks Sakura!" he said in a low voice.

"Welcome," Sakura said. "Angelmaru, why did you do that?" she asked her demon.

"I didn't," Angelmaru said, "With your desire to be protected by Naruto, you made him grow by tapping into my power without invoking me."

"I can do that without asking you?" Sakura asked.

"When I've been bonded long enough with a person, and they have excellent control of chakra, then yes," Angelmaru said.

"So, what do we do now?" Naruto asked Shikamaru.
1121221112121111122211211111211112112221.title: Sakura accidentally makes Naruto even bigger, 2...

choices: Kabuto, and he wants to help?
The Sand Siblings
1121221112121111122211211111211112112221.content:
"We keep moving," Shikamaru said, "Naruto, keep a good hold on Sakura. Itachi might come back with reinforcements."

"Right," Naruto yelled.

"Someones coming towards us!" Neji said.

"Who is it?" Shikamaru asked.

"It's . . ." Neji started
1121221112121111122211211111211112112221.title: Keep moving, and run into someone in woods

choices: Sasuke won't allow it.  He wants to kill Itachi.
Sakura wants to shrink Itachi so he can be tortured.  Sasuke likes this idea
1121221112121111122211211111211112112221.content:
Sakura felt Itachi coming at her and Naruto. Naruto had risen his other hand in front of Sakura to help protect her.

"Useless," Itachi said appearing before them. His eyes locking in on Naruto's.

"Oh no, I can't look away!" Naruto said. But a sudden attack made Itachi look down quickly. Jiraiya just came out of Naruto's shadow, wielding the Rasengan. Jiraiya hit Itachi dead on and the missing-ninja flew backwards into a tree.

"I was wondering when you'd come out," Shikamaru said holding Itachi with his shadow.

"I was waiting for an opportune moment," Jiraiya said, "Now hold him tight, you two. I'm going to kill him." Neji and Shikamaru held on to Itachi, not looking at his head.

"Wait," came a voice behind Jiraiya.
1121221112121111122211211111211112112221.title: Jiraiya attacks Itachi now

choices: Following this team,
Check in on the front lines
1121221112121111122211211111211112112221.content:
Jiraiya looked behind him and at Sakura. "Why? He's too dangerous to keep around to try and interrogate?" Jiraiya asked.

"And besides, I want to kill Itachi," Sasuke said, coming forward.

"But there is a way to hold him captive," Sakura said, raising her hand, "I could shrink him to an inch tall and we take him that way." The guys exchanged glances and each saw a hint of a sadistic smile in her face. Naruto was oblivious.

"I like that," Sasuke said, "Do it."

"I couldn't stop you if I tried, right?" Jiraiya asked.

"Probably not," Sakura said, walking over to Shikamaru and Neji. She waved her hand over Itachi and his body began to shrink. Soon he was only an inch tall, and nude. Sakura picked him up. Behind her, Jiraiya knelt down.

"Summoning!" he said, calling out a toad. "Listen, I want you to take Itachi back to Tsunade. Don't eat him. Inform her what we did and we're on the move again." The toad croaked in response and opened his mouth. Sakura tossed Itachi and walked back to Naruto. The toad croaked again and left.

"All right, let's get moving," Jiraiya commanded. The ninja nodded and they went off.
1121221112121111122211211111211112112221.title: Sakura wants to shrink Itachi so he can be tort...

choices: The head of another village ninja growing in the forest?
Sakura's good looks?
112122111212111112221121112.content:
"Ha Got'ya" Naruto yelled as he stood over his defeated opponent.
Rock Lee layed defeated on the ground, he knew he was beat but he decided he was going out with style.
"I'm sorry Sakura I have failed" He said but made sure he turned to look at her face from the ground and flashed his trademark sparkling smile.
Sakura from instinct looked grossed out and embarssed but suddenly gave him a slight smile back, after all this was a muscle hunk. The last thing Rock Lee saw was Sakura's smile as he passed out.
"I told ya I'd win!" Naruto said intterupting the moment. Naruto started to gloat for Sakura now and was about to say that he finnaly belived that she was really Sakura, but was distracted by what was taking place on the ground where Rock Lee was laying.
Rock Lee's buff body was now shrinking back to it's orginal size. Not only this but blue chakra was flowing out of Rock Lee's body and into Naruto's.
Sakura watched as the chakra began to fill Naruto's body with energy.
"All Right! This is what I call a great prize for winning!"
Naruto said as he felt his body "pumping up" even larger, he felt himself gain about one more foot. Sakura watched as Naruto flexed his right arm and smiled at Sakura. Sakura stood hypnotized before him when her "inner-self" gave her a slap to the forehead and yelled "Hey stupid, wake up! Act like you don't care, Don't make yourself look easy to impress!"
It was hard not to though, as the image of Naruto growing even buffer was making her hot.
"Watch this!" Naruto teased as on his arm and began to flex his bicep. This caused the muscle to grow thicker and bigger, the harder he flexed. The muscle near strained his tight orange suit even more so than before. Fortunately Naruto rememberd how hard it was to find clothes and stopped flexing before his muscles tore his clothes.
Sakura near fainted on the spot, but once agin her inner Sakura came to rescure her.
"Chya! Go over and say something!" Sakura followed the instructions and walked up to Naruto who was to busy gloating to himself now.
"I thought I was big before but now I'm invincible!" He continued on while trying out his new size.
"Hey Naruto..." Sakura interrupted "Congradulations on your victory, even though it wasn't really neccary" Sakura managed to squeak out while just sounding a little attracted in her voice.
"Yeah did you see.." Naruto began to say. But he was now distracted by something..
112122111212111112221121112.title: What was it?

choices: Tsunade looking for the strongest man date.
Orichimaru looking to cause chaos in the village.
1121221112121111122211211121.content:
Naruto looked off into the distance. He couldn't belive his eyes. He thought he was seeing ANOTHER fellow ninja growing up to just under his chin, off in the horizon.
"What is it?" Sakura asked
"I think I see another giant off in the distance..." Naruto said and began to head off towards the new challlenger.
"Another Giant? How are all of these boy's growing?" Sakura thought... Then the idea if the new giantwas a buff Sauske and mabey he had ripped his clothes... she squeeled at the thought and quickly followed after Naruto.


******************Meanwhile******************************

Someone had found another an exact copy of the "growth scrool" Naruto had found. Who is it and what are they using it for?
1121221112121111122211211121.title: A New Challanger! and a Back Story

choices: Naruto and Sakura find out who was growing
In another part of the village, one of the other starts growing
11212211121211111222112111212.content:
As Naruto ran off with Sakura close behind, they were unaware they were being watched from a shadowy figure in the treetops. As soon as they were gone, he jumped down and laughed to himself.

"My plan is already working. How foolish these Leaf shinobi are."

Suddenly, another ninja appeared behind the first carrying a scroll.

"Lord Orochimaru, I've returned." Kabuto said.

Orochimaru turned and saw him carrying the scroll. "I thought I told you to deliver that to the Hyuga manor."

"It wouldn't have done any good." he replied. "Neji Hyuga is currently outside the village on a solo mission."

Orochimaru smiled and said, "No matter. The other pieces are already in place."

He grabbed the scroll and set it on fire until it was nothing more than ash. Kabuto pushed his glasses up and said, "What exactly is your plan Lord Orochimaru? Making the Leaf ninja so much bigger and powerful seems counteractive to you desire to destroy the Leaf Village."

Orochimaru laughed and said, "These are no ordinary scrolls Kabuto. Not only do they contain crystalized chakra but they are imbued with a jutsu that increases one's body and power to great extents. But I have embedded a piece of my own chakra inside each scroll. As the Leaf ninja grow, their desire to grow more will increase until they are all fighting each other wildly. And with each defeat, the victor only grows bigger and stronger. Soon, only one will be left standing, with not only the full power of the jutsu but a substantial dose of my own chakra. Manipulating this chakra, I intend to take control of the last standing giant and use him to crush the Leaf Village once and for all!"

Kabuto smiled and said, "Very clever Lord Orochimaru. But why not simply take the body as your own?"

Orochimaru turned away from him and said, "A body of that size would be far too impractical for my own desires. Too clumsy...too large to perform the delicate tasks that lay ahead..."

Kabuto nodded and said, "I only delivered one of the scrolls to Rock Lee. Who else besides Naruto received one?"

Orochimaru listed the names off, "Shino Aburame, Shikamaru Nara, Kiba Inuzaka, Choji Akimichi, Sasuke Uchiha, and the teachers, Asuma, Kakashi, and Iruka. A visiting Gaara was also targeted."

Kabuto was impressed by the sheer number of shinobi targeted. Their fighting alone could be enough to destroy the village. The only question remained...who would come out on top?
11212211121211111222112111212.title: Orochimaru's Destruction of the Leaf

choices: Shikamaru catches up with Naruto and forces him to fight
Naruto saw another giant ninja, this one bigger than Shikamaru!
112122111212111112221121112121.content:
Soon Naruto and Sakura made it to another clearing where they found out who was growing. It was Shikamaru. He was slightly smaller than Naruto in height and a little less then him in muscle. His undershirt had ripped completely with his vest valiantly clinging on. His pants had been reduced to shorts while his sandals were entirely ripped off. He turned to the pair and said, "Oh, so you too huh? What a pain."

"What do you mean, me too? What's going on here?" Naruto asked.

Shikamaru stepped aside and revealed an unconcious Shino. If he was standing he would be comparable to Naruto in both size and muscle. His coat was all but destroyed, the sleeves ripped open from his massive biceps and the front ripped in half revealing his deep six pack and gigantic pecs. His legs had done much the same to his pants that Shikamaru's had done to his and his feet were bare.

"What happened out here?" Sakura asked.

"Beats me." Shikamaru said. "I was just minding my own business when I was suddenly attacked by this guy. I only just managed to knock him out before you two showed up."

"First Naruto, then Lee, now Shino and Shikamaru." Sakura listed. "Why is this happening?!?"

"Yeah! Talk about unfair! I was the first one to start growing! This is my thing!" Naruto announced pointing at Shikamaru angrily.

Before Shikamaru could say anything else, they were all distracted by Shino glowing blue. They watched as his body deflated back down to it's original size all that impressive muscle and height leaving him. Naruto and Sakura knew what would happen next and watched as the blue light engulfed Shikamaru. As soon as the blue light cleared Shikamaru began to grow. His muscles swelled as his overall height increased. Naruto took a half step backward, surprised at how much Shikamaru was growing. His biceps swelled, ripping apart the sleeves of his coat, his abs crunched and released and were soon joined by another row making an eight pack. His shoulders grew wider tearing whatever was left of his jacket apart, the material floating to the ground. His shorts looked like they were painted on his massive thighs. His feet plowed through the ground as they lengthened. Soon, Shikamaru was twenty five feet tall, ten feet taller than Naruto, and casting his shadow over both Naruto and Sakura. They both quickly stepped out of it. Shikamaru seemed nonplussed as he looked over his new body from his huge pecs to his wide back. He turned to Naruto and a strange expression overcame his face. He took a step forward. They took a step back.

"I don't know why, but I want to fight you Naruto." Shikamaru said. "Whether you want to or not!"

And that was that. Naruto and Sakura turned and ran as fast as they could Shikamaru in hot pursuit.

"And now we're being attacked by Shikamaru!" Sakura yelled as she jumped through the trees above Naruto. The tree branches couldn't exactly support his weight. "Naruto, how did you start growing? That might be our only clue to figure out what's going on!"

"I just found a scroll abandoned on a pedastal in the yard of a broken down house!" Naruto said. "When I opened it, all this dust fell on me and I started growing!"

"Hmmm...That sounds familiar...But where have I heard of it before?" Sakura thought.

Her musings were cut short however as Naruto yelled out, "Look!"

What was it?
112122111212111112221121112121.title: Shikamaru Wants to Fight Naruto

choices: The plan works, Naruto and Sakura get away.
The fight ends too quickly, the big get bigger.
1121221112121111122211211121212.content:
The sight ahead made Sakura gasp in shock, it was yet ANOTHER giant and this one was even bigger then Shikamaru! But what was truly scary to her was who the giant was, Gaara.

He wasn't the same kill-everything-that-lives monster that he was during the chuunin exam, but the man was still scary.

Unfortunately for Naruto this left him trapped between a rock and a hard place. The huge Shikamaru was coming up behind them while the giant Gaara was ahead. While Naruto was worrying about what to do, and how he could track down someone at least on his own level so that HE could get big enough to handle these oversize ninjas, Sakura was thinking about a plan and came up with one that at least would buy them some time.

"Naurto, stop running!"

"What!?"

"If Gaara and Shikamaru see each other they will probably start fighting, that will let us get away and find that scroll."

Naruto gulped nervously, but he knew Sakura was right, so once he saw Gaara approaching he stopped and waited for Shikamaru to catch up.
1121221112121111122211211121212.title: Naruto saw another giant ninja, this one bigger...

choices: Yes. Sakura analyzes the scroll
No. Another ninja attacks Naruto
11212211121211111222112111212121.content:
It took all the willpower that Sakura and Naruto possessed to hold still in front of the forty foot Gaara, his eyes focusing in on Naruto. His gourd at first glance appeared to be missing, but upon closer inspection was found hanging down from his hip. Naruto looked behind him anxiously waiting for Shikamaru. Gaara didn't say anything as his prey held still before him. Instead, he took a step forward, the ground shaking violently under his enormous weight. Sakura was knocked onto her butt, Naruto barely able to keep his feet. Gaara then raised a hand and brought it down clearly intending to smash Naruto into unconsciousness or worse. Naruto steadied himself, intending to fight even if it was hopeless, when Shikamaru finally caught up, his own arms up to stop Gaara. Shikamaru smiled and said, "I don't think so. He's mine."

Gaara's eyes narrowed and he said, "Your a better prize anyway."

"And that's our cue to leave!" Naruto said, grabbing Sakura.

Within seconds, Sakura and Naruto had put quite a bit of distance from the other giant ninja both of which had started battling the other. Sakura glanced back and saw that Shikamaru had grabbed Gaara in his shadow. The strain showing on Shikamaru's face made it evident that he probably wouldn't be able to hold it for long. In her own opinion, Gaara was going to come out on top of this fight. She bent down from her position on Naruto's shoulder and said, "We'd better hurry Naruto! That fight isn't going to last much longer!"

Naruto nodded and increased his speed, dashing between the trees with such speed that the scenery became a blur. Within minutes, the village was rising into view. Naruto slowed down as he approached the outer limits of the village, looking for the abandoned lot where the scroll was. The only question was, would he find it?
11212211121211111222112111212121.title: Naruto and Sakura's Great Escape

choices: Kakashi is 12 feet tall and in control
He's 20 feet tall.  Naruto needs the rest of the dust to win
112122111212111112221121112121211.content:
"Here's the place Sakura-chan," Naruto said, placing her down.

"Thanks," Sakura said as they began looking around. As they looked they could hear fighting elsewhere in the village.

"Sakura, I'm worried," Naruto said, "To stop Gaara now, I'll need to get bigger." Sakura looked at him and saw he was worried.

"Are you worried you'd act like Shikamaru?" Sakura asked.

"Yeah," Naruto said, "I mean he and Gaara, their only obsessed with obtaining power now. Completely different from before." Sakura made a gasp followed by another one. "What is it?" Naruto asked.

"Well, for one, the wanting of power sounds like Orochimaru's game plan. Also, you just stepped on the scroll," Sakura said, moving towards Naruto. Naruto lifted his leg and Sakura picked up the scroll and looked at it.

"You're right," Naruto said, thinking on the Orochimaru part. "So, what does the scroll say?" On the scroll, she found some remaining dust from before. She read over some of the words on the scroll and was made a realization.

"This dust will only affect men," Sakura said, "We need someone else to look this over. Oh where is Kakashi-sensei when you need him?"

"Right behind you," a voice behind them said. Both turned and saw Kakashi, but was he normal?
112122111212111112221121112121211.title: Realizing what's up

choices: Gaara
Iruka
1121221112121111122211211121212111.content:
Sakura and Naruto jumped at the sound of their sensei's voice. Normally they'd be happy to see him, but with what was going on today, they were leery of him. Their fears were unfounded though as Kakashi smiled down at Sakura (and up at Naruto). They both sighed and Sakura said, "Kakashi-sensei, it's so good to see you!"

Kakashi clapped Sakura on the shoulder and said, "Don't worry. I'm still in control, though I'm not sure how all this came about."

Sakura held out the scroll and said, "Their was dust in this scroll that made Naruto grow. I'm assuming that these scrolls affected everyone else as well."

Kakashi opened the scroll and said, "Hmm...yes, this is the same as the scroll I got and the same one Asuma had on him."

"Asuma?" Naruto said. "You mean he's in on this too?"

"Not anymore." Kakashi said. "We were having a practice match together when these scrolls were delivered to us. We were told they were mission scrolls so we both opened them. Naturally we were covered in dust. We thought it was a prank and didn't think too much of it. We just rolled them up and stored them with our other scrolls. We started fighting again and I won. Well...I'm sure you can guess what happened next."

Naruto said, "So you got Asuma-sensei's size huh? We're going to need more help than just us if we're going to take down Gaara and Shikamaru."

Sakura shook her head and said, "That'll just make things worse. You don't want to end up like them do you? Only wanting power?"

"That brings up a good point Sakura." Kakashi said. "This whole thing is obviously a well orchestrated plan set into motion by someone outside the village."

"That's what we thought!" Naruto said. "Do you think Orochimaru is behind this?"

"It's possible." Kakashi said. "This is certainly something he might try, with his knowledge of forbidden jutsu. The only question is, how many ninja are involved in this?"

"The scroll only affects men." Sakura said. "So that means quite a few people may be involved."

"And that brings us to a paradox." Kakashi said. "In order to fight the giant ninja we'll need to get fight and get bigger. But if we do that, we'll eventually lose sight of our mission and ourselves. So what do we do?"

Naruto slammed his fist into his open palm. "Well that's obvious! We have to fight and get stronger! I won't let some snake like Orochimaru take control of me!"

Both Sakura and Kakashi looked skeptical at Naruto's enthusiasm. Unfortunately, they didn't have much time to say anything else as an enormous foot crashed down near them. All three ninja looked up and up into the face of an enormous
1121221112121111122211211121212111.title: Still the Same Kakashi

choices: A 20 foot Sasuke
Naruto, with Shadow Clones
11212211121211111222112111212121112.content:
"Hello," Iruka said to the trio. Iruka now stood close to 50ft tall.

"Oh great," Kakashi thought.

"Iruka-sensei, what happened?" Naruto yelled.

"I found a scroll and it made me larger. I felt stronger than I had ever been before. I came across Kiba and Choji and defeated them, taking their power. Now I want Kakashi's and your's," Iruka said, smiling down.

"Iruka-sensei, this is a trap by Orochimaru!" Sakura yelled.

"You think I care?" Ituka asked, "I just want to get bigger!" Suddenly he was attacked from behind by some force. Kakashi and Sakura's eyes opened as they saw Iruka fall down into the open lot. Iruka got up and looked at his attacker and chuckled.

Who attacked Iruka?
11212211121211111222112111212121112.title: The other teacher

choices: Kakashi
Naruto
112122111212111112221121112121211121.content:
As Iruka smiled condescendingly down upon his attacker, Naruto, Kakashi, and Sakura got a look at the attacking shinobi. It was Sasuke! A twenty foot tall Sasuke no less! Iruka shook his head and said, "You might have been able to beat me once Sasuke, but not anymore."

Sasuke smirked and said, "You're my next opponent? This won't take long."

With nothing left to say to each other, Sasuke and Iruka began fighting furiously. Sasuke made a few quick hand signs and breathed fire in a steady stream out against Iruka, engulfing him in a huge fireball. When the fire cleared Iruka was still standing with barely a mark on his huge body. Not bothering with jutsu, Iruka pulled his leg back and smashed Sasuke with a powerful kick. Sasuke went flying back crashing through various buildings to land in a hurt heap fifty feet away. Iruka walked after him, enjoying his new power as he easily dominated Sasuke. Kakashi, Naruto, and Sakura quickly followed, worrying about the outcome. If Sasuke managed to win this fight he'd no doubt come after Kakashi and Naruto next making him nearly unstoppable. On the other hand, if Iruka won he'd no doubt come after Kakashi and Naruto next making him more powerful than even Sasuke would become. Not to mention Gaara and Shikamaru were still out there somewhere, though by now one of them would've won the fight they started. They didn't know it, but only Sasuke, Naruto, Shikamaru, Gaara, Kakashi, and Iruka were left. Once one of them came out on top, Orochimaru would make his move.

As Iruka approached Sasuke, Sasuke leapt up and attacked Iruka, driving a fist into his face. Iruka grabbed Sasuke's arms and held them out, bringing his knee up repeatedly into Sasuke's stomach. Sasuke wouldn't be able to take much more abuse. The size difference was too great. If someone didn't do something then Iruka was sure to win. Thinking fast, one of the smaller ninja made a move and attacked Sasuke effectively stealing the win from Iruka. But who was it?
112122111212111112221121112121211121.title: Sasuke Attacks

choices: Naruto is becoming corrupted
Naruto remains himself, too stupid to be anything else
1121221112121111122211211121212111212.content:
"You bastard," was all Sasuke had to say before he collapsed from Naruto's powerful punch.

"Naruto!" Sakura yelled, now being held and protected by Kakashi.

"I hope this works," Kakashi said as they watched Naruto absorb Sasuke's height. The fifteen foot Naruto rose higher and higher until he was close to thirty five feet tall. He glared at Iruka.

"Nice deception Naruto," Iruka said, "Now you want to my power, don't you?" Kakashi and Sakura looked at Naruto, sad and believed he was lost

"No," Naruto said.

"You want all of our strength?" Iruka asked.

"No," Naruto said.

"Then why did you defeat Sasuke?" Iruka asked.

"So I can turn everyone in this village back to normal! I swore to be the next Hokage and if that means I need to sacrifice myself like the Fourth and Third to become a giant monster, I will!" Naruto yelled, leaping forward and creating a hundred shadow clones. Even for the giant Iruka, this would be a hassle.

"He's resisting the pull," Kakashi thought, "Well I'll be. But how? I know he has more chakra than most of the shinobi, even me. He also continually fights the domination of the Kyuubi. Could these be enough for him to completely fight Orochimaru's spell?"

As Kakashi thought, the Naruto barrage was doing damage to Iruka. But with a surprise attack from both sides, the battle turned.

"Rasengan!" two giant Naruto's yelled slamming into the chest and back of Iruka. The combination of the two moves was enough to defeat him. Naruto's clones vanished as he walked over to his friends and sat down from exhaustion.

"Naruto, are you all right?" Sakura asked.

"Yeah Sakura, I'm fine," Naruto said, smiling his normal smile. Kakashi looked relieved, until Naruto started growing larger and larger.

Will Naruto be start turning to the side of power? Or can he remain true to himself?
1121221112121111122211211121212111212.title: Naruto's inner strength

choices: Naruto, Kakashi and Sakura start looking for the last one standing
Gaara, having won his fight with Shikamaru, comes after Naruto!
11212211121211111222112111212121112121.content:
As Naruto grew larger and larger he felt a strange numbing sensation in his head. As though from far away, he heard what sounded like laughter...

Naruto shook his head and the numbness died down. Little did he know, Orochimaru's chakra was slowly building up inside his body, taking over little by little. Naruto was able to resist this far and would no doubt keep resisting, but one more dose of Orochimaru's dark chakra could be enough to send him over to Orochimaru's control. The growth started slowing down when Naruto was about seventy five feet tall. Even sitting he was taller than some of the smaller buildings. The growth he sustained from Iruka gave him enough energy to stand and look around the village. While this sudden change was amazing (Naruto had never felt stronger) he knew it served a dark purpose. The end was close. Only Kakashi, Naruto, Gaara, and Shikamaru remained. And surely either Gaara or Shikamaru was defeated. Soon, the final showdown would be at hand. Naruto, after making sure Gaara was nowhere to be found at the moment, knelt down and offered his palm to Kakashi and Sakura. Both of the ninja climbed on and Naruto brought the pair to his face.

"Okay, now what Kakashi-sensei?" Naruto asked quietly.

Naruto's voice was still quite rumbling even when he was just whispering, his breath washing over both ninja in his palm. Kakashi thought about the question posed to him and said, "I suppose we have to find the others like us and fight them. I don't think Orochimaru will make a move until there's only one of us left. We have to make sure that you, Naruto, are the one left since you seem to have the best control over Orochimaru's chakra."

As Kakashi said this, Naruto felt a twinging pain in the back of his mind, the far off laughter seeming to get closer. Would Naruto be able to take it? This was already starting to be too much. Naruto shook his head again and steeled his will. He had to resist. There was no question about it. If he didn't, the village would be in big trouble. Konoha had already sustained a lot of damage as it was.
11212211121211111222112111212121112121.title: A Voice in the Dark...Laughing

choices: Do you hear the laughing?"
Let's fight."
112122111212111112221121112121211121212.content:
"So he did win after all," Gaara thought, as he walked away from Shikamaru's body. It was worn, small, but still alive. In the middle of the village, he saw Naruto standing tall. Gaara smiled a queer smile as he knew he'd get another chance at Naruto. "Naruto Uzumaki," Gaara called out.

Naruto turned and saw Gaara coming after him. "He's just bigger than me," Naruto thought, "But that doesn't matter. I took down Iruka despite our height difference. But to be safe, maybe I should beat Kakashi." But he heard the laughter get stronger and it strengthened his resolve against it. "No, I can't."

"Naruto just looked at me," Kakashi thought, "He seems to be fighting this with everything." Kakashi lookied around and saw multiple ANBU's rescuing civilians and other non-giant ninja. Kakashi turned to Sakura on his shoulder. "Sakura, I need to go tell Lord Hokage what is happening," Kakashi said, "I need you to stay with Naruto. Be his link to his old self. If he wins, help him stay true to him."

"Right," Sakura said. Kakashi looked up at Naruto.

"Naruto!" he called. Naruto looked back at Kakashi. "There is no way I can help here. We need to find Orochimaru to save you from his control. I'm leaving Sakura in your hands and giving you the mission to protect her with your life!" Naruto's eyes opened wide.

"He's giving me something to keep hold of to remember myself," Naruto thought. "I promise you Kakashi I won't let Sakura be harmed, even if it's by me," Naruto said. Kakashi smiled and vanished, leaving Sakura on his massive hand alone.

"I trust you Naruto," Sakura said. Naruto would of replied, but Gaara arrived and Naruto looked at him.

"Naruto Uzumaki," Gaara said again, " . . .
112122111212111112221121112121211121212.title: Kakashi's mission

choices: Switch over to Kakashi leading a team to track down Orochimaru
Gaara and Naruto decided to leave the village, so it isn't destroyed.
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.content:
"Do you hear the laughing?" Gaara asked. Naruto looked at Gaara.

"You mean a cold laugh when ever you think of victory?" Naruto asked.

"So we're the only ones," Gaara said, "The shadow boy from before said all he felt was an urge, nothing more. This voice, do you know who it belongs to?"

"I'm sure it's Orochimaru," Naruto said, "He wanted us to fight to destroy Konoha and become his slave."

"I thought as much," Gaara said, "When I started growing, I felt it inside me like I feel the Shukaku. It's pull is weaker than my demon's."

"Yeah, mine too," Naruto said. Sakura looked at the two giants.

"They're not fighting!" she thought happily, "And Naruto has a demon with in him? Well if it helps them fight the control, who cares?" "What will you two do now?" Sakura asked, hoping for a peaceful solution.

"Part of me wants to fight you again Naruto," Gaara said, "But I don't want to kill without reason. Seeking power and revenge aren't worth it."

"I agree," Naruto said, "It's tempting, really tempting. But we need to find away to release this control first."

"I agree," Gaara said.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------

Elsewhere, Orochimaru was watching the two. "Hmm, why aren't they fighting?" he asked aloud.

"Could it be they both carry demons and it grants them more resistance?" Kabuto asked.

"Most likely. I'll just need to find someone to force them to fight," Orochimaru said, laughing again.
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.title: Meeting of the Cursed

choices: Half an hour later, Kakashi finds Orochimaru
Naruto and Gaara start getting stronger urges to fight
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.content:
As Naruto and Gaara came to terms, Kakashi had arrived at the Hokage Mansion. Tsunade and Shizune had been shocked to see Kakashi, but he quickly explained the situation. Tsunade's look of surprise turned to one of grim realization.

"That does sound like something Orochimaru would try." Tsunade said. "I'm going to have you assemble a team to search for Orochimaru Kakashi. It's imperative we find him and stop him from continuing this plan."

Kakashi nodded and said, "I'll do the best I can."

Tsunade looked stern and said, "No, trying isn't good enough. If Orochimaru succeeds here the village won't stand much of a chance. If worst came to worse we'd have to kill remaining giant. That itself would no doubt cost many lives, much like the battle with the Nine Tailed Fox all those years ago. Either way, it would be a tragedy for the Leaf Village. I don't know if the village can keep bouncing back from all these attacks and emotional blows."

Kakashi understood. "I'll go assemble the Anbu Black Ops. We'll start looking for Orochimaru within the hour depending on how long it takes to rally them all."

Tsunade nodded and said, "Then go!"

After Kakashi left Tsunade turned to Shizune and said, "Shizune I need you to go out and find Jiraiya. We might be needing him before this is over. He shouldn't be too far away."

Shizune nodded and left. Near the outskirts of the village, Orochimaru and Kabuto watched the events of the village. Orochimaru smiled as he saw Kakashi dart around the village, looking for the Anbu Black Ops. He turned to Kabuto and said, "Kakashi, Gaara, and Naruto are the only ones left. Since Naruto and Gaara refuse to fight, Kakashi is our prime objective."

Orochimaru pulled out a scroll identical to the one that Naruto and the others had received and opened it, drawing a brush across the paper, making a series of symbols and shapes. He quickly finished drawing and placed the scroll on the ground. He made a series of hand signs and slammed his palm down on top of the scroll.

"Forbidden Jutsu! Mind Corruption: Grow!"

Dust suddenly erupted around Orochimaru's palm littering the scroll and covering most of the symbols. Orochimaru, already showing the strain of using this jutsu so many times to make many other scrolls, stood back up and made the same hand signs, adding three at the end. He held his palm over the dust covered scroll, focusing on the center of it.

"Forbidden Jutsu! Mind Corruption: Chakra Imprint!"

A purple pulse of chakra flowed out of Orochimaru's hand and into the scroll, causing it to briefly glow purple. When the glow faded Orochimaru carefully rolled the scroll up and sealed it. "In half an hour the scroll will be ready. We have to mask our presence until that time."

Kabuto nodded and made a few hand signs, "Earth Style! Diving Concealment Jutsu!"

Kabuto and Orochimaru both sunk into the ground, awaiting the time to spring the trap on Kakashi.
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.title: Kakashi is the Target

choices: All three grow
Two became tainted
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.content:
"I can't believe it," Jiraiya said after Shizune briefed him, after dragging him out of the "hotel" he was at. They were now on the move back to Konoha. "Orochimaru has gone too far. We'll have to stop him."

"That's why Kakashi was sent with some ANBU to find him," Shizune said. Jiraiya looked at Shizune.

"Is Tsunade insane? Kakashi's been corrupted. If he gets close to Orochimaru, he might be tricked into a trap!" Jiraiya said, before increasing his speed ten fold. Shizune could barely keep up.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -----------------------------

Naruto led Gaara and carried Sakura to the training field. Even if they fought, there would be no damage to the village. Both Shinobi were in meditative positions, repressing the darkness now with in them.

"The silence is almost scary," Sakura thought as she sat on Naruto's shoulder, "At least Naruto's kept his promise so far. But for how much longer?"

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------

"Kakashi, we found it," Pankun yelled. The nin-dog sniffed a bit more. "Yep Orochimaru and that kid Kabuto," Pankun said when Kakashi appeared.

"All right, go and tell Tsunade-sama," Kakashi said. Pankun nodded and Kakashi followed another dog on the scent's trail, while Pankun raced back to Tsunade.

After a few minutes, Kakashi came to where the trail ended. "Hmm, I think this might be a trap," Kakashi said.

"And you fell right into it," Kabuto said appearing with Orochimaru.

"Hello Kakashi, I have a gift for you," Orochimaru said, holding the scroll up, ready to open it on him. He started pealing the seal so the crystals would hit Kakashi.

"I don't think so," Kakashi said, before whistling and his reamining nin-dogs attacked. Surprised, Orochimaru lost the scroll and it went into the air opened. The dust flew everywhere and there was the sound of coughing.

Who was affected by this scroll?
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.title: Half an hour later, Kakashi finds Orochimaru

choices: Kakashi beats Kabuto and comes after Gaara and Naruto
Jiraiya and Tsunade discuss a plan to stop Orochimaru
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.content:
As soon as Orochimaru felt the ninja dogs let go, he jumped backward, avoiding the falling dust completely. He saw both Kakashi and Kabuto coughing, the dust settling equally between the two. Orochimaru smiled evilly. He watched as Kabuto and Kakashi both started growing bigger and bigger, their muscles expanding. Kabuto stopped growing at about twenty feet tall, while Kakashi grew bigger and bigger until he reached thirty five feet tall! As soon as they were both done growing, they started fighting. Orochimaru laughed as he watched them.

"Well, this is something I hadn't planned. But it seems to be working out in my favor."

As Orochimaru watched the two titans fight, Tsunade was looking through her medical books trying to find something that could help reverse whatever jutsu Orochimaru had used. Kakashi had given her a small amount of the dust found leftover in Naruto's scroll and she was analyzing it carefully. Since she was a woman she had no fear of handling the dust. She was starting to get frustrated when Pakkun leaped through her window, landing on her desk and scattering some papers. Tsunade glared at the little dog and said, "This had better be good Pakkun."

Pakkun nodded and said, "Kakashi found Orochimaru. He sent me to tell you."

Tsunade gathered some papers together and said, "Very well. Thank you Pakkun."

Pakkun jumped out the window to return to Kakashi. Tsunade dropped the papers into the wastebasket next to her desk and said, "None of this is going to work!"

She unrolled a scroll and put the dust onto it. She made three hand signs and held them over the dust. The area around her hands started glowing. Within seconds, several symbols had lit up. Tsunade looked them over and said, "It couldn't be..."

She pulled down a book quickly flipped through it. When she found the page she was looking for, she ran her finger down a column. She stopped about halfway down the page and read quickly, her eyes darting left and right. She stopped and whispered, "So it is. Mind Corruption Jutsu! I have to get ready."

Tsunade closed the book and ran out of her office, heading downstairs in the Hokage Mansion to get a few things done before Orochimaru attacked.

Nearing the village, Jiraiya and Tsunade spotted Gaara and Naruto sitting quietly in the practice field. Jiraiya shook his head and said, "I can't believe Orochimaru could do something like this. Pick up the pace Shizune! I need to talk to Tsunade!"

Shizune groaned and tired to push herself even further as they made their way to the Hokage Mansion.
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.title: Tsunade Searches for a Cure

choices: Tsunade and Jiraiya appear
Orochimaru appears, trying to get the two to fight.
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.content:
Kabuto flew back. "Crap, how can he beat me so easily?" Kabuto thought.

"Simple, you looked in my sharigan eye," Kakashi said before punching Kabuto once more in the head. Kabuto was knocked out and Kakashi laughed. "This power is amazing. I need more. And I know one knucklehead who won't suspect a thing," Kakashi said to himself as he grew to 60 feet tall. He started towards the pair.

After a few minutes, Kakashi spotted Gaara and Naruto, both huge. "They didn't fight? Unexpected, but better for me," Kakashi said, closing in on them.

"Hey guys, somethings' coming through the woods!" Sakura yelled as trees fell down as something raced through them.

"Who is it?" Gaara asked, rising to his full height. Naruto followed suit.

"It's Kakashi!" Naruto said, "And he's huge now!" Kakashi lept out of the forest, but didn't attack.

"Oh thank goodness I found you two," Kakashi said.

"Sensei, what happened?" Sakura called down to him.

"Orochimaru, he made another giant. It was Kabuto. He had Kabuto fight me, while he left with a sack of more scrolls. We need to get moving and stop him!" Kakashi explained.

"That's horrible!" Sakura said, fuming. Naruto also got angry.

"We have to get going!" Naruto said.

"No," Gaara said, "He's been tainted." Naruto looked at Gaara.

"What do you mean? Yeah, he grew, but that doesn't mean," Naruto started.

"His eyes are different. Remember when you and the shadow ninja confronted me in the hospital? I saw his eyes then. Today, his were glazed over. This ninja has the same glaze," Gaara explained. Naruto and Sakura looked at Kakashi's right eye and noticed the same glaze.

"Crap!" Kakashi thought, "I'll need to attack. Wait, I can't move!" Kakashi looked down and saw sand all around him.

"At my size controlling the sand is easier than breathing," Gaara said, "I won't defeat you. But you won't win either." Slowly the sand started to encase Kakashi in a cocoon of sand.

"You bastard! Fight me like a ninja you monster!" Kakashi screamed as sand covered his sharigan eye and he fell backwards on the ground, unable to move.

"Great, what do we do now?" Naruto asked.
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.title: Eyes can tell

choices: Gaara loses control and releases Kakashi, fighting both him and Naruto
Orochimaru uses Sakura as a hostage to force the giants to fight
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.content:
Before either of the two giants could think of anything to do, the evil laughter they'd been hearing in their heads came from around their feet. Both of them looked down to see Orochimaru standing between them, arms crossed. Naruto's look of surprise quickly turned to anger. He raised his foot and was about to bring it down on Orochimaru when Orochimaru jumped back. Orochimaru grinned crazily up at Naruto and began to make hand signs. Within seconds Orochimaru's hands were spread out palms pointing at Gaara.

"Forbidden Jutsu! Mind Corruption: Assault!"

Gaara suddenly clutched his head in pain as Orochimaru's jutsu assaulted his mind. Naruto looked alarmed and asked, "Gaara? Are you okay?"

"My mind...is being invaded...by Orochimaru!" Gaara managed to gasp out.

Naruto grabbed Gaara's shoulders and shook him, "Fight it! Come on Gaara! You've got to fight it!"

Orochimaru laughed quietly and said, "Don't be a fool. One of you was doomed to be my slave from the start. Pity. I really thought someone like Kakashi or Sasuke would come out on top."

He made the hand signs again, his chakra rushing out into another jutsu.

"Forbidden Jutsu! Mind Corruption: Assault!"

Gaara fell to his knees in pain, grasping his head. He wouldn't be able to hold out for much longer...

As Gaara and Naruto fought off Orochimaru's forbidden jutsu, Jiraiya was just joining Tsunade in the basement of the Hokage Mansion.

"Well Tsunade?" Jiraiya asked as soon as he hit the bottom stair. "Got any ideas?"

"As a matter of fact, I do." Tsunade said. "I remember reading about another case like this. Of course, there wasn't any giants involved. Back then, a powerful ninja used a jutsu that was able to control the minds of other ninja by implanting a piece of his chakra inside their bodies. That's likely what Orochimaru is doing."

"But what about the growing?" Shizune said.

"That's something Orochimaru developed on his own. The jutsu crystallizes chakra and stimulates from within the ninja's growth patterns, causing them to expand. By mixing these two jutsu together he's able to expand certain ninja and control their minds at the same time. Think about it. If one piece of Orochimaru's chakra can start taking control, just enough to want to force the ninja to keep growing, then imagine what a bigger dose of his chakra could do. As the ninja fight each other, they start absorbing more and more of his chakra. By the time only one giant remains..."

"He'll be nothing more than Orochimaru's puppet." Jiraiya said in disgust.

"Exactly." Tsunade said opening a scroll. "Which is why we have to dilute Orochimaru's chakra. The growth problem can be fixed after that."

Tsunade held out the scroll and explained her plan. It would be risky since in order to purify the ninja's chakra, they'd have to be extremely close. Not only that, it would take awhile to perform. On top of all that, they still had to deal with Orochimaru. Things were starting to look grim.
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.title: Orochimaru appears, trying to get the two to fi...

choices: Yes
No, Naruto breaks a promise
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.content:
Gaara screamed in internal pain and conflict. "I want to fight Naruto . . . .No he is a friend. He helped us before. I can't fight him. . . . .I was going to eventually. . . . .but only after I truly changed when we were both the kages of our villages," Gaara yelled to himself aloud. Orochimaru was enjoying the show. Naruto and Sakura were just worried about Gaara losing. But Gaara suddenly stopped moving when he said the last sentence. "Naruto, do you accept a challenge from me?" he asked. Orochimaru's smile grew.

Though he was doing his best to fight it, the words escaped Naruto, "What sort of challenge?" he asked.

"It has become my desire to become the Kazekage of my village. When I am that and you are Hokage, will you accept my challenge for a rematch?" Gaara asked, sounding strained.

"Of course," Naruto said, smiling. He moved to shake Gaara's massive hand when something shot from no where and grabbed Sakura. In a second she was at Orochimaru's side. He was laughing.

"How sweet," he said, "The two demon boys are playing nice, even like this." He liked Sakura's cheek.

"Let her go Orochimaru!" Naruto yelled.

"Stay calm Naruto," Gaara said.

"I'll release her, I promise, once one of you defeats the other," Orochimaru said. Naruto was now the one shaking. He swore to protect Sakura with his life, but also swore to fight Gaara only after they were both Kages. He never liked breaking promises.

"What do I do?" Naruto thought.

Elsewhere, Tsunade and Jiraiya were racing to the training field. "You're assistant is slow Tsunade," Jiraiya said.

"I know," Tsunade said, "Come on Shizune!" Shizune was breathing heavily.

"Sorry," she said pushing herself harder.

Will these heroes make it in time?
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.title: The deal

choices: Naruto wins the fight
Gaara wins the fight
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.content:
Orochimaru laughed softly at Naruto's indecision. He pulled out a kunai and held it to Sakura's throat. She had been struggling before, but now she held still, the cold metal pressing against her neck. Naruto saw this and growled in anger and frustration. Orochimaru called out to Naruto, "If you keep stalling I'll kill her here."

He pressed the kunai against Sakura's throat and drew a small drop of bood. She gasped as she felt the slight prick and Naruto shouted, "Don't you dare hurt her!"

Orochimaru laughed again and said, "Then do as I say. Fight Gaara and the winner will get Kakashi. Then I'll release the girl and you or the other will be mine."

Naruto scanned the area around the training field, hoping to see reinforcements or something. Surely Tsunade had some kind of plan...

Orochimaru was starting to lose his patience. "Listen very carefully boy. Even if someone comes to rescue you, what will it matter? I'm the only one who can break the jutsu over you and I'm not about to do that. If someone so much as shows up here and you haven't started fighting, I'll kill her! What's your choice? Fight or let her die!"

Naruto knew he had no choice. If he didn't start fighting, Orochimaru was going to kill Sakura. If anyone tried to help him Orochimaru would kill Sakura. The only way to save Sakura was to fight Gaara. Once one of them won, Sakura would be safe. If he, Naruto, won, could he continue fighting off Orochimaru's control? He would probably be able to do it better than Gaara could at this moment. Plus, if he did win, and help was on the way, then he only had to hold out long enough for the help to come. He turned to Gaara and said, "I'm sorry Gaara. But I'm going to have to break my promise. We have to fight now, or Sakura will..."

"I understand Naruto Uzumaki." Gaara said. "Then our fight is moved from then, to now. Let's make it a fight worth remembering."

Naruto nodded and said, "I won't hold back no matter what!"

And with that, Naruto ran towards Gaara who started building a sand defense against him. Orochimaru smiled and said, "Soon, my plan will come to its final stage."

Sakura slumped in Orochimaru's grip watching Gaara and Naruto fight. "This isn't right." She thought. "This isn't how it should be!"

But she was powerless in the terrible ninja's grip. She could only watch.

As the fight raged, Jiraiya, Tsunade, and Shizune were just arriving. They quickly took stock of the situation from Naruto and Gaara fighting, to Orochimaru holding Sakura captive. Shizune turned to the other two and said, "What should we do?"

Tsunade frowned and said, "It looks like Orochimaru's holding Sakura captive. Interfering without thinking could get her killed."

"Well we can't just sit here and watch!" Jiraiya said. "We have to do something!"

Tsunade smacked Jiraiya and said, "Use your head for once! We just have to wait until Orochimaru releases Sakura. He's obviously using her as a bargaining chip to make Naruto and Gaara fight."

"And what if he doesn't release her?" Jiraiya said grimly.

"Then we move in and attack." Tsunade said, equally grimly.
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.title: Orochimaru's Will

choices: Naruto collapses to his knees trying to fight the urge
Orochimaru escapes with Kakashi's help
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.content:
Though his body was much larger, Gaara's sand proved a good defense against Naruto's powerful punches. Naruto's speed kept him from getting caught by Gaara's sand.

"This isn't good. If I lose that other ninja will be free," Gaara thought, as another punch was blocked, "Naruto's improved a great deal. But he is always stronger when protecting someone."

"That sand is powerful," Naruto thought, "I'll need to take him down like I took down Iruka." Naruto jumped back and made eight shadow clones. Four went and charged Gaara, forcing his defenses to work over time while the other four made two rasegans.

"My god, even if he barely touches Gaara, the damage of one will be extreme," Jiraiya said quietly, "Both hitting might make enough of an explosion for Sakura to escape."

"Then get ready in case that happens," Tsunade ordered.

Orochimaru smiled evilly. "I had nearly forgotten that boy knows the 4th Hokage's move," he said, "At that size, he could destroy the half the Leaf Village in one strike."

"Naruto," Sakura thought, shedding some tears.

Gaara was watching the four as they attacked. "There!" he thought when all four clones left something open and Gaara pierced eat with sand spikes. They disappeared. "What now?" Gaara thought when he heard running steps towards him. He saw Naruto charging head on with some chakra in his hand. Gaara moved to step when he felt something hit him in the backside. He turned his head and saw the real Naruto with a rasengan. The force of it had pierced his sand and hit him square in the back. Gaara started to fall forward when the second one hit his chest. As a result, Gaara flew into the sky. As he did, he began to shrink, while Naruto climbed upwards to 160 feet tall. While this happened, three other things happened with in seconds.

First, the concussion from the strikes made Orochimaru flinch enough to cover his ears. Sakura also covered his ears. The moment this happened, Jiraiya raced forward and picked up Sakura while Tsunade landed a punch on his back, breaking the spine and sending him into Naruto's huge leg.

But unfortunately, the moment Gaara lost, his sand prison on Kakashi fell and the copy ninja stood up, wanting to fight.

What will happen next?
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.title: The strongest of them all

choices: Stay with Tsunade as she tries to remove Orochimaru's chakra
Follow Orochimaru as he prepares Kakashi to attack the village
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.content:
Tsunade quickly looked around, spotting Sakura being safely carried away by Jiraiya. Turning to Naruto she saw Orochimaru's body laying on Naruto's enormous foot, broken. She quickly made her way over to him and grabbed his arm, dragging him upward. At least, that's what she intended to do. As soon as her fist closed over Orochimaru's wrist, the skin broke and the hand fell limply off. Tsunade looked down in shock and saw that Orochimaru had used his body swapping technique. She had simply destroyed an empty shell. She turned and searched for Orochimaru, wondering where he had escaped too. She turned to Kakashi and saw Orochimaru standing on Kakashi's shoulder, his hands blurring in his haste in making hand signs.

"Forbidden Jutsu! Mind Corruption: Control!"

He slammed both palms onto Kakashi's shoulder forcing control over the copy ninja. Kakashi lost the will to fight and prepared to follow Orochimaru's orders. Orochimaru, starting to sweat from the effort this was costing him, smiled at Tsunade and said, "You're as strong as ever Tsunade. But I'm afraid I can't stay and chat. It seems my plan hit a snag and I must correct it."

He laughed softly and made a few hand signs. Kakashi suddenly turned and sped away, disappearing into the distance before any one had time to react. Tsunade clenched her fist in frustration and said, "We almost had him! I should have known he'd try something like this."

Jiraiya set Sakura down next to Tsunade and said, "I think we have bigger issues to deal with."

He pointed up and Tsunade remembered she was standing on Naruto's foot. He was looked down at them with a pained expression on his face. It had obviously just gotten increasingly more difficult to subdue Orochimaru's influence over him. Sakura looked worried and said, "You can help him right Lady Hokage?"

Tsunade looked torn. She turned to Sakura and said, "Yes I could. I was planning on doing it after we captured Orochimaru. Now I'm not so sure."

"What do you mean?" Sakura said. "You have to do something!"

"Orochimaru is still on the loose! And worse, he still has Kakashi under his influence. We might need someone like Naruto to defend ourselves with. If I undo the jutsu Orochimaru has on him, he'll return to normal and we'll be helpless when Orochimaru returns!" Tsunade shouted, losing in patience in the desperation of the moment.

Sakura looked crestfallen and stayed quiet. She knew what she wanted. She wanted Naruto back to normal. She wanted everyone that had been changed to be changed back. But was that the right choice for the village? Would Naruto want to be changed back if it meant the destruction of the village? All these thoughts raced through her head. She didn't know what to think or do anymore. Jiraiya suddenly said, "Can't you just remove Orochimaru's chakra? That way, he'll still be the same size and Orochimaru won't be able to manipulate him."

Tsunade thought about that. "The jutsu works so that Orochimaru can increase the size of a chosen ninja and manipulate them with his chakra. That links both aspects of the jutsu together. I might be able to untangle them and just purify Orochimaru's chakra, freeing Naruto. But it's risky. There's no guarantee that the whole thing won't come undone. Trying to force one side of the jutsu might put too much strain on Naruto as well."

Jiraiya looked grim. "I still think it's the best course of action. For Naruto and the village."

Tsunade nodded and said, "I think so too. Alright then! I'm going to need all your help for this!"

Tsunade instructed Shizune, Sakura, and Jiraiya into a circle around Naruto who she instructed to lay down. He did so, his face still contorted with effort. Tsunade turned to Sakura and shouted, "All you have to do Sakura is channel your chakra with all of ours. We'll need you to support our efforts."

"You got it!" Sakura shouted, holding out her hands.

Tsunade turned to Shizune and said, "Perform this like a standard procedure Shizune! I'll handle the complicated part!"

"Right Lady Tsunade!" Shizune said, holding our her hands as well.

Tsunade then turned to Jiraiya and said, "Get ready with a scroll capable of sealing chakra! When I remove Orochimaru's chakra its of vital importance that it's sealed before it can do any damage!"

"You got it!" Jiraiya shouted, pulling out a scroll and drawing on it.

Tsunade turned to Naruto and said, "Alright! Let's begin!"
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.title: An Escape and an Operation

choices: He's back to normal, but still 160 ft tall
He shrinks to the height before beating Gaara, but free of Orochimaru
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.content:
Tsunade pressed her hands on Naruto's massive chest. She waited for Shizune to finish the preparations. She saw in the corner of her eyes, Shinue nodded. "Now Sakura," Tsunade commanded.

"Right," Sakura said pressing her hands down next to Tsunade. Shizune also put her hands down.
