"Now for the fun," Tsunade said as the three females' chakra went into the giant's body. Tsunade closed her eyes and focused on finding every remnant of Orochimaru inside Naruto. "Wait, what is this?" Tsunade thought as she remembered a conversation she had with Jiraiya after she returned as Hokage.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------------

"So Naruto's tapped the Kyuubi then?" Tsunade asked.

"Yeah, I taught him how. He also seemed to recognize when its chakra was active. Naruto called his chakra a blue color and the red was the Kyuubi's," Jiraiya said.

"Interesting," Tsunade replied.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -----------------------

Now inside Naruto, Tsunade was sensing three different chakras. But what she found interesting was the Kyuubi's red chakra was destroying Orochimaru's little by little. Thinking on it, it made sense to Tsunade. The Kyuubi wanted freedom. With Naruto he could have some. But with Orochimaru, he wouldn't have any control. "This is how he was able to fight it for so long," Tsunade thought pushing her chakra force to help remove Orochimaru's chakra that was too deeply in bedded into Naruto for the Kyuubi. Tsunade was very thankful for the demon as if any piece broke off as she was collecting the mass, it would destroy it. After ten minutes, she had finally amassed all of it. "Jiraiya!" Tsunade yelled.

"Ready!" Jiraiya yelled. Jiraiya watched as Tsunade pulled out a large mass of purple chakra. It took on the shape of a person, but was missing some parts. Tsunade shot it at Jiraiya and he sealed it in a scroll. Shizune and Sakura fell to their chests from exhaustion.

"The operation was a success, I hope," Tsunade said.

"You hope?" Sakura asked.

"I told you from the start, it was dangerous," Tsunade said, sitting down. "I need a drink."

"I'll buy you ten if this worked," Jiraiya said. All four looked down at Naruto when Gaara finally came down and landed on Jiraiya. Gaara was still alive, thanks in part to his sand slowing his fall and in part to Jiraiya. The shock of the impact made Naruto stir.

What happens to Naruto?

What happened
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.title: Blue, Red, and Purple

choices: Jiraiya prepares Naruto any way he can
Orochimaru attacks! Kakashi is huge!
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.content:
Naruto slowly sat up, dumping the entire group on his chest onto his lap. He grabbed his head the ache that had been filling it subsiding. The evil laughter that had been plaguing him had finally been silenced. Naruto slowly smiled, happy that he was free. Suddenly he jumped up and shouted, "I'm free! Yahoo!"

He threw his hands in the air and cheered, laughing, happy that he was finally free of Orochimaru's influence. Unfortunately, he had no idea that he had just dumped his friends onto the ground. Tsunade, already at the end of her rope due to the worry and the stress of the operation and desperate for a drink, lost her temper and punched Naruto in the side of the foot. Naruto felt the bone crushing punch as little more than a poke due to his enormous size and the new toughness of his skin and the density of his muscles. He looked down and grinned. "Hey Grandma Tsunade!"

Tsunade blew up at Naruto, "You idiot! I have the decency to free you from enslavement and all the thanks I get is getting dumped on the ground like bad rice!"

Naruto knelt down and said, "Hey you don't have to get so snarky lady!"

Sakura said, "I'm so glad to see you're normal again Naruto!"

Naruto gave Sakura the thumbs up and said, "It's great to be back Sakura! Where's Gaara and Kakashi-sensei? Are they okay?"

Jiraiya looked uncomfortable and said, "Gaara's right here. He's fine, just tired. As for Kakashi...Orochimaru escaped with him."

"WHAT?!?!?" Naruto thundered. He slammed a fist into the ground, knocking everyone onto their butts. "HOW DID HE GET AWAY?!?!?"

Tsunade got back onto her feet and shouted, "We did what we could Naruto! There's a reason you're still a giant! We came close to capturing Orochimaru, but he was one step ahead of this time. He's bound to come back with Kakashi to attack the village and when he does we'll be ready for him!"

Naruto nodded and said, "It doesn't seem right, but if I have to beat down Kakashi-sensei then I will!"

Jiraiya laid Gaara down and said, "Alright, but you'll have to be ready. Orochimaru isn't going to leave anything to chance this time. We might have one big Kakashi to deal with when he comes back."

Naruto nodded again and said, "It doesn't matter how big he is! I'll still beat him!"

Tsunade sighed and said, "Alright then. We'd better get back to the village and prepare a defensive force. But before that I want every ninja that was affected by the scrolls to be retrieved and treated for any injuries."

"I'll go find them Lady Tsunade!" Shizune said running off.

Tsunade turned to Jiraiya and said, "You stay with Naruto and help him prepare for Kakashi and Orochimaru."

Jiraiya nodded and said, "I don't know how much I can help him, but I'll do what I can."

Tsunade turned to Sakura and said, "You're coming with me Sakura. We can't risk you being used as a pawn again so you'll have to stay with me at all times. While Naruto fights Kakashi, we're going to try and take down Orochimaru. Naruto can't get any bigger, but Kakashi still could."

Sakura nodded and said, "I'll do what I can. Just ask!"

Tsunade nodded and said, "Then follow me to the village. We have work to do."
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.title: Naruto's Back to Normal! Sort of...

choices: Orocimaru attacks
Nothing happens for the rest of the day and evening, leaving Naruto hungry
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.content:
Naruto was sitting on the ground so Jiraiya wouldn't have to crane his neck up very much.

"All right Naruto, your opponent will be Kakashi," Jiraiya said, "There are probably a few things you need to know first. One, as he's a sharigan user, he'll track your every movement. But if you can cover the eye, he can't track. Even if it's cloth thin, it will be enough."

"Right," Naruto said.

"Second, he was the 4th Hokage's student. As a result, he knows the rasengan as well," Jiraiya said.

"Not good," Naruto said, thinking on how powerful his was when he struck Gaara.

"Agreed. Third, we don't know what Orochimaru might do to him, so treat him as your enemy until the fight's over. Even if you have to kill him. Understand?" Jiraiya said in a tone Naruto had rarely heard him speak in, "Considering your resistance to Orochimaru, it would be better for you to grow larger than try to heal Kakashi in his current state."

"I understand," Naruto said.

"Good, now I want you to try something a little radical," Jiraiya said.

"You know me and radical," Naruto said, smiling.

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Elsewhere, Tsunade and Sakura were in Tsunade's office. "Where is it?" Tsunade said, looking through piles of paper work.

"Where's what?" Sakura asked.

"This," Tsunade said, pulling out a bottle of sake and drinking it straight.

"We were here for sake!?" Sakura asked.

"And some papers on those who were exposed to the crystals," Tsunade said, pulling the papers from the top of the pile. "Now to examine the patients," Tsunade said, leaving for the hospital where Shizune took the former giants.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------------------

Jiraiya smiled as he looked at the Naruto before him. He was the same size he was before fighting Gaara. "Nice idea, making multi-size shadow clones," Jiraiya thought as the main Naruto hid underground. Jiraiya's plan was to draw Kakashi back here to fight.

Elsewhere in the woods away from the leaf Village, Orochimaru was resting. "This set back will be perfect if I can infect that Kyuubi-boy with my control by letting him win against Kakashi," Orochimaru thought as the now 100 foot tall Kakashi just stared into nothing. "It'll be win-win either way," Orochimaru said laughing.
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.title: Multi-size Narutos?

choices: Naruto wins
Kakashi wins
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.content:
Orochimaru was nearly finished replenishing his chakra. Soon he would be recovered enough to mount his final attack on Konoha. His puppet, Kakashi was staring into space, no orders having been given to him by Orochimaru. Orochimaru knew Naruto would fight Kakashi just as he knew that Tsunade had probably found a way to excise his chakra. Naruto had shown an amazing ability to resist Orochimaru's chakra but that was when the chakra was being assimilated in his body slowly. How much resistance would he mount when an enormous dose of Orochimaru's chakra was absorbed in his body? With Naruto under his control, Orochimaru would finally realize his ambition to destroy the Hidden Leaf Village! He opened his eyes and stood up from his position on Kakashi's shoulder, his hands already moving in the by now familiar hand signs.

"Forbidden Jutsu! Mind Corruption: Battle!"

Kakashi's eyes suddenly lit up and he got to his feet, moving towards Konoha. He was determined to find Naruto, his last remaining opponent, and finish him off once and for all! Orochimaru laughed as they moved, knowing it would all be over soon enough...

As Kakashi and Orochimaru made their way back into the Leaf Village, Tsunade was finishing examining Choji, her last patient of the former giants. Sakura had been watching her, taking note of all her techniques, hoping to learn as much as she could from them. Tsunade checked all the charts she had regarding the patients and said, "This is odd..."

Sakura asked, "What's odd?"

Tsunade handed Sakura a few of the charts and said, "There seems to be a strange abnormality in all the ninja."

"What kind of abnormality?" Sakura asked, looking the charts over.

"I'm not sure. It seems that they're bodies have all been changed permanently by the Forbidden Jutsu." Tsunade said, making a note on the charts in her hand.

"Is it bad?" Sakura asked.

"No, it doesn't appear to be detrimental." Tsunade said. "It looks more like a change Orochimaru wasn't planning on."

"So what does it mean?" Sakura asked, not gaining much information from the charts.

"We'll have to just wait and see." Tsunade said. "But I wouldn't worry. Beyond this abnormality and a few cuts and bruises, they're all doing exceptionally well."

Sakura handed back the charts and couldn't help but wonder what was happening to the former giants' bodies. Would it turn out to be a problem? Or was Orochimaru's jutsu not fully developed when he used it? Only time would tell.

Back in the training field, Jiraiya was hiding in the brush, watching the seventy five foot Naruto shadow clone as he waited for Orochimaru. He knew Orochimaru would attack soon. He wouldn't want this opportunity to be missed. Suddenly, a voice called out, "Chidori!"

Jiraiya and the shadow clone both looked up and saw Kakashi, Sharingan revealed, descending on the clone with one hand raised, the Chidori clearly visible. The clone barely managed to avoid the shot which created a crater that radiated for at least a hundred feet on all sides. The training field had been obliterated in one shot! The hundred foot Kakashi stood up straight, looking for his opponent. The clone suddenly attacked from the top, with a kick aimed directly at Kakashi's head. Kakashi grabbed the clone's foot at the last second and tossed it to the ground. The fight was on. But who would come out on top?
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.title: Orocimaru Attacks!

choices: Naruto's words get through slowly
Naruto's words fall on deaf ears
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.content:
Being now a mindless minion, Kakashi had lost the genius that made him a truly powerful fighter. Now he was more brawn than brains. The down side was Orochimaru now acted as his brains. Orochimaru looked at the battle field. "How did that boy shrink?" Orochimaru thought, "Could it of been a side effect from freeing him? Or is something else going on here?"

While Orochimaru pondered, Naruto's clone and Kakashi exchanged powerful blows. Both were taking a beating while Joraiya waited to try and stike Orochimaru.

"You know Orochimaru, this idea of making giant warriors is really pathetic," Jiraiya yelled as he rode on Naruto.

"Please, you wouldn't be complaining one bit if I focused on making the women of this village giantesses," Orochimaru called back.

"And why didn't you?" Jiraiya asked, holding on to Naruto's hair after Kakashi landed another punch.

"Two reasons, one you'd of enjoyed it too much. Two, if Tsunade grew her punches would crack the country in two," Orochimaru said as Kakashi landed a final blow and Naruto fell backwards. Jiraiya saved himself by jumping into the sky. "How pathetic," Orochimaru said, smiling. But suddenly beneath the giant Kakashi two hands came out of the ground and grabbed Kakashi in a titanic grip. Orochimaru was thrown off and in mid air, Jiraiya attacked him and the battle between them.

Kakashi, however, was not fighting. Naruto was holding his arms to his side and his face away, so as not to look into the sharigan.

"Kakashi you have to fight it," Naruto yelled, "Remember Team 7! Remember our missions! Remember Obito, the one who gave you the sharigan! Would he like you fighting your own friends? Are you really lower than trash?"
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.title: Winning on whose account?

choices: Yes! The other giant ninja hold down Kakashi so Tsunade can heal him
No! Either Naruto or Kakashi wins the fight!
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.content:
Orochimaru laughed as he heard Naruto's imploring words. "You're wasting your time!" He shouted. "He can hear every word you say, but he's powerless to disobey me. No doubt he's hated doing everything I've forced him to do, but he has no choice but to do it! His will no longer matters!"

Jiraiya sent a punch Orochimaru's way that the snake ninja barely dodged. "You should keep your focus on our fight Orochimaru!" He yelled, lunging in for another attack.

Orochimaru jumped back and opened his mouth, the Kusanagi erupting from within him. He grabbed it and charged Jiraiya, slashing at him wherever he could reach.

As Orochimaru and Jiraiya fought, Naruto continued holding Kakashi. He didn't know what to do. Chances were Kakashi wouldn't break free since he was sixty feet smaller than Naruto but he wouldn't be able to be helped without Tsunade. Naruto knew that if he didn't do something Orochimaru would try something even if he was currently occupied. He'd only need a split second to cast his Forbidden Jutsu on Kakashi or try something equally heinous. What was he to do?

As the fights raged on Tsunade was making a most interesting discovery at the hospital. She didn't quite know what to make of it at first, but the longer she looked the more sense it made. She sat back in her chair and called for Sakura. She had been attending to the patients as best she could with the other nurses but came running when she heard Tsunade's voice.

"What is it Lady Hokage?" Sakura asked politely.

"I've discovered something quite interesting. That abnormality in the the bodies of the former giant ninja comes from a remnant of the jutsu Orochimaru cast. It's the part of the jutsu that stimulates the growth processes in the body."

"So what does that mean?" Sakura asked.

"Think about it." Tsunade said. "All parts of Orochimaru's jutsu was removed except for one: the growth factor."

Sakura's face suddenly lit up and she said, "Do you mean...?"

"Exactly!" Tsunade said, slapping her hand down on the charts. "Those ninja affected by Orochimaru's jutsu will be able to control their size."

"That's amazing!" Sakura said. "But there's limits right?"

"To an extent." Tsunade said. "Depending on long the jutsu was cast on the ninja will determine how much they can grow. I believe Gaara, Naruto, Kakashi, and Iruka will be able to grow the most with the other ninja falling in behind them. The smallest of the group will probably those who fell in their first fight like Shino. How much longer until the ninja will be conscious?"

Sakura quickly looked through the papers she'd collected from the other nurses. "Ummm...it looks like they'll be up within the next ten minutes!"

"That's good!' Tsunade said. "As soon as they wake up I want them briefed on the situation between Orochimaru, Kakashi, Naruto, and Jiraiya and I want them sent out to help. We'll be following the last ninja to wake up to help Kakashi."

Sakura nodded excitedly, happy to know that this whole mess was finally coming to an end. The only question was, would the ninja be in time to help Naruto?
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.title: The End is Near

choices: Naruto sits and waits for orders that will never come
Naruto searches for his master, but Team Tsunade appears to slow his progression
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.content:
"That blade is pretty sharp," Jiraiya said dodging another strike, "It looks like I need my own weapon." He jumped back and summoned a toad wearing samurai armor and took it's katana before drawing it and going after Orochimaru. "I hope you like the Toad sage's personal katana," Jiraiya yelled. He attacked Orochimaru, who defended and realized Kusanagi's sharpness was nothing to this katana. With the weapon in hand, it once again became even.

Naruto was holding Kakashi well. The corrupted ninja couldn't even move Naruto's hands one inch. Kakashi was now trying to flail in order to escape. But still to Naruto's power, it was nothing.

"Hmm, not good," Orochimaru thought when he analyzed the situation, "Naruto's still holding out that stalemate after weakening Kakashi with the shadow clone. And with this pervert having the edge on me, I can't aid Kakashi. Wait, that could work." Orochimaru smiled a wicked smile. Jiraiya took the moment he left open to cut him in half with his katana. Orochimaru laughed as he shot himself out of his body and like before went after Kakashi. "Mouth! Open!" Orochimaru yelled in his weakened state. Kakashi looked towards his master and did so before closing his mouth.

"What!" Naruto exclaimed unsure what just happened. Jiraiya looked on worried.

"With Orochimaru in there, it'll be even harder to win," Jiraiya said, "He can now hide in Kakashi's own body to recover while Kakashi takes us on after being enhanced." As if on cue, Orochimaru used the Fobidden Jutsu: Growth on Kakashi and he sored to 170 feet tall. Inside, Orochimaru was spent and he knew it. Those last two moves took everything he had. It was up to either Kakashi winning or Naruto winning and becoming his slave. Given the amount of his chakra inside his slave, he was confident in either direction.

Kakashi moved then to strike Naruto, who dodged. "He's faster," Naruto thought dodging. "Ero-sennin! What about plan C?" Naruto yelled as he dodged another strike.

"Right!" Jiraiya said jumping up while Naruto made five shadow clones. Naruto started to prepare the rasengan while Jiraiya scaled the giant Kakashi. Kakashi saw the rasengan being formed in the back ground and it flagged a major warning in his primitive mind. He aimed to defeat the Naruto with it before it hurt him.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---------------------

At the leaf village, the first three ninja woke up. They were Iruka, Gaara, and Shikamaru. Their memories of being huge came back to them after a minute. Tsunade and Sakura then briefed them on what happened.

"So we can grow back to the largest size we were?" Isuka asked, shaking his head. He was greatly disturbed by the fact he attacked his own students. Or was it them who attacked him? It was all a blur, like a bad hangover.

"Yes and as you three are the first to wake up, you'll have to help fight either Naruto or Kakashi," Tsunade said opening the door, "Gaara, I can't order you as . . ."

"No, Naruto helped save me in the past and helped today as well. I'll try and help as I can," Gaara said. He and Iruka went out the door

"Bah, how troublesome," Shikamaru thought leaving as well. Once they were outside the confines of the hospital, they grew them selves to 20 feet and Iruka picked up Sakura and Tsunade before running off to the training field.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---------------------

Naruto gathered that it would take a lot to win against Kakashi. But he also knew the problem with their size. The touch of someone small on them wasn't felt. As the clones disappeared, Naruto smiled as he saw Jiraiya above the sharigan eye. In a swift motion, Jiraiya pierced the eye with his katana, disabling its awesome power and giving Naruto enough time to complete the rasengan and strike Kakashi in his gut. Before the blow was hit, Jiraiya jumped off the mountainous Kakashi. When Kakashi was hit, he coughed on reflex, sending his weakened master at the ground with incredible speed, too fast for the weakened Orochimaru to control. As Oroshimaru fell, he felt something hit him and suddenlt below him was Jiraiya. his katana had blood on it and in his last few moments, Orochimaru realized he was cut in half vertically.

The power of the rasengan was enough to defeat Kakashi. And an all to familiar glow appeared. As it encased Naruto, he grew again, pushing past the 300 foot mark. He eventually stopped at 350 feet. All of Orochimaru's chakra that was in Kakashi was within him. Like before, he collapsed on the ground. Jiraiya barely got out of the was of his massive knee. As his mind became slowly under Orochimaru's will, he searches for his master. But as his master is dead, what happens next?
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.title: A battle of titans

choices: Iruka is taking longer than they thought. Naruto breaks free!
Iruka quickly brings back Shizune, but Naruto is getting more violent.
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.content:
As Orochimaru's chakra filled Naruto's body, Naruto's last bit of reserve left him, leaving him a puppet or Orochimaru. Luckily for him, Orochimaru was already dead, leaving him unable to make Naruto do anything. Unluckily, Orochimaru's chakra was still poisoning Naruto and filling him with evil thoughts. The Kyubi was slowly breaking down Orochimaru's chakra like before, but it would be necessary for another cleansing by Tsunade before Naruto would be fine. Jiraiya held his sword at the ready, prepared to fight Naruto if need be. He watched as Naruto got onto his hands and knees, scanning the ground, obviously looking for Orochimaru. Jiraiya quickly summoned a toad and said, "Get rid of Orochimaru's body."

The toad croaked and its tongue darted out, wrapping around the two halves of Orochimaru and pulling them into his stomach. The toad disappeared and Jiraiya kept his eye on Naruto. Naruto was starting to lose his patience with trying to find Orochimaru. Then his gaze landed on Jiraiya. He grinned and his hand darted out, whether meaning to hit or grab Jiraiya wasn't sure. He pulled out his sword and struck out, landing a hit on Naruto's finger tip. It was like poking someone with a pin. It stung, but he didn't even get it in deep enough to make Naruto bleed. Jiraiya was about to fight back with something a bit more damaging, when a voice suddenly called out, "Naruto!"

Naruto looked and saw Shikamaru, Iruka, and Gaara running toward him. He stood up to his full height and the other ninja faltered slightly. At their current size of twenty feet they were about the size of Naruto's ankle. Not good. Shikamaru increased his height to the max of twenty five while Iruka went up to fifty and Gaara reached seventy five. Even then, they were practically nothing next to Naruto. Shikamaru quickly sent his shadow out and caught Naruto, instantly feeling the strain of holding someone Naruto's size. His chakra was rushing out fast. Iruka set Tsunade and Sakura down and quickly ran forward, pulling out a scroll and unrolling it at Naruto. With a puff of smoke, a giant kunai was released from the scroll along with a few shuriken. Iruka tossed the shuriken at Naruto who took the tiny bits of metal like they were nothing. Pulling back, Iruka jammed the kunai into Naruto's foot, hoping to at least cause some damage. The kunai stuck in Naruto's big toe, a small trickle of blood flowing from the wound. Naruto barely blinked, his eyes fiery with the desire to reach out and crush Iruka. Luckily, Shikamaru's jutsu was still holding. Gaara quickly called up his sand and proceeded to wrap it around Naruto's arms and legs, pulling him to the ground and tethering him. Shikamaru released the jutsu, sweat beading on his forehead and said, "That was close."

Naruto instantly started struggling, though the sand managed to hold him fast. Tsunade sighed and said, "Okay, we've got him held down. Now lay him on his back so I can purify his chakra. Ready Sakura?"

"Ready!" Sakura said, preparing to add her chakra to the procedure once more.

"Ready Jiraiya?" Tsunade asked.

"I am, but where's Shizune?" Jiraiya asked, pulling out another sealing scroll.

Tsunade stopped dead in her tracks and said, "Oh damn it! Shizune is back at the hospital treating the other patients! We can't do this without her!"

She turned to the giants and said, "One of you hurry and get Shizune!"

Iruka nodded and said, "I'll do it!"

As Iruka ran off, Naruto started glowing a strange purple and red color. His chakra seemed to be growing stronger. Jiraiya looked on and said, "This doesn't look good. The Fox's chakra is mixing with Orochimaru's!"

Sakura clapped her hands to her face and said, "What does that mean?"

"I don't know, but it can't be good!" Jiraiya said as Naruto's chakra continued fluctuating. "I just hope Iruka gets back here fast!"
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.title: Subdued...For Now...

choices: Yes, brilliant idea Iruka!
Tsunade's not sure.  It might be to much for her to handle
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.content:
Naruto began feeling the feral sides of the two chakras and actually started snarling.

"This is really insane," Sakura said, standing on Naruto as he rocked back and forth.

"Tsunade, let's get some help out now, in case it's too late," Jiraiya said, moving away.

"Right," Tsunade said.

"Who could they have to help?" Shikamaru asked, breathing heavily.

"I may have an idea," Gaara said.

"Summon!" both Sannin yelled, slamming their hands on the ground calling their two boss summons. Gamabunta and Kytsuyu were shocked at seeing th giant Naruto, who towered over them. As Jiraiya briefed the two on what was up, Tsunade returned to Naruto's chest and waited.

----------------------------------------------------

Meanwhile, Iruka was moving as fast as he could, destroying some trees along the way, when something made him stop. More to the point, two someones. Iruka looked down and saw Shizune in the arms being carried by Sasuke.

"Sasuke!" Iruka called down, "You're up."

"Yeah, he came too a few minutes after you guys left me behind!" Shizune yelled.

"Sorry," Iruka said, reaching his hand down, "We need you right now."

"What's going on?" Sasuke asked as Shizune changed giants.

"Naruto's fighting an overwhelming amount of Orochimaru's chakra," Iruka said, "They'll need as many med-ninja as they can get."

"I thought so," Shizune said, "That's why a med squad will come with the next giants to wake up. I figure together, you could hold down Naruto."

"I doubt it. He's over 300 feet tall,' Iruka said, before bolting back the way he came. Fewer trees were lost this trip.

"300 feet? You have to be kidding me!" Sasuke thought, trailing far behind the massive Iruka.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ------------------------

As Iruka made it back with his much needed companion, Tsunade yelled, "About time! Get over here now!"

"Right!" Shizune yelled, jumping over. The two boss summons watched carefully, ready to attack if needed.

The three women did as before and placed their hands down. Suddenly Iruka spoke up.

"Could I send my chakra in with you?" he asked, "I have a far greater amount and it might be helpful."

Tsunade looked at Iruka.
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.title: Meeting halfway

choices: Naruto and Kakashi wake up and life returns to normal
Zetsu returns to Akatsuki with Orochimaru's body
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.content:
Tsunade nodded and said, "Yes, brilliant idea Iruka!"

Iruka carried Tsunade, Jiraiya, Shizune, and Sakura up to Naruto's chest who was still heaving, trying to break free of the sand. Gaara was starting to struggle holding him down, while Shikamaru was slowly regaining his chakra to perform the Shadow Possession Jutsu again if need be. Tsunade put her hands down on Naruto's chest and said, "Remember Iruka, don't feed so much of your chakra through that you overwhelm me. You and Sakura should start feeding me your chakra now!"

Tsunade and Shizune performed the operation much the same way as before, though it was much more difficult now with the massive Naruto thrashing around and the sheer amount of chakra. Tsunade saw the Kyubi had once again burned through a lot of Orochimaru's chakra and was continuing to suppress it. Before, the Kyubi's chakra had stayed out of her way as she removed the chakra. Now it was actively trying to confuse her, to draw out his chakra instead of Orochimaru's. Tsunade started to struggle, keeping the Kyubi's chakra in while pulling out Orochimaru's. Then she felt Iruka's chakra flow into her in addition to Sakura's. She used it to force the Kyubi's chakra back into the seal and yank out Orochimaru's chakra all at once. She yelled out, "Jiraiya!"

Jiraiya pulled open the scroll and caught the purple chakra as it flew out of Tsunade's hands. The scroll started feeling warmer and warmer as the chakra became sealed within it. Finally, all the chakra was captured. Jiraiya bound the scroll and drew seal after seal over it, making sure not a single scrap of Orochimaru's chakra would ever be freed. He tucked the scroll away with the other one, the last remnants of Orochimaru. Tsunade nearly collapsed at the amount of chakra it had taken to perform the operation. Sakura and Shizune had both fell unconscious, unable to withstand the strain. Tsunade stood shakily and nearly faltered. Iruka steadied her and said, "Is it over?"

Tsunade nodded and said, "When the med squad gets here they'll need to look over Naruto, Sakura, Shizune, and Kakashi. Shikamaru and Gaara don't look hurt, just tired and you seem fine. So for the most part yes...this is over."

And so the med ninja arrived in the arms of the remaining giants, two in each arm. Kiba, Asuma, Chouji, Lee, and Sasuke were each told the events after they were knocked out and about their new powers. Naruto slowly started to shrink as the med ninja looked everyone over. Within the hour, he was normal sized though it would be several hours before he finally woke up. A search was set out to find Kabuto since he hadn't been seen since his defeat at Kakashi's hand. His body was found, mutilated by Orochimaru who had used a jutsu none of them had ever seen before on him. No doubt whatever had happened had revived Orochimaru when he had been near death before he sent Kakashi to attack the village. His body was taken care of by the ANBU.

Jiraiya and Tsunade stood on top of the Hokage's Mansion, looking out over the Leaf Village. The giants that had woken up were already helping to rebuild the village, hoping to make amends for what they had done. Gaara had left to return to his village, promising to return later to see Naruto and lend assistance if it was needed. Tsunade sighed and said, "Well, all in all I see this as a good turn of events."

Jiraiya turned to her and said, "Even though the village took damage we managed to kill both Orochimaru and Kabuto, both registered in the Bingo Book as high class criminals."

"Not only that, but we gained a strong defensive force with the giants." Tsunade said. "People will think twice before attacking us again."

She sighed and said, "What did you do with Orochimaru's body?"

Jiraiya smiled and said, "I left it with one of my toads. He'll make sure the body is destroyed."

Tsunade nodded and said, "I'm going to go check on Naruto and Kakashi."

As Tsunade left Jiraiya to his thoughts, the toad that was holding Orochimaru's body was hopping through the forest on the way to dispose of the body. Normally the toads would use jutsu to dispose of things, but this toad was unable to perform jutsu. Instead, he was planning on burning it once he was clear of the village. As he hopped along, something exploded out of the ground and closed around the toad. A strange plant like head pulled itself out of the ground, the plant attached to what appeared to be a human body wearing a black coat with red clouds. The plant opened and the mangled toad fell out, Orochimaru's body visible in the toad's stomach. The plant opened fully and revealed a man with half his face white, and the other half black. He pulled the two halves of Orochimaru's body out of the toad's stomach and said, "I thought this toad tasted funny."

"Is that what I think it is?"

"Yes. It's Orochimaru."

"What the hell happened to him?"

"Someone finally killed him."

"Let's take him back then."

Zetsu grabbed both halves of Orochimaru's body and sank back into the ground. It would soon be found that Orochimaru had written the Forbidden Jutsu that had caused this whole mess on a scroll that was still in tact in his robes. And now it was in Akatsuki hands.
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.title: It's Finally Over...Right?

choices: They are on the right track
No luck in finding clues
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.content:
Back in the village, Naurto and Kakashi were now awake but groggy and participating in a debriefing. Which meant that Tsuande had been lecturing Naruto for going on ten minutes and he was getting bored and only half paying attention.

"... So above all else, you need to be extremely careful with your new abilities. They should not be used inside the village without authorization and you should at all times avoid using it on a mission."

It was inevitable he would ask some question since Naruto never seemed to fully grasp something at first. "Wait, I get not using it in the village but why not on missions?"

Before Tsuande could answer, Kakashi weighed in. "First of all the less people outside the village that know about this jutsu the better, it's an important advantage for us. Secondly if you can just run around as a giant on missions your training will slack because you don't need to get any stronger. Think of this as the equivalent of Lee training with weights on. When he takes them off too fight he is that much stronger and faster."

"Oh, I get it, so the stronger I get while I'm small just means I'll get even stronger when I'm big!" Naruto said with some excitement.

"Well, that's close enough for now." Kakashi answered while rubbing the back of his head. Tsuande was slightly disturbed at that exchange but if it meant Naruto would keep himself under control it was worth leaving him alone.

"In any event, I have an important mission for your team. Jiryaa has told me that the frog he used to hold Orochimaru's body has gone missing. It was likely captured by someone. I want your team to track down that body, then Kakashi will destroy it to make sure we don't face a threat like this again."

"Hokage, While I'm certainly willing, perhaps bringing Naruto AND Sasuke on this mission might not be a good idea just yet." For his part Naruto looked confused.

"Eh? Why not?"

Tsuande continued as if he hadn't spoken. "Your concern is noted Kakashi, but they need to learn to work together, you understand that as well as anyone."

"That's true, but I'd like to start them off on a mission where combat isn't likely."

"You mean we get to fight someone? Awesome, granny is actually giving me a serious mission!" Tsuande and Kakashi were continuing their conversation without Naruto, which he didn't seem to notice.

"I'll send a fifth member to help you keep them in order. Jiryaa can accompany you and that should help things in line. Will that suffice?" Kakashi nodded his agreement.

The A ranked mission is set. Kakashi, Jiryaa, Naurto, Sauske and Sakura are to track down the remains of Orochimaru and deal with whoever had taken them.
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.title: Naruto and Kakashi wake up ...

choices: one of us should use it on a subordinate."
we should not use this jutsu."
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.content:
Deep in a cave in Konoha, Zetsu emerged and waited. He laid out the remains of Orochimaru and waited. Suddenly, eight shadows appeared around the remains.

"What's this call about? Hmm?" Deidara asked, before seeing Orochimaru's corpse.

"Who killed him?" Sasori asked.

"I found his remains in a toad," Zetsu said, "So most likely Jiraiya of Konoha."

"Is that all you called us for?" Itachi asked, seemingly bored with this revelation.

"No," Zetsu said, "He had on him a scroll with a most interesting jutsu. One that can make men giants and your servant eventually."

"Like that is a big deal? Their flesh body will still grow and decay," Sasori said.

"Yeah, it's not like they'll blow up," Deidara said.

"Being a giant could be a great way to serve Lord Jashin," Hidan said.

"Being that big would probably cost a lot of money for food," Kazuku said.

"Regardless, this jutsu costs the user a good amount of strength," Pain said. "Weighing the pros and cons, I feel . . .
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.title: The Akatsuki decide on the future of the scroll

choices: Deidara casts the jutsu on Zetsu
Sasori casts the jutsu on Hidan
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.content:
"one of us should use it on a subordinate."

Everyone instantly started looking at each other. Who was going to use the jutsu? And who would it be used on? The members of Akatsuki didn't really have subordinates. Pain obviously meant that it was going to be used on one of them. The question was, who? Itachi quietly said, "I refuse to let that be used on me. With my Sharingan, I'd be better placed using the jutsu than receiving it."

Kisame laughed and said, "Yeah, it's not really my style."

Deidara stepped back and said, "I'm an artist. I make art and I blow stuff up. That's what I do."

Sasori sighed and said, "The same goes for me."

Zetsu shrugged and said, "I really don't mind either way."

"Yeah, whatever you guys decide."

Kakuzu said, "I don't want it either. There's no profit in it."

Hidan thought about it and said, "Well, I could do it. Whatever works."

Deidara suddenly piped up and said, "Those two seem pretty willing. Let's just use it on one of them!"

Pain nodded and said, "It's a good start. But more of you will become willing when the time comes."

His eyes traveled all around the group. The other members knew that eventually one of them would have to have the jutsu used on them. But for now, Zetsu and Hidan both didn't mind having it done. That left who should use it. Deidara and Sasori were both up for it due to their artist status. Itachi was waiting for one of them to use it so he could copy it with his Sharingan. Pain said, "Alright, since both of you are willing for this, I will let the others decide."

All the present members stood by as Pain said, "Who should we use the jutsu on? Hidan? Or Zetsu?"

The Akatsuki talked amongst themselves for a moment. Who would be better suited?

The members each voiced their opinion. Pain nodded and said, "Very well. Who should use the jutsu?"

Once more the members voiced their opinions. Pain nodded again and said, "Very well. Then let us begin."

What were the choices?
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.title: It's a Group Decision

choices: They make it to the field seeing no other giants and Sakura tells him then
They run into a giant Sasuke still peeved at Naruto winning.
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.content:
"All right," Pain said, "Hidan, Kazuku, Deidara, and Sasori, rendezvous outside Konoha's territory. We'll attack there first."

"Why? Hmm?" Deidara asked, "Wouldn't another nation be better? Like the Sand Village?"

"You just want that one as you'll get your target sooner," Sasori said.

"You'll attack Konoha as it was there Orochimaru last used the scroll. We may find some information on it we don't have right now. Also, depending on how they are suffering after any possible attack, it might be a good time to fight them," Pain said, "Now Dismissed!" All the illusions vanished and Zetsu took the scroll and pocketed it.

"Time for some food," Zetsu black said.

"I've been waiting a while for this," the white said.

Meanwhile Pain and Konan looked at each other.

"You would of chosen Hidan anyway as he's the most expendable of us, wouldn't you?" Konan asked.

"Yes," Pain said, "I just wish we knew where that bastard had that ring hidden away."

"We'll find it eventually," Konan said.

"The sooner the better," Pain said.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ----------------------------

During this time, Naruto slept nicely in his bed, where he had some of the weirdest dreams imaginable. But as he woke, he looked around. He was back in his bed, in his normal pajamas, and his nightcap on. "Weird," he thought, sliding to get out of bed. But when he put his foot down, it came into contact with something a little soft, but poking upwards. As he increased pressure without thinking, something hit his foot.

"Hey!" Sakura yelled at him, now awake, "I'm right here you dummy!" Naruto looked down at Sakura and retracted his foot from her face.

"Sakura, why are you here?" Naruto asked.

"You don't remember?" Sakura asked, "About being a giant?" Naruto's eyes opened widely.

"That wasn't a dream?" Naruto asked, "But now I'm small again."

"I'm glad Naruto's all right," Sakura thought watching his reactions, "Now Lady Tsunade wanted me to inform Naruto on everything that has happened. But we should probably wait for the grow on will part until later." "Naruto, let's go to the training field, you've been out for three days," Sakura said, "So you probably need to train some. Then I'll treat you as you are to some ramen." Thankfully there were still parts of Naruto's mind not working as he missed the line "as you are".

"All right Sakura!" Naruto yelled.

Naruto quickly dressed in his old clothes and went to the door.
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.title: Sasori's new puppet

choices: Neither! Kakashi interupts.
Sasuke or Naruto wins as the Akatsuki travevl towards the village
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.content:
Naruto couldn't believe his luck! Sakura was not only offering to train with him, but was going to treat him to ramen too! Naruto was on top of the world as the pair walked through the streets of Konoha, Sakura carefully steering Naruto clear of any of the working giants. Naruto was too deep in his own thoughts about his good luck to notice how long it was taking to get to the training field. Sakura had barely managed to avoid Shikamaru and Iruka both rebuilding a shop that had been flattened when Kakashi and Sasuke had been fighting. Sakura sighed as she saw the training field appear ahead of them. She grabbed Naruto's hand and started running. Naruto snapped out of his fantasies and ran with Sakura, wondering why she was suddenly sprinting towards the training field. Just as it was looking like they would be home free, a huge foot suddenly landed in their path. Sakura slammed headlong into it and fell on her back, Naruto barely able to stop himself before crashing into the giant appendage. Naruto craned his head back and was shocked to see Sasuke glaring down at him.

"What the hell?!?! Why is Sasuke still huge?!?" Naruto shouted to no one in particular.

Sakura groaned and grabbed her head, sitting up. She saw Sasuke and sighed. Tsunade had ordered that clothes be made for the giants that would expand with them. They were created within a few days courtesy of the Akimichi clan. Sasuke had spurned wearing a shirt as he worked, his muscular upper body glistening with the sweat of the afternoon. Sasuke had an annoyed look on his face and said, "Shut up loser."

Naruto growled up at Sasuke but found himself on his back as Sasuke pushed him over and pressed his foot on him. Sakura jumped up and shouted, "Sasuke stop that! You two haven't seen each other for three days, so the first thing you do is fight?"

Sasuke pressed a little harder and said, "He can get out of this and he knows it. He's too much of a coward to fight me on even terms."

Naruto flailed and shoved against Sasuke's toes, trying in vain to dislodge the foot. He shouted, "Shut up! I could beat you anytime, anywhere, any size! Just name it!"

Sakura growled in exasperation and said, "No! I won't have this!"

Sasuke stooped down and grabbed Sakura. "Don't worry Sakura. This won't take long."

Sasuke let Naruto up and walked over to the training field. Naruto wasted no time in jumping up and chasing after him. Once they were in the center of the field Sasuke said, "Okay here's how it is. You can be any size between your current one and mine and you can fight using any means necessary. Ready?"

Naruto had no idea what he meant by "any size" but didn't much care. He was looking forward to pounding Sasuke even though he was so much bigger than him. Sasuke set Sakura down and said, "Better get somewhere safe Sakura."

Sakura knew she couldn't stop this so she ran a little way away and shouted, "I'm still against this! Naruto just got out of the hospital!"

They both ignored her. She crossed her arms and tapped her foot angrily. She didn't like this one bit. Naruto didn't even know he could change his size! He was so angry, she didn't even know if he could concentrate enough to change. The two boys stood staring each other down as Sakura dwelt on these thoughts. Suddenly, Naruto charged, making ten clones that jumped to various points on Sasuke and attacked. With a few swipes, Sasuke destroyed them all. He smirked and said, "Is that it loser?"

"Not by a long shot Sasuke!" Naruto shouted, making more clones.

Who would win this fight?
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.title: Fighting Already?

choices: Stay with the training couple
Kakashi learns what may come
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.content:
Suddenly the earth shook around the two fighters. Sakura actually fell to her backside, but was happy when she saw a giant masked man towering at 170 feet tall. He appeared out of no where and had one hand, to the little ones on the ground it looked like a human skinned wall.

"Now now, what's going on here?" Kakashi asked.

"Kakashi, how come you're huge as well?!" Naruto asked. Kakashi gazed at Naruto, then at Sakura. Sakura saw this gaze. Sasuke just looked even angrier.

"Naruto just woke up. He doesn't know," she mouthed. Kakashi shook his head.

"This is unbelievable," Kakashi said, "Two friends fighting over something that has passed. You two are pathetic."

"But Kakashi-sensei, Sasuke was the one who started it!" Sakura said as she came closer. Sasuke looked at Sakura with an angry glare. "Hey it's true! All you've been doing is moping around since then."

"Wait, what happened?" Naruto asked.

"You are such an idiot," Sasuke said, "How could he of won against you? He can't even drink ramen without burning himself!"

"Hey that was only once Sasuke and Konohamaru bumped into me!" Naruto defended.

"No, he isn't," Kakashi said, "Naruto's just suffering the affects of a severe trauma. And you were stupid to fight him as he is. He did after all save you from Iruka." Sasuke just glared even more.

"Would someone please tell me how they're so big after shrinking?" Naruto asked, "I mean, I remember some of the fight with Kakashi. Ero-sensei distracted him long enough by poking his sharigan eye with a sharp sword. Then I beat Kakashi and all I could here was an insane laughter. I can't remember anything until I accidentally stepped on Sakura this morning."

"You're kidding right?" Sasuke asked, "You help save the village and you don't even remember it?"

"Sasuke, let me say this once and only once, don't go fighting Naruto or anyone else. We are shinobi of the Leaf. We are allies, comrades and friends. Petty jealousy would only work against us. So drop it," Kakashi said, "Now get back to helping Shino rebuild the Ichiraku shop."

"Right," Sasuke said, angry, but not willing to tussle with a man almost 9 times his size. He left the field and Kakashi shrunk back to normal size.

"Wait, so we can grow to what our highest height was?" Naruto asked, "Sakura, why didn't you tell me?"

"I was going to, when we got here to train. Out here, you can learn to control it without much worry. If I told you back in the Village, you might of tried and made a bigger mess," Sakura explained. Naruto blinked. The image of him growing to insane heights. His feet alone would of destroyed parts of the village easily.

"Good point," Naruto said, "Now why did you lie about the ramen?!" Sakura and Kakashi now blinked. Naruto sounded more angry at the fact his favorite ramen shop was gone more than not telling him he could grow.

"I never said the Ichiraku's ramen," Sakura said, "I was planning on my house after we trained." It took a great deal of effort, but Sakura didn't blush at all.

"All right, let me try growing and start training!" Naruto yelled.

"Wait," Sakura said, "You're max height is over 300 feet tall! I can't train with you unless you're under seven feet. If you try going that big while we practice other things before the growing part, forget about the ramen."

"All right," Naruto said, "Anything for you. After all, I am on a mission to protect you with my life." Sakura turned and walked away towards a training post.

"Good, now let's start with some warm-ups." Sakura said, her face very red. Naruto followed.

"That was close," Kakashi thought, "I'm just happy Sakura thought of the ramen bribe. I hope she has enough for even the normal size Naruto." Kakashi departed the field to inform Tsunade of Sasuke's actions.

At Tsunade's office, she was reading a note which spoke of movement on their western front by some people in black cloaks with red clouds on them. "Not good," was all she said.
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.title: The second place winner steps in

choices: Tsunade talks with Kakashi after he makes his report
Someone from Akatsuki watches Naruto grow
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.content:
"Okay Naruto, since you've been out of it for so long, we'll start with something simple. Target practice!" Sakura said, indicating a group of targets she had set up all around the field.

"No problem!" Naruto said excitedly, pulling out a bunch of kunai.

"Hold on a second Naruto! You have to stay put in the center of the targets! You can only hit certain targets by making the kunai bounce off each other. That way you train body and improve your coordination at the same time!"

"Still no problem!" Naruto said, putting away all but five kunai.

He took a look around at all the targets and stood in the middle of them. With a few tosses he hit the first few targets. Then, using the last three kunai, he threw one between two targets, then launched the second one against the first driving it into the target while flinging the first into the air. With the last kunai he knocked the second kunai into a target on the ground. The last kunai was thrown with such force that even after knocking the second kunai down it sped on course into the last target. Sakura looked impressed. She hadn't expected Naruto to do so well.

"Great job Naruto!" she said, happy that he had beat the test on his first try.

"Thanks Sakura!" Naruto said, a slight blush pinking his cheeks. He would never tell Sakura that he had seen Sasuke doing a similar exercise once and had started using it himself until he was perfect at it.

"Okay, now let's have do some combat training." Sakura said, pointing at a group of dummies that had been set up. "Just do whatever you want to take out those training dummies."

"You got it Sakura!" Naruto said, creating a group of Shadow Clones.

Sakura watched as Naruto obliterated the dummies in a flurry of punches, kicks, and shurikens. Soon, only splinters remained. Sakura was starting to see that Naruto hadn't lost any of his old touch even after three days of inactivity.

"Okay, now I want you to fight your Shadow Clones for awhile. Keep fighting until you only have a quarter of your chakra left." Sakura instructed.

Naruto nodded and created about thirty clones. Sakura jumped clear as the many Narutos started beating each other down. It took about an hour before the clones disappeared and Naruto was left panting and sweating. He grinned and said, "There! No problem!"

Sakura smiled and said, "Now you have to fight me! I won't go easy on you!"

Naruto cheered and said, "You got it!"

Naruto charged forward and started engaging Sakura in close combat. Even with only a quarter of his chakra left, Naruto was a powerful opponent. Sakura pulled out a kunai and slashed upward, forcing Naruto back long enough for Sakura to make a few hand signs and throw a pink haze around the battlefield. Naruto watched as Sakura disappeared into the pink mist, flower petals flowing around the area. He wasn't sure what to do as Sakura suddenly charged from behind and punched him the head, turning to kick him in the back of the knee, forcing Naruto to the ground. Naruto jumped back up and saw that Sakura had disappeared again into the mist. Naruto remembered seeing or hearing something about this before...then he remembered!

"This is genjutsu!" Naruto thought. "I just have to find a way to release it!"

Naruto held still and waited until Sakura charged again. This time, Naruto turned and grabbed Sakura by the arm, kneeing her in the stomach and elbowing her in the back, slamming her into the ground. Instantly the genjutsu disappeared. Naruto saw Sakura groaning on the ground and said, "Oh crap! I'm sorry Sakura! I just got carried away!"

Sakura got to her feet and said, "It's okay Naruto. I just need to train more if I'm going to keep up with you and Sasuke."

The two genin rested for about fifteen minutes before Sakura said, "Alright there's just one more thing you need to do. You need to learn to control your growth"

Naruto jumped up and shouted, "Yes! Yes! I've been waiting for this! How does it work?"

Sakura remembered what Kakashi and Sasuke had said, "Just concentrate and build up chakra in your body. Growing will be instinctual."

She repeated these instructions to Naruto who said, "Okay! Here I go!"

As Naruto concentrated on growing, Kakashi was entering the Hokage's Mansion.
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.title: Naruto and Sakura's Training Session

choices: Very well, on to Ramen/ and Kakashi finds his new squad
Hinata appears, watching them train / Shikamaru's being difficult to get to join
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.content:
Tsunade sensed someone landing on the roof outside her window and looked out. "Kakashi, what's wrong?" she asked.

"Naruto has woken up and Sasuke challenged him to a fight," Kakashi said.

"What?! Those idiots!" Tsunade said, cracking her knuckles. "How big did they go?"

"Actually, Naruto didn't know he could grow, so he was normal size against a 20 foot Sasuke," Kakashi said, "I intervened before anything actually happened."

"This is not what we need at the moment," Tsunade said, "There are reports of four people in black cloaks with red clouds coming this way from the west."

"Akatsuki," Kakashi said, "I wonder why?"

"We don't know. But I want to send you and three others to investigate," Tsunade said.

"Who's coming with me?" Kakashi asked.

"Iruka, Shikamaru, and Asuma," Tsunade said, "I don't want you revealing your height unless needed. And don't even go to the maximum height if you do."

"For Asuma, that won't be hard, seeing as his maximum is 10 feet," Kakashi said.

"That maybe, but his wind chakra blades can pierce anything, even you're leg," Tsunage said, "It'd be a useful thing." Kakashi smiled, remembering when Tsunade wanted to test their extremes yesterday. Asuma's wind chakra was the only one to cut Kakashi enough for his 170 foot self to notice.

"Understood. When do we leave?" Kakashi asked.

"Right away," Tsunade said.

"Right," Kakashi said before going to collect his team.

Back on the training field, the couple wasn't disturbed again.

"All right, let's get to some throwing practice," Sakura said. She was breathing hard. Naruto wasn't the only one to not train in a few days. Sakura was busy helping Tsunade check over the others and make sure the clothes were ready. Naruto, however, was doing fine.

"Sakura, you should take a rest," he said, "You don't have to push yourself."

"I know, but I want to get better as well," Sakura said. She pulled out some kunia and aimed at a tree and started. "Right on target," she said. Naruto barely aimed and threw, hitting right next to Sakura's.

"Wow," Naruto said, "That's cool."

"Yeah, all of you giants have better eyesight now, as well as chakra control and overall stamina," Sakura said.

"This rules," Naruto said, "It's sad you couldn't have this gift as well. Then we'd always be equals." Sakura turned away, blushing again.

"Well, I think if I had, I would of lost really soon," Sakura said.

"Nah, you're really smart. You would of found a way to win a few times" Naruto said.

"Thanks Naruto," Sakura said, "All right, time for growing exercises."

"Yes!" Naruto yelled.

How does this part of training go?
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.title: Kakashi learns what may come

choices: Hinata tries to approach Naruto/Shikamaru gets convinced
Meanwhile, the Akatsuki draw ever closer
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.content:
"Now remember: It's easy to grow, but you have to maintain control. That's the point of this exercise. It's easy to just blast yourself up to over 300 feet tall, but takes finesse to reach a size between your standard height and your max height. Got it?"

"You bet!" Naruto said, standing up and positively quivering with excitement. "Can I start?"

Sakura nodded and Naruto concentrated on growing. Within seconds his body was bulking up at an alarming rate, his jump suit stretching to contain it. Sakura shaded her eyes and looked up as Naruto passed ten feet, then twenty, then thirty, stopping at thirty five feet. Sakura nodded and shouted, "Good work Naruto! Keep it up!"

Naruto nodded and concentrated again, continuing his rise up into the heavens. As Naruto and Sakura trained, they had no idea they were being watched. Hinata had been worried about Naruto since she had heard about this whole situation. She had been gone on a mission withe Neji when it had all happened and had come back to find Naruto hospitalized. She had visited him several times over the course of his invalidity, dropping off gifts of medicine which Tsunade politely accepted on Naruto's behalf. When she had heard he was out, she had searched the village high and low to find him. Now that she had she was too shy to approach him. Especially since Sakura was there. She knew that Sakura liked Sasuke, but had seemed to be paying more attention to Naruto, only leaving his side when he was out to tend to other patients with Tsunade or Shizune. Hinata wanted to talk to Naruto if even for a minute, but knew she'd never get the nerve to. She sighed as she watched, wondering what was going to happen with Naruto.

As Hinata watched Sakura and Naruto, Kakashi was strolling through town looking for his new team. Asuma had been easy to find, since he was working right outside the Hokage's Mansion. He had been at his full ten foot height and was helping Kiba fix a building. Kakashi had explained the mission and Asuma left Kiba grumbling that he had to finish the job himself. Finding Iruka and Shikamaru proved easy as well since they were both working at the same apartment, both at their full heights. Iruka saw the two Jonin coming and said, "Hey Kakashi! Asuma! What's up?"

Kakashi said, "Business I'm afraid. The Hokage has a mission for all of us. That includes you Shikamaru."

Shikamaru groaned and said, "It's not bad enough I have to spend all my time working, now she wants me to go on a mission? What a drag..."

Iruka shrank himself down to normal size and said, "What's the mission?"

"Apparently four members of Akatsuki have been spotted near the borders of the country and they appear to be heading for the Leaf Village." Asuma said. "Our mission is to investigate what they're up to."

Iruka laughed and said, "That shouldn't be too hard. All we have to do is grow and--"

"Sorry, but no." Kakashi interrupted. "She doesn't want us revealing our secret yet and we're not to reveal our full heights even if we get into a fight."

"Oh..." Iruka said. "Well that makes things a little more difficult."

"It's only reconnaissance, so we probably won't be getting into a fight." Asuma said. He turned to Shikamaru and said, "Shrink already Shikamaru. We've got to get going."

Shikamaru yawned and said, "Nah, I don't think so. That mission sounds like a snoozer."

Asuma sighed and said, "Now is not the time to be lazy Shikamaru. Now come on!"

Shikamaru shook his head and said, "Sorry Asuma-sensei but I really don't want any part in this. I'm sure the Hokage wouldn't mind finding someone else to go in my place."

"Somehow, I don't think she'd be too happy if she knew you were planning on disobeying a direct order." Kakashi said, imagining Tsunade's reaction to the news if they were to report it to her.

Still, Shikamaru seemed to be ignoring them all now. This wasn't going to be easy.
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.title: One Shy and One Lazy...Both Problems

choices: Hinata runs into Sasuke, and the Akatsuki meet up
Teak Kakashi departs as Sakura makes Naruto dinner
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.content:
"What are we going to do?" Iruka asked, as Shikamaru was appearing to nap at his full height.

"We need some way to motivate him, either by duress or promises," Ausma said.

"Hmm, well, I could always give him a good spanking," Kakashi said. one of Shikamaru's eyes opened up.

"That's sick, you know that? And really perverted," Shikamaru said.

"A little history for you Shikamaru, I was trained by the 4th Hokage," Kakashi said.

"I know that," Shikamaru said.

"But what you don't know is the 4th Hokage was the one who told Lord Jiraiya to make his Icha Icha books even more perverted to sell them," Kakashi said, "You see, pervertedness runs in my line of teachers." Shikamaru started to get worried.

"Hey Asuma, isn't that kunoichi of the Sand, Temari, coming in a few days to report on how Gaara's being accepted and the usual status report?" Iruka asked.

"Yeah, and we could always get a camera to take a photo of Shikamaru's spanking as well," Asuma said, chuckling.

"You three are sick you know that?" Shikamaru said.

"Well, are you going to come willingly or do I need to grow and embarrass you in front of the entire village?" Kakashi asked.

"All right, I'll come," Shikamaru said, "Let me get some gear." Shikamaru shrunk and went to his home to get some flash bombs.

"You weren't really going to spank him, were you?" Iruka asked.

"Well now, I can't answer nor deny that question," Kakashi replied, smiling beneath his mask. Asuma and Iruka exchanged glances. This was a side of Kakashi neither ever wanted to know about.

Back on the training field, Naruto was still growing and occasionally shrinking in different amounts. He now stood 94 feet tall. Hinata was watching from behind some trees with her Byakugan.

"He's amazing," she thought.

"All right Sakura, back up," Naruto said, "I want to try something."

"And what's that?" Sakura asked, worried.

"I'm going to jump and shrink," Naruto said.

"What? Why?" Sakura asked. She had known Naruto to try some crazy things, but this she just didn't get.

"Well, I want to see how much higher I'll go if I shrink after launching with these powerful legs," Naruto explained, "I mean, if I can keep the same speed, can you imagine what that would be like for me running at 300 feet and diving into someone at 50 feet tall? The speed from the hit would be stronger, wouldn't it?" Sakura's mouth hung open.

"Naruto, that's brilliant," Sakura said, "And a great strategy to use if you need to fight again." Sakura backed up to the tree line, near where Hinata was. Naruto took a deep breath and launched himself high into the sky and shrunk to 20 feet tall during the upwards flight. The high point of his jump was increased greatly. He positioned himself into a dive and before he struck, flipped into a feet first landing. Everything in 200 yards shook violently. Naruto was actually knee deep in dirt. Sakura nearly screamed from the shaking, but heard some noise behind her. Once the world stopped she looked behind the tree.

"Hey Sakura, how was that?" Naruto asked, smiling. He looked and saw Sakura wasn't where she was. "Sakura?" he called again, worried he might of hurt her.

"I'm all right," Sakura said, "I'm just looking over Hinata."

"Hinata's here?" Naruto asked, pulling his legs out and walking over. Sakura carefully pulled a fainted Hinata out from behind the tree line.

"She must of bumped her head from that quake you made," Sakura said. Naruto looked down on the two tiny girls. He gently picked up Sakura and Hinata in his two hands. Sakura went to his shoulder and Hinata went to his lap after he sat down.

"I hope she's all right," Naruto said, looking at her.

"She's probably fine," Sakura said stiffly. Hinata began to stir.

"Oh my, what happened?" she thought, "One minute I was in a tree, next I'm on this hard stuff." Her eyes blinked open and she saw Naruto looking down on her. His chest right next to her head.

"Hey Hinata," Naruto said, "You all right?" Hinata began to blush and her heart rate sped up.

"I-I-I-I-I-I-I-I'm fine," Hinata said, "I'm glad to see you're well, after what happened."

"Thanks," Naruto said, oblivious to Hinata's subconscious actions. Sakura wasn't.

"What happened just now?" Hinata asked.

"I made an earthquake," Naruto said.

"Which was a really interesting move," Sakura said, scooting over to Naruto's head, "You came up with a bunch of great moves during the incident. Some of which saved my life." Sakura then did something a bit bold. She gave Naruto a thank you kiss on his cheek.

Naruto had blushed a bit from Sakura's kind words, but when she kissed him, it took all his self restraint not to jump up again, since Hinata was on his lap. Hinata however felt both jealousy and sadness when she saw the kiss.

"I won't let go that easily," Hinata thought, glaring at Sakura. Sakura met the glare with one that read she understood and wouldn't back down from Naruto. 'Naruto," Hinata said, "I'm really glad you're all right," Hinata said, "Feel free to come by my house if you want to talk about your experiences." She rose off his lap and got off.

"Thanks Hinata," Naruto said, "Maybe I will tomorrow. I'm heading to Sakura's for dinner tonight." Hinata's smile froze, but her eyes went wide open.

"Well, I hope you have a nice evening," Hinata said before leaving. Inner Sakura gave an huge laugh for that victory just now.

"Take that!" Inner Sakura screamed.

Hinata was very sad now and ran on.
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.title: Now they're embarressed and angry

choices: Someone from Team Kakashi spots someone from Akatsuki
Sakura and Naruto finish cleaning up and go out to do something
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.content:
As Hinata ran off back to her house, Sakura touched Naruto on the cheek and said, "That's enough training for today Naruto."

Naruto grinned and said, "That means it's ramen time right?"

Sakura laughed and said, "Of course!"

Naruto set Sakura down on the ground and quickly shrank back to his normal size. The pair talked about various things as they made their way to Sakura's house. They talked about the other members of their team, the state of the village, the fact that Orochimaru was finally gone, what the other giants were doing with their time, and what kind of ramen they wanted to make. Finally, they reached Sakura's house. Her parents were both out leaving the house to themselves. Sakura pulled out a pot, a ladle, and the ingredients for ramen, namely noodles, seasonings, and pieces of meat. She turned to Naruto and said, "You just sit tight and relax Naruto. I'm going to make you all the ramen you can eat."

"Alright! You rock Sakura!" Naruto cheered, hands in the air.

Sakura giggled and started filling the pot with water. As she started making ramen, Shikamaru was meeting with the other members of the team, ready to head out and spy on the Akatsuki against his will. They all walked to the gates and Kakashi turned to face them.

"Alright, before we go I want to be clear on a few things. We all know the nature of the mission correct?"

"We're just trying to find out what the Akatsuki are doing so close to the village." Shikamaru said, rubbing the back of his head.

"That's right." Kakashi said, nodding in Shikamaru's direction. "That means no fighting unless absolutely necessary. If we do find ourselves in a fight we shouldn't use our giant powers at all. If we're backed into a corner and have no choice, we shouldn't grow bigger than ten feet since that's Asuma's max size. It'll give the illusion that we can only grow to ten feet."

"Right." Everyone said, nodding.

Kakashi nodded again and said, "Alright. Let's go!"

Each ninja took off in a different direction, radios on standby to report any sighting of the Akatsuki to the other members of the team. In less dangerous areas of the village, Sakura was finishing making the first batch of ramen for Naruto. She poured the steaming pot of noodles and broth into a bowl and set the bowl down in front of Naruto.

"Here you go! Pork and beef for the first bowl." Sakura said, handing Naruto a pair of chopsticks.

"Thanks Sakura!" Naruto exclaimed, eagerly digging in.

Sakura watched Naruto gobble up the noodles with insane speed, heading back to the stove to make more. By the time Naruto was done with the first bowl of noodles, Sakura was ready dumping a new batch of noodles into the still hot broth with some shrimp and soy sauce. This went on for three more bowls, Naruto famished after training so hard. Finally, he was done and Sakura was able to eat a bowl herself. When they were both done eating, Sakura started cleaning up.

"Here, let me help Sakura." Naruto said, moving next to her at the sink and drying dishes as she washed them.

"Thanks Naruto." Sakura said gratefully.

"Hey, no problem!" Naruto said.

Sakura sighed happily and glanced over at Naruto. Not only was he being protective, but he was actually helping her do chores! This was something she could get used to.

As the two genin cleaned up after themselves, Team Kakashi continued to scour the areas outside the village, hoping to catch even a glimpse of the Akatsuki. So far they were operating under the assumption that the Akatsuki didn't know they were being tailed. But what if they did know? That would make it even harder to find the already elusive missing ninja. They would eventually reveal themselves if they planned to attack, but by then it would be too late. Surely someone would get hurt. With these thoughts in mind, Team Kakashi worked even harder in their search for the Akatsuki.
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.title: Lunch and a Mission

choices: Shikamaru binds, Asuma cuts/ Iruka's a decoy and Kakashi's lightning blade
Naruto and Sakura having a good time together, but those who hate them look on
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.content:
Shikamaru raced through the woods. "Man, this sucks," he thought, "I just hope someone like Kakashi or Asuma finds them, since I have nothing to hurt them with besides that shadow neck bind." But some noise came to his ears: a ringing bell with the sounds of walking. "Those hats Kakashi said they wore did have bells on them," Shikamaru reasoned and went to investigate.


Kakuzu and Hidan were walking along a path towards the rendezvous point. "I hate your stupid #*&$%#@ side quests,' Hidan ranted.

"Shut up," Kakuzu said, 'He's worth a lot of cash." Shikamaru came upon the duo and saw their outfits.

"Crap, why me?" Shikamaru thought, "Better trail them and find out what's up." Shikamaru stayed hidden and the two S-rank shinobi didn't notice him due to their fight.

"Hey this is an order from the leader," Hidan said.

"You just want to make more destruction for that fruitless religon," Kakuzu replied, adjusting the man on his shoulder.

"Jashin isn't fruitless! And I see this scroll from Orochimaru's corpse a miracle for me!" Hidan yelled loudly. Shikamaru's heart skipped beat. He had been told that Orochimaru's body was going to be destroyed, but it seems these guys got it and possibly the giant making scroll.

"Not good," Shikamaru thought, "What should I do now? Back track and call for help or stay on their trail?"

Unknown to Shikamaru, Kakashi was also lucky. He saw and approached the other Akatsuki team and carefully listened.

"So what does that scroll Zetsu delivered say Sasori-sama?" one asked the other.

"Don't rush me Deidara," Sasori said, "This is a complicated jutsu. Even with that idiot Hidan being the one whose a giant, there can be problems if this is rushed."

"Probably why the Leader chose you," Deidara said. Sasori grunted in response, opening the scroll before him. With his sharigan eye, Kakashi saw what the scroll was.

"Great, Kakashi thought, "They have a giant making scroll from Orochimaru's corpse. Jiraiya wondered where that toad went to. I guess we know the answer."

Kakashi silently backed off and summoned Pankun. "Pankun, go give Lady Tsunade this new information," Kakashi said, explaining what he found and how to make he decided it would be best for them to neutralize this treat now. Pankun nodded and ran off quickly. Kakashi tapped his radio.

"What is it Kakashi?" Iruka asked. Asuma also acknowledged. Shikamaru stopped his pursuit and also checked in.

"Iruka, Shikamaru, Asuma, I found them," Kakashi said, "There are two. They seem to be waiting for two more and they have Orochimaru's growth Jutsu."

"I know," Shikamaru said, "I've been trailing the other pair. But they're faces are completely covered. One has on his back a dead body and is called Kakuzu. The other is Hidan."

"Good work. Initially we were just going to report back to the Hokage, but finding out they have that scroll, we'll need to stop them now. I'm located about 1.3 miled SSW of the river."

"I'm near there," Iruka said.

"Shikamaru?" Kakashi asked.

"I'm about 2.3 miles NNE of your location," Shikamaru said.

"I'm close to that," Asuma said.

"All right, Iruka, come to me. Asuma, go with Shikamaru.. You two are to delay them until Iruka and I get the scroll. And the growing orders apply still," Kakashi said.

"Right," the three responded back.
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.title: The late and lazy ones find them

choices: Kakashi orders a retreat and Shikamaru grows to 10ft to save Asuma
Naruto and sakura are wandering around the village and find Kurenia. . .
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.content:
Asuma met up with Shikamaru as Iruka made it to Kakashi.

"You got a plan?" Asuka asked Shikamaru.

"Yeah, I'll bind them with my Shadow Imitation technique and you decapitate them," Shikamaru said.

"Smart plan," Asuma said. He and Shikamaru moved in range and waited. When Hidan and Kakuzu walked under the shadows of some trees, Shikamaru attacked, using the shadow to strengthen his hold. Both immediately realized something was off.

"What the @$%#%^$ happened!" Hidan asked, trying to move. Both were draining on Shikamaru.

"Crap, I'm not going to hold them," Shikamaru said, wait, if I grow to a normal sized height, that would help." Shikamaru then grew to 6 feet tall. The bind was more powerful now.

As Shikamaru strengthened the bond, Asuma came down and decapitated Hidan. The head flew off and hit a tree.

"God $%$#%%^ it! That #$@*% hurt!" Hidan yelled. Asuma looked at the talking head, while Kakuzu tried breaking the bind. But with Hidan decapitated, Shikamaru focused his efforts on the remaining one, a shadowy hand reached up and started strangling the man. Kakuzu saw where the bind was coming from and sent a tendril through the ground to disrupt it. He had to hurry as he felt the hand squeeze his neck.

"Come on Shikamaru," Asuma thought, while Hidan shouted obsenities and for Kakuzu to fix him. Asuma then picked up Hidan's head. "So he can fix you?" he asked before throwing Hidan's head far into the woods. It rolled and fell into the river.

Shikamaru was getting worn from holding this guy. "Asuma, kill him now!" Shikamaru said. At that moment, a tendril shot out and almost hit Shikamaru. He dodged at the cost of releasing his jutsu.

"What an interesting pair you two are," Kakuzu said. before he felt Asuma's blade pierce a heart of his, but the blade was still an inch from his body. "Wind blades, how interesting," Kakuzu said, "You just killed a heart of mine." Kakuzu then countered , by breathing fire on Asuma.

"Asuma!" Shikamaru yelled, moving towards his sensei.

Back with Iruka and Kakashi, Iruka moved into position and threw a kunia at Deidara. The missing-nin dodged easily and both looked towards where Iruka threw it from. But another came from another Iruka.

"I think their trying to trap us hmm," Deidara said as more came from random spots. They were easily deflected by Sasori's puppet's tail.

"I wish they'd just attack. I hate waiting," Sasori said before they both sensed something behind them and saw Kakashi's lighting blade formed and he was charging at them.

"Raikiri!" Kakashi yelled as he pierced and destroyed thtail then puppet's shell. In the shock of this attack, a clone Iruka took the scroll and got out of there. Kakashi also poofed away.

"They were all Shadow clones?!" Deidara yelled, "What do we do now?"

"They went right after the scroll," Sasori said, standing up in his main, 'They probably know what it's for. We should follow them and report in."
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.title: Great teamwork

choices: Kakashi reports to Tsunade
Pain has new orders for Hidan, Kakuzu, Deidara, and Sasori
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.content:
As Kakashi and Iruka started darting around the trees heading back towards the village, Kakashi touched the radio in his ear and said, "Shikamaru! Asuma! We've recovered the scroll and are heading back to the village. Retreat at once!"

Shikamaru quickly touched his ear and said, "We hear you. We're on our way."

Kakuzu grinned and said, "Leaving so soon?"

Asuma, burned from the sudden attack by Kakuzu, said, "We've got pressing matter elsewhere. Sorry."

Kakuzu laughed and said, "You're in no position to run. And the kid over there doesn't look like he's going to be holding out for much longer!"

Shikamaru looked at Asuma and said, "Get ready to run!"

Asuma nodded and got to his feet.
