She jumped from the roof top she was on and approahed Sasuke.

"Hi,' Ino said.

"Ino, why were you following me?" Sasuke asked. He wasn't angry and could of guessed why.

"Well, I had come to ask you," Ino started. Sasuke resisted the urge to interject. "Would you like to go on a date with me?" Ino finished. Sasuke blinked and a small smile came to his face.

"Sure," Sasuke said, "Why not? How about tomorrow night?"

"Yes I'd love that!" Ino said, "Thank you Sasuke!"

"You're welcome," Sasuke said. Inwardly Sasuke wondered how Sakura would feel about this. While he did like Sakura a lot, he also found Ino a very nice person to talk with. He knew he'd enjoy this date, even if things didn't work out between them.
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.title: Couples

choices: As Sakura sulks, Lee asks her out.  All 3 dates go well
Naruto goes and asks various others about what to do on his date
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.content:
The next morning came to Konoha. She came to a realization from some strange and disturbing dreams. She would never know how deep she felt about either boy if she didn't press the relationship with them. Considering what Neji told her, Sakura would ask Sasuke out during a meeting they'd have with Kakashi that morning.

As Sakura walked down the street, she saw Temari and Shikamaru.

"I told you I wanted some good fruit for breakfast you lazy bum!" Temari yelled as they were sitting on a bench, having a morning snack.

"Geese, all they had were apples. They wouldn't have the plums or pears in until next week," Shikamaru said.

"Hi you two," Sakura said, smiling.

"Oh hi Sakura," Temari said, smiling, "How are you doing?"

"I'm great. But if I do't hurry, I'll be late for a meeting with Kakashi," Sakura said.

'Even as the Hokage, he's late," Shikamaru said, "I wouldn't worry about it."

"Yeah, but he might restrict our missions if one of us is late. Neither of the guys would like that," Sakura said, hurrying on. Temari laughed, before going back to scolding her soon-to-be husband about what fruits she liked, again.

When Sakura got to Kakashi's office, Naruto and Sasuke were waiting for her. Kakashi wasn't there yet.

"You're almost late," Sasuke said.

"I ran into Shikamaru and Temari," Sakura said, "I got chatting for a minute. So sue me."

"Anyway, what are we here for at this hour of the day?" Naruto wondered aloud.

"I called you here," Kakashi said, appearing from no where. "I just wanted to tell you about another mission I have planned."

"All ready? We just got back yesterday," Naruto said. Everyone looked shocked. Naruto was complaining about being assigned a mission?

"Well, this one won't be for a few days," Kakashi said, "As you know, Shikamaru and Temari's wedding is coming up. What you don't know is how many important official of the Fire County's government will actually be attending. Two days before the event, you three will escort them to the village and back to the capital after the reception."

"Will we have any aid?" Sasuke asked.

"Considering the delicacy of this mission, yes. We don't want to take any chances, so you will have to pick three more people to help," Kakashi said. The three exchanged glances. Without much talking, they came to a relative idea of who to bring along.

"Neji would be good," Naruto said.

"Asuma would also be a good choice," Sasuke said.

"And Iruka," Sakura said. Kakashi nodded.

"Good choices," Kakashi said, "That's all for today." They could see a smile beneath his masked face. He turned the chair and pulled out one of his favorite Icha Icha books. His former students left quickly, not wanting to disturb him.

"That was interesting," Naruto said.

"Yeah, I'm surprised you didn't pick Hinata," Sasuke said, "You two seemed close yesterday."

"Well, we are friends," Naruto said.

"Why didn't you want a mission today?" Sakura said, interjecting.

"Because I have a date tonight," Naruto said. Both his teammates stopped in their tracks.

"With who?" Sakura asked, shocked.

"Hinata," Naruto said. "It just sort of came up as we were talking yesterday." It was then he noticed Sasuke chuckling.

"That's too ironic," Sasuke said, "I also have a date tonight. Mine's with Ino."

"What?!" Sakura gasped, "When did that happen?"

"As I was walking home," Sasuke said.

"That is funny," Naruto said, "So, uhh, where should I take Hinata?" Both Sakura and Sasuke exhanged glances. They shouldn't of been surprised by his question, this was Naruto after all. But even after more than a decade working together, he still found something to say that made them speechless. Neither responded and just vanished, leaving Naruto alone in the lobby of the Hokage's mansion.
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.title: Meetings

choices: He grows to 30 feet tall
Sasori made a mistake.  Only parts of Hidan become gigantic
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.content:
Elsewhere, a blond and an oddly shaped man stood waiting.

"Their late, hmm," the blond said.

"I hate being kept waiting, they better get here soon," the other one said, "Or I might use you Deidara."

"%$#%$ you Kakuzu," came a yell, "You took the detour to kill this girl. Now you have to carry him."

"She's worth a lot of cash," Kakuzu replied.

"Looks like Kakuzu found another bounty to collect and Hidan's acting normally," Deidara said, "You were serious about using me, weren't you Sasori-sama?"

"Yes," Sasori said as the other pair came into view. Kakuzu was carrying the body of a dead woman. Hidan was looking less than pleased at this parcel.

"All right, let's get this over with," Hidan said, smiling.

Sasori put down the scroll and looked it over, mumbling as he read it.

"Well?" Hidan asked impatiently.

"Hold on," Sasori said, "I'm the who was partnered with Orochimaru, so I know his style best. This is complicated and I don't want to risk anything going wrong for me."

"And what about me you $%**# puppet," Hidan yelled.

"You'll live, probably," Deidara said, "If not, Zetsu will have a large meal, hmm." There was some clacking noise next to Deidara as Sasori came out of the puppet.

"It'll be easier to preform this out of the puppet," he said, focusing his chakra and desire for power into the scroll. A pink dust was created. and the scroll sealed itself. "Now open it Hidan," Sasori said, returning to the puppet.

"Finally," Hidan said, opening the scroll over him. The dust fell. What happens to Hidan?
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.title: Meanwhile, the Akatsuki draw ever closer

choices: Half an hour passes...
Meanwhile, back at Konoha
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.content:
As Sasori closed himself back into his puppet, the other members of Akatsuki all waited to see what was going to happen to Hidan. Suddenly, Hidan started growing...sort of. Within minutes Hidan's right arm swelled up and burst the sleeves of his coat, the enormous appendage slamming into the ground. Before anyone could blink, Hidan's left foot started growing as well, bursting the sandal off. Hidan fell down as his left foot started raising his body into the air. Landing on his back, with his left foot pointing up into the sky, Hidan started cursing out Sasori while Kakuzu shook his head in disgust and Deidara laughed.

"What the $%**# did you do to me?!?!?" Hidan yelled, unable to move much due to the weight of his giant limbs.

Sasori checked over the scroll detailing the jutsu and said, "We were too hasty. We were supposed to allow the scroll to stay sealed for half an hour. I suppose that's to avoid this situation we have before us."

"So what do we do now hmm?" Deidara asked, finally stopping laughing.

"There's not much we can do." Sasori said. "The best course of action would be to make another scroll and sprinkle the dust over the other parts of Hidan's body, allowing them to catch up."

"Can't we just release the jutsu?" Kakuzu asked.

"No, this jutsu can't be released. Orochimaru created it with the intent of using it for a permanent servant." Sasori explained. "In other words, we have to wait."

Sasori got out of the puppet again and performed the jutsu a second time, laying the dust on the scroll and sealing it. Sasori climbed back into the puppet and said, "Alright, when half an hour goes by sprinkle the dust over the rest of Hidan's body. You have to wait though. I modified the jutsu this time so the two scrolls will be in equilibrium with each other."

So the Akatsuki were forced to wait around to use the jutsu again.
1121221112121111122211211121212111212121.title: Even Sasori can make mistakes

choices: Sakura stays, the giants fight
Sakura runs while they are distracted
112122111212111112221121112121212.content:
Before they could get far, they ran in to yet another giant: Kiba Inuzaka. Mentally Sakura groaned. She had seen these two get in to fights over things as unimportant as the best place to eat. The chances of them not fighting were about as good as Orochimaru apologizing, turning over a new leaf, and eventually becomeing the new hokage.

That thought quickly woke her up, this crazy plot was just the kind of thing Orochimaru would do, use people unwittingly to do his dirty work. Now Sakura knew what she had to do, get away from the giants and warn Tsuande. As the form of Kiba got closer, that left her with a difficult question.

Does she stay with Naruto, and get him to go to Tsuande so they can find out what's going on; or does she leave Naruto behind and go to Tsuande on her own?
112122111212111112221121112121212.title: No. Another ninja attacks Naruto

choices: They find the scroll
Naruto wants to find someone else to fight.
1121221112121111122211211121212121.content:
As Kiba got closer, Sakura got a better look at him. He looked to be about 12ft, the same size Rock Lee had been. He looked angry, and enviously at Naruto. Clearly, he wanted the blond ninja's size and power for himself.

Without a word he launched in to an attack that Naruto quickly dodged. Naruto had been caught off guard at Kiba just up and attacking him. Now he was ready for a fight, with his increased strength and natural speed Naruto was easily dodging every attack. After almost two minutes of non stop attacking Kiba had yet to land a hit. Naruto was smiling at how good he was doing, which only served to make Kiba madder, which led to him fighting even worse.

Kiba threw yet another punch that was easily dodged, and then Naruto saw his opening. He landed a quick punch to Kiba's side that sent him flying and crashing hard in to the ground. Before Kiba could even think about standing up, Naruto had plowed in to him with a big kick that had all of his power behind it.

The fight was over, Kiba was not getting up. As Sakura and Naruto watched his body started to glow blue, and then inch by inch his body started to shrink. His height reduced, and his muscles shrunk until everything was back to normal. Maybe a little bigger then normal if her eyes did not device her.

Then came phase two, everyone knew what to expect. Naurto started to grow. His biceps bludged outwards more, but not anything that would endager his range of motion. His chest pushed out standing proud and scuplted on his body. His abs were firm ridges, and his back just radiated power. His hight inched upwards, until he was over 20ft. He would still be a little smaller then Shikamaru, but Sakura barely reached his knees now!

Since that was over, Sakura was hoping to find the scroll so they could be done with this.
1121221112121111122211211121212121.title: Sakura stays, the giants fight

choices: Naruto and Sakura find the scroll
Someone has stolen it!
11212211121211111222112111212121211.content:
Naruto was smiling enjoying the changes in his body. He is bigger and stronger then he could have ever imagined before. Even Sakura was having a bit of a hard time focusing as she watched him flex his muscles. But she calmed herself and remembered what they had to do before the entire village got destroyed from giants fighting.

"Naruto! We have to find the scroll before this gets even more out of hand." He stopped and look down at Sakura. He stopped smiling and put a serious look on. Casting one last glance at his muscles, he then focused on Sakura and nodded his agreement.

"My apartment. I left it the scroll there someplace." Quickly Naurto and Sakura took off to find that scroll. So quickly they wouldn't even notice if someone had been watching and listening in...
11212211121211111222112111212121211.title: They find the scroll

choices: Off to the Hokage
Something/Someone interrupts
112122111212111112221121112121212111.content:
Now being too big to fit in his own apartment, Naruto had to settle for standing outside while Sakura searched for the scroll. This was not an easy task as Naruto's apartment could probably qualify as a disaster area, and he had scrolls strewn everywhere.

Sakura was not having much luck so she opened the window "NARUTO! What did you do with this scroll? I can't find it in this mess." She shouted out at him.

He blinked and looked in deep thought, but that was taking too long for Sakura. "Just tell me what you did when you came home with it!"

A brief moment to ponder that and Naruto's eyes lit up in excitement. "Well first I took my shoes off and laid in bed to read the scroll. A bunch of dust fell on me, so I went to drink some water to get that taste our of my mouth. Then I threw the scroll away."

That was all Sakura needed, she went over to the trash can and there was the scroll right on the top. She almost felt silly for not looking their sooner but just mentally blamed it on Naruto. Not that she would ever tell that to the 20 foot blond.

Now scroll in hand it was time to get to the Hokage and maybe get some answers...
112122111212111112221121112121212111.title: Naruto and Sakura find the scroll

choices: Naruto grows normally (height and some muscle)
Naruto grows mainly height or muscle
1121221112121111122211211122.content:
Naruto suddenly stopped what he was doing and leaned down close to Sakura and told her that he was training so much so that she would like him finally.

"Oh Naruto...I...never knew,"said Sakura.

He stood up and wondered if he would grow more muscle if he tried lifting things that were heavy. He looked at a nearby tree that had been uprooted by the fight againist (the now smaller) Rock Lee. He picked up the tree and began to lift it up several times. He felt his muscles become very very sweaty from the heavy tree, unfortunately for them it was getting late so he set the poor tree down and told Sakura it was time to go to sleep.

Naruto somehow got back into his much smaller house (to him) and decided to just sleep in his jumpsuit overnight.

He fell asleep wondering how much he would grow.
1121221112121111122211211122.title: All for the Lady

choices: Naruto goes to see Tsunade
Naruto goes elsewhere, Sakura tags along.
11212211121211111222112111221.content:
Sakura woke up the next morning bright and early. She raced out to Naruto's house.

"Oh, how much bigger is he now?" she thought, "And will he finally go to Lady Tsunade?" She reached his door and knocked.

"Naruto," Sakura called out.

"Come on in," Naruto said, "I don't think I can get out without breaking down the wall." On those words, Sakura bolted in and saw that Naruto was sitting on his butt, and was leaning over, so his head didn't break through the roof.

"What happened?" Sakura asked.

"I the rest of Lee's height," Naruto said.

"I'll say," Sakura said. Part of her was in love with this giant before her and wanted him to get bigger. Another part was worried for his health and hoped it would stop. "Naruto, will you please come with me to see Lady Tsunade?"

"I don't want this stopped," Naruto said.

"I didn't say stop it," Sakura said, "But it would be a good idea to see how far this will go, right?"
11212211121211111222112111221.title: Naruto grows really tall

choices: He decides to walk along the streets as he grows, as if everything is normal
He goes to hide at Kiba's house
11212211121212.content:
Naruto decided that he would just lie down on his bed. As he stared up at the ceiling, he noticed that less and less of his body was on the bed. He looked himself over, and thought that it was nothing. He continued to just relax, until he realized that his clothes were getting tight.

"Huh? Already?"

Naruto knew he was growing, but not this fast. He could see that his clothes were already too small for him, and his feet could now touch the floor from his lying down position. He felt a stiffness in his feet, and brought one of his sandaled feet close to his face. His toes were already mostly hanging off the edges, and this showed that Naruto WAS growing faster. Until, he focused on his feet. He could actually see them getting bigger. It was slow, but he could see them becoming bigger!

"This is awesome!" Naruto looked his massive body over, "Freakin awesome!"

But, he was growing a little to fast. He was already ten feet tall. He had grown two feet taller in only about ten minutes! Naruto considered leaving his house, so he could hide somewhere. He didn't want to be considered a freak! But, he DID want to show off! He stood up, ducking so his head wouldn't hit the ceiling, and thought about his situation. What would he do?
11212211121212.title: Becoming a little too noticeable!

choices: Kiba starts bringing Naruto food.
There's another knock on the door. A second guest?
112122111212122.content:
Naruto thought about it for a moment...then snapped his fingers. Of course! He knew a way he could show off AND hide at the same time!

On the other side of the village, Kiba was just returning home after a mission. He tossed aside his sweater, his body finally able to breathe. It was a hot day and that sweater wasn't making things any cooler. He really needed a shower. He took off the fish net shirt he wore under the sweater and tossed it aside. His mother, sister, AND father were all off on an extended mission so he had the whole house to himself! He could let his clothes lay anywhere, eat whatever and whenever he wanted, and have absolute privacy. Heck, he could walk around naked if he wanted! Right now though, he just wanted to clean himself off. He had his hand on the doorknob to the bathroom when there was suddenly a thunderous knocking at his door. Kiba growled in frustration and opened the door. Just ignore it. He didn't want to worry about visitors right now. He was about to close the door to the bathroom, ignoring the constant knocking, when the front door suddenly was blasted off its hinges. Kiba ran back out into the entrance way to his house and skidded to a halt, gaping at the huge man who was framed in his doorway. All that could be seen of him was his huge naked torso, visible since the jacket the person was wearing was unzipped and forced wide open. His orange pants were more like shorts, rising above his knees. His head was above the door frame, invisible to Kiba's eyes. Of course, he didn't need to see a face to recognize the searing orange outfit.

"Naruto...? What...how...?" Kiba stuttered, not quite believing what he was seeing.

Naruto put one meaty hand on over the door frame, gripping it between his massive fingers and bent down, grinning at Kiba. "Hey Kiba! Your family is gone for awhile right? I'm staying with you!"

It wasn't a request. Naruto shoved one arm and shoulder through, bent over more, and crammed himself through the doorway, his huge pecs getting stuck. Naruto took a deep breath, his chest expanding, cracking the doorframe worse, allowing him to barely squeeze himself in. "Damn...stupid tiny door..."

Kiba just gaped at his front door, totally destroyed. Naruto, still bent over slightly since the ceilings were only about nine and a half feet tall, looked around. "Man...this place is kind of a dump..."

He stomped forward, the whole house shaking slightly with his every step. Kiba quickly shoved the front door back into place as quickly as he could. It wasn't perfect, but it would hold for now. He then ran back to the living room to see Naruto taking up the whole couch, sighing as he leaned back, his arms stretched across the entire back of it. There was only a little bit of room on either side of his huge thighs. He grinned as soon as Kiba appeared before him.

"Nice place you got here. I'm going to enjoy living here for awhile!" Naruto laughed, the couch creaking and groaning under his weight.

"No way!" Kiba finally found his voice. "There's no way you're staying here Naruto! I don't know WHAT is going on but I DO know you're not just going to break into my house and act like you own the place!"

Naruto reached out and yanked Kiba forward, his grin looking slightly sinister as he stared at Kiba. "Oh yeah? And who's going to make me leave?"

Kiba grabbed Naruto's fist and tried to break his grip but no matter how he struggled he couldn't escape. Naruto was way too strong now!

"Okay! Fine! You can stay here for a little while!" Kiba relented.

Naruto's evil grin turned into an easy going smile and he dropped Kiba back to the floor. "Good! Now...how about you make me something to eat? A big guy like me gets really hungry!"

Kiba paled a little at that. Naruto was a bottomless pit when he was normal sized...just how much could he eat now?

Naruto snapped his fingers and said, "Hey! I SAID get me some food! Now get to it!"

Kiba clenched his fists and shouted, "Screw you! I'm not your slave!"

Naruto lifted one foot up and kicked Kiba's legs out from under him. Kiba hit the ground, hard, on his back. Naruto pressed his enormous foot down on top of the smaller boy, pinning him easily, the foot covering most of Kiba's torso. Naruto wiggled his toes in Kiba's face and said, "Yeah, while I'm here, you are! Big guy makes the rules, so if you don't want me to break some bones, you'll do what I say!"

Kiba tried to shove the foot off his chest but he couldn't so much as budge it! In fact, Naruto was slowly increasing the pressure! "Okay! Okay! I'll get you your damn food!" Kiba shouted. The pressure disappeared, along with the foot, and Naruto said, "Good! Make it something delicious! And don't stop bringing it until I tell you!"

Kiba walked sullenly to the kitchen. So much for his ultimate vacation...
112122111212122.title: Perfect Hideaway

choices: Shikamaru decides to join Naruto and lie down. He is kind of hungry!
Kiba has to go the washroom. While in there, he begins to grow at a fast rate
1121221112121222.content:
Right before Kiba could get to making Naruto something to eat, there was a knock at the door. 'Thank God!' Kiba thought as he realized that he could use this as an excuse to get away from the massive, growing kid on his couch. He ran to the door fast enough so that Naruto couldn't react in time, and opened it. What he saw left him breathless. He was face to face with someone's abs! He slowly tilted his head upwards, and saw who the massive kid was.

"SHIKAMARU!?" Kiba yelled.

Shikamaru sighed, and simply replied, "I kind of... need a place to stay. I heard that your family wasn't going to be here for a while, and I'm pretty sure that my parents wouldn't like to see that their son was almost eight feet tall."

Kiba stood there, speechless. Shikamaru really had grown. He had already gotten rid of his jacket and shirt, leaving his massive chest bare. His pants looked more like shorts on him now, and his monstrous thighs were putting too much pressure on them as tiny rips were visible. Kiba then looked down, noticing that Shikamaru's massive feet were bare. He was probably to lazy to get new sandals after the first pair had burst off of him. He continued to stare as Shikamaru until he heard him as, "So? Can I?"

"Oh, why not!? You AND Naruto can stay here!"

Shikamaru walked in, and asked, "Naruto? Why is he-Woah!"

Lying on a couch that was no longer big enough for him, Naruto stared at Shikamaru, yelling, "Hey! You grew too! Why don't you lie down somewhere, Kiba was about to make me something to eat. I'm sure he wouldn't mind making enough for both of us!"

"There is NO way I'm feeding both of you!" Kiba shouted, being really mad now.

Naruto smiled. "Yes, you WILL!"

Shikamaru examined Naruto. He was bigger than he was! At first, he had thought that there was something wrong with him, but now, he had living proof that he wasn't the only one growing! He was getting worried.
1121221112121222.title: Why do they pick MY house!?

choices: Kiba feeds the giants...then gives Shikamaru his foot rub
While Kiba makes the food, Shikamaru starts to grow!
11212211121212221.content:
Shikamaru scratched his abs a little, his stomach growling. "Yeah...some food sounds really good right now actually..."

He sat down in a chair opposite Naruto, stretching the arms to the sides, the chair way too small to hold him. He sighed and looked over at Kiba. "Well? Weren't you getting us food?"

Kiba grumbled and seemed about ready to say something when Naruto swatted him a little and said, "You heard him! Get moving!"

Kiba yelled a little, his skin getting bruised where Naruto struck him. He sullenly went into the kitchen and started looking through his cupboards. He and his family ate a lot of meat so there was quite a few different types. Beef, pork, chicken...he pulled down all the meat he could find and then dragged out a bag of rice. Meat, rice...he could probably make some soup too...he pulled out some noodles and other spices and decided to just make a huge pot of ramen. Naruto would love that and if Shikamaru had a problem...well food was food. He normally would just refuse and then kick Shikamaru out...but now...well, he couldn't do that. He sighed and just started making food. It would only be a week or so...he could survive this. Hopefully Naruto's ego wouldn't get any worse...there was no telling what he might force him to do otherwise!

As Kiba began preparing the gallons upon gallons of ramen for his hungry "guests", Naruto sighed and smiled at Shikamaru. "So, why are you growing Shikamaru?"

Shikamaru, who had his eyes closed and seemed to be asleep, opened one eye and said, "It just started happening. I was just napping, minding my own business, and when I woke up, I was this big and all my clothes were tattered. It was way too troublesome to even try and find other clothes. What about you?"

Naruto explained about the scroll and the dust. Shikamaru tilted his head and muttered, "Where have I heard that before? It sounds familiar..."

"Really? Has something like this happened before?" Naruto asked.

Shikamaru shrugged and said, "I can't remember. I really don't care either way. Maybe now people will be more willing to leave me alone and just let me nap..." He wiggled his toes a little and said, "Man...my feet are sore..."

Naruto laughed and said, "Good thing we have a little slave to rub our feet for us!"

Shikamaru smiled a little and said, "We just have to make sure he doesn't leave the house and squeal..."

It hadn't taken much to turn Shikamaru to Naruto's way of thinking. It came of being larger than life and naturally lazy. If he could have people do all the work for him why would he complain? It was like a dream come true!

"Yeah, don't worry!" Naruto said. "I'm going to keep a close eye on him!"

Kiba heard Naruto's loud obnoxious laugh and wanted to punch something. He did NOT like being a slave to those two! He couldn't hear their conversations but he had an idea what was going on. He dumped the seared meat into the broth and kept stirring. He had two huge pots, one for each Naruto and Shikamaru. Would it be enough? He hoped so. This wasn't any fun at all. It would only be a few more minutes...

"HEY! Dog boy! Where's our food? Hurry it up!" Naruto shouted.

Kiba growled and shouted, "HOLD ON!"

Naruto chuckled and crossed his ankles. Life was good~
11212211121212221.title: Two Giant Masters

choices: They finish eating, and Kiba gives Shikamaru his foot rub.
Naruto starts growing when they're done eating, making him bigger than Shikamaru
112122111212122212.content:
Naruto loved all of this! He was massively huge, being about eleven feet tall, and, he was still growing! Secondly, he now had Shikamaru with him, going through the same thing. He wasn't as big as him, or growing as fast as him, and that was how he liked it. He still wanted to be the biggest, after all! And then... there was Kiba. He didn't have to move one of his massive muscles, since Kiba was now going to take care of, and hide him. Though, Naruto wondered how long him and Shikamaru would actually be able to live in Kiba's house. Everything was perfect! That is, for the first few minutes.

Naruto turned his towards Shikamaru, noticing that his eyes were once again closed. But, soon enough, he noticed something. The smaller than him, but still massive boy in front of him, was growing! And fast! Shikamaru's body slowly took up more and more room on the small chair he was in, his head also inching upward. His biceps had swelled noticeably as had his forearms giving his arms a broad, strong look. Naruto looked down at Shikamaru's legs and noticed his thighs thickening, his calves bulging and his feet growing and moving across the floor to accommodate his new size. As Naruto stared in disbelief of his friend's swelling body, he noticed each of Shikamaru's pecs were growing fuller and rounder, being filled with unbelievable power and mass, and soon, his abs followed. Naruto could hear Shikamaru's bones cracking as they grew longer, his shoulders also widening as his back flared out. Soon, he was left in only a pair of tight, grey boxers, with his manhood being outlined in them. Shikamaru was to heavy to be held up by the small chair he was sitting on by now, and it ended up collapsing. With this, he woke up!

"What the hell's going on!?" he asked.

Naruto tried to answer, still stunned by Shikamaru's rapid growth spurt, "You grew!"

Shikamaru looked himself over, not believing what he saw. While napping, he had grown massive! Just by looking at Naruto, he could tell that he was at least two feet taller than him. Naruto wasn't happy about that. "Uh... great. As if my day wasn't already stressful enough."

After this, Kiba walked in with a pissed look on his face, with their food. "YOUR FOOD'S READY! Are you-holy crap!

Right in front of him, sat Shikamaru. Even while sitting, he was at least a foot and a half taller than Kiba! His massive feet stood out in front of him, and he wiggled his toes. "I'm going to need a foot rub when I'm done eating!"

"Damn it!" Kiba yelled!
112122111212122212.title: Bigger and Lazier!

choices: As Kiba rubs, Shikamaru starts growing again!
Shikamaru wants Kiba to do more than rub...time to get licking!
1121221112121222121.content:
The huge pots of soup were, thankfully, enough to fill up Shikamaru and Naruto, although barely. Naruto was still rubbing his stomach with an annoyed look, trying to see into the kitchen to find out if there was more. Shikamaru, however, leaned back against a wall, shoving a few cushions and pillows under his back to be more comfortable. Without any further preparation he shoved his feet up against Kiba and said, "Alright. Foot rub. Now."

Kiba shoved the foot aside and said, "J-Just give me a second! I have to do the dishes first!"

Shikamaru sighed and looked over at Naruto. "Hey Naruto. Go do the dishes. I want my foot rub now."

Naruto snorted and said, "Like hell! I'm not going anywhere! Kiba's the one who does the dishes!"

Shikamaru lifted his other foot and shoved it against Naruto's thick chest, shoving him backwards off the couch. "How about this? The biggest makes the rules. Now get going."

Naruto glared at Shikamaru. That shove...Shikamaru wasn't supposed to be that strong! Those extra feet and the extra mass in his muscles really gave him a significant edge over Naruto. This wasn't good...Now HIS perfect vacation was getting ruined! Shikamaru was lazy...but now he was also strong. Naruto had seen him when he got serious in a battle. He wasn't sure he could take the genius level shinobi in a one on one battle. At least not without wrecking the house and revealing them to the public. Suddenly Naruto smiled. The biggest made the rules huh? He grabbed the pots and said, "Alright. I'll wash the dishes...THIS time!"

Naruto easily carried the pot into the kitchen and began washing. He knew that he was growing. Eventually he would outstrip Shikamaru in size and THEN he'd make his move! He turned on the water and dumped some soap into the sink. He started scrubbing, sitting cross legged on the ground in front of the sink. It wouldn't take long for him to finish washing the dishes...but just the idea that he was being ordered to do this made him incredibly angry. HE was supposed to be giving out orders. Well, in a few hours at least, he'd be able to take on Shikamaru and reassert himself.

Meanwhile, Shikamaru had both of his massive feet up on Kiba's lap. "Okay, first the left and then the right."

Kiba groaned as he began rubbing the left foot. It was about the size of his torso, the heel resting in his lap while the toes were just brushing his chin. Kiba winced a little as he ran his hands over the soft foot. Shikamaru didn't walk around unless he had to so his feet were surprisingly soft for a ninja. They still had the smell of feet. There was no avoiding that natural smell. At least they weren't sweaty and stinky or covered in toe jam or something. Kiba started by rubbing his hands up and down the sole. Shikamaru moaned a little, his toes curling as Kiba's small hands rubbed over his foot. Kiba moved up from the sole to the toes, rubbing each to individually, followed by rubbing between each toe. Shikamaru shivered a little. It appeared his toes and feet were pretty sensitive. After about five minutes of rubbing, Shikamaru shifted his left with his right. Kiba sighed and started the whole process over again.

"Yeah...you're doing great Kiba..." Shikamaru said with a small smile. Kiba felt a strange sense of satisfaction. Shikamaru was being a lot nicer than Naruto and he had pushed Naruto over and ordered him around. He had enjoyed that. He kept rubbing it up and smiled as he remembered these memories.
1121221112121222121.title: Foot Rubs

choices: Kiba rubs Shikamaru's feet as he continues to grow, though it's becoming hard
As Shikamaru stops growing, Naruto finishes the dishes
11212211121212221211.content:
Kiba continued rubbing Shikamaru's massive feet, and looked at his face every once in a while to see him smile. It was surprising, but they were both enjoying this foot rub.

"Keep going..." Shikamaru demanded.

Kiba continued to rub, and noticed that he was being pushed back by Shikamaru's feet. He just backed up, put them back on his lap, and continued rubbing. Kiba snickered slightly as he felt the teen giant's toes tickle under his nose, and looked back at Shikamaru. His smile was much wider than before, and for some reason, his head seemed to be moving upward. It didn't take long for Kiba to figure out that, once again, his young friend was growing.

Kiba moaned. "My God..."

He watched as Shikamaru's body rippled and undulated, slowly swelling before his eyes. His shoulders broadened, while his thighs pumped up and swelled, knearly touching eachother. Kiba loved being able to watch this... his friend was growing massive right before his eyes, and his feet continued to grow in his lap, the toes soon passing his own head. Despite this, Kiba continued to rub, loving every second of what was happening. But, Shikamaru's body grew bigger and wider until his head was pressed tight against the ceiling from his sitting position, and this then knocked him out of his trance.

"Huh? Shikamaru shook his head. "What going on?"

Kiba immediately stopped rubbing, and looked up too the giant in front of him. "You started growing again! But, I doesn't look like this is going to stop any time soon. DON'T damage the house! Cause, if you guys don't kill me, my parents will!"

Shikamaru grinned as cracks appeared on the ceiling as his head pressed more and more against it. He leaned lower, pushing Kiba against the wall with his massive, growing feet. "Did I say to stop?"

Kiba groaned, answering, "This isn't the best time!"

"I really don't care, just continue. I was enjoying it."
11212211121212221211.title: Why Him? Naruto's not going to like this...

choices: Oh man...Shikamaru grows AGAIN! What's causing this?
After the foot rubs all three boys go to sleep.
112122111212122212111.content:
The house creaked and groaned around the two boys as Shikamaru's body continued to grow larger and wider, his head already nearing the ceiling again despite the fact that he was slouched down, his broadening shoulders pressing against opposite walls. Shikamaru's smile was uncharacteristically mischievous. He was enjoying this more than he let on. Kiba, who was slowly but surely being covered by the massive foot pinning him to the wall, watched as the toes slowly rose up above his head again. Shikamaru's foot was as long as he was tall! This was getting insane! Shikamaru groaned a little and said, "What did I just say? Don't stop!"

"C-Come on Shikamaru!" Kiba pleaded. "If you don't try and get out of here, you're going to destroy my house!"

Shikamaru lifted up his impressive hand, made a fist, and slammed it down against the couch, crushing it flat with the same ease a normal human would crush a bug. "And if YOU don't rub my feet I'll crush you just as easily as that couch!"

Kiba jumped and started rubbing again, no longer complaining. Shikamaru was nicer than Naruto...as long as he was getting what he wanted. And a foot rub wasn't that bad. Kiba was now using both hands to knead a single toe, having to reach up higher and higher until the toes were out of his reach. Then, it was back to rubbing the sole. All the while, the giant foot was pressing against him more and more, the wall splintering behind his back as Shikamaru's head and shoulders rose up into the second floor, his wide, glistening chest pressed up against the ceiling, each nipple pointing almost downward as his pecs continued to pump and swell. Suddenly, Kiba felt the wall crash down behind him, his body falling backward into the next room over, Shikamaru's foot still in front of him, but no longer bearing down on him. He got up and dusted himself off, just as the ceiling finally couldn't handle anymore and crashed down over Shikamaru's gigantic body, effectively turning the house from a two story with multiple rooms to a two story with one BIG room which now contained one BIG ninja. Shikamaru chuckled as he looked himself over. He flexed his arm and watched as it bulged up, ending in an impressive peak with a single, large vein running over top of it. It was a really intimidating sight.

Kiba picked his way over to Shikamaru, looking up at him in awe. Shikamaru smirked down at him and said, "Like what you see?"

Kiba gulped and said, "Y-Yeah! Why wouldn't I?" It was best not to argue with giant muscle bound ninja.

"And what about your house? I'm wrecking it...that's a problem for you right?" Shikamaru said.

"No way!" Kiba insisted. "I mean, it's not like my parents can do anything to you if they find out you caused this."

Shikamaru nodded and snatched Kiba up, bringing him up to his face. "Yeah...And to make sure they don't do anything to you, you're officially my personal slave. I'm not letting you out of my sight."

Shikamaru held Kiba in one arm, pinning him to his huge chest. Shikamaru searched around and twitched his knee, crashing it into the nearby wall which instantly collapsed, revealing Naruto in the kitchen. Naruto slowly turned around and jumped to his feet in shock. "S-Shikamaru? No way! This is so unfair!"

Shikamaru picked his foot up and pushed it against Naruto. "Don't even start pipsqueak. Things are different around here now. I'm the biggest, I'm the one in charge. If you don't want to end up a stain under my foot you'll do exactly as I say."

Naruto couldn't answer. Shikamaru's sole was pressing firmly against his mouth. "I'll take your silence as consent." Shikamaru said, leaning back again. Kiba snickered and smiled up at Shikamaru. He was pretty cool! He was really starting to admire Shikamaru.

"Now...why don't you finish the foot rub Kiba started?" He dropped Kiba down by his other foot. "You too Kiba. One for each foot."

Kiba immediately began rubbing, working over every part he could reach. Naruto, on the other hand, refused to so much as move. Shikamaru increased the pressure until Naruto couldn't stand it any more and sulkily rubbed the other foot. Shikamaru sighed and just enjoyed it. Life was good.
112122111212122212111.title: Shifting Dynamic

choices: The next morning, Shikamaru has outgrown Kiba's house

When he arrived at the store, he had to duck so he wouldn't hit the door frame, though his head was still about a few inches away from the roof. As soon as the store clerk saw Naruto, he nearly screamed, though he held it in. Naruto walked up to the store clerk, still having a smile on his face.

"Do you have any clothes in my size?"

"W-Well, I would have to take some measurements," the clerk answered.

Naruto watched as the clerk opened a cupboard and took out a measuring tape, and also grabbed a chair. The clerk walked up to him and got ready to measure him. The clerk wasn't as scared of him anymore, realizing that Naruto was just a young teen, though the he wondered why Naruto had came in tight, slightly ripped, boxers.

"I'll have to measure your height and the size of your feet. I would measure your waist, but I've already got a pretty good idea of it's size."

Naruto stood up straight and watched as the clerk stood up on the chair, still barely reaching his height. The clerk took out the measuring tape, and got ready to measure him. Naruto measured to be about 8 and a half feet tall! Even the clerk was shocked, though Naruto's smile just grew wider. The clerk now got ready to measure the size of his feet. Again, the clerk was shocked. Naruto's feet were a massive 19 inches long and were about 8 inches wide! He knew now for sure that it would be hard to find clothes for this, as the clerk saw him, teen giant. The clerk went into the store's storage room, and, after a few minutes, came out with the largest sandals, orange jacket and orange pants he could find.

"Well, you'll have to work with these. You should know, that the sandals were surprisingly easy to find, though it took me forever to find an orange jump suit at your size."

Naruto sat down so he could try on the clothes. He slipped the sandals on his feet, and to his surprise, they fit perfectly! The clothes almost also fit perfectly, the the sleeves of the jacket and his pants were slightly to short. He also could only zip his zipper half way to the top. Naruto knew that he would not find anything better, so he paid the clerk, and got ready to leave. When he opened the door, he noticed that his hair was now brushing the top of the nine foot tall ceiling. His clothes also felt a little tighter than when he had tried them on, and his toes were also slightly hanging over his once "Perfect fitting Sandals." But, Naruto just got happier.
11212211122.title: Naruto makes it to the clothing store.

choices: Naruto's growth starts getting faster
Naruto runs into Shikamaru...who's even bigger than Kiba!
112122111222.content:
Naruto was just bending down to walk in the door, when he ran full tilt into someone who was just walking in. The boy who had just walked in bounced back a little, though not as much as Naruto would have expected since he was at a steadily growing over eight feet tall. He bent down a bit more to see under the door frame and was greeted with the sight of Kiba. Naruto grinned and said, "Hey Kiba! Imagine running into you here!" He snickered, ready for Kiba to freak out about how huge he was!

Kiba looked up at Naruto and said, "Oh..so you're growing too huh?"

"What?" Naruto got a better look at Kiba and noticed...he was only about a foot shorter than Naruto currently was! His coat was unzipped and only reached halfway down his torso, showing off his bulging pecs and his rock hard six pack. The material was stretched tight across his broad shoulders and the fish net shirt he normally wore was straining to keep attached to his body, only managed to cover down until Kiba's second row of abs. His shorts were no better off, tightening across his thighs, small tears visible all over them. His big feet were crammed into his sandals, the material splitting along the top of his foot and half of his foot hanging off the edge of it. He looked pretty uncomfortable over all.

"Hey! What the heck happened to you? Why are you so big?" Naruto asked suspiciously. He knew how he had gotten big. That scroll with that dust. But how had Kiba grown?

"How the hell should I know?" Kiba asked angrily. "I just woke up this morning and I was half a foot taller than I was yesterday! I.."

He suddenly stopped talking and groaned a little. Naruto watched in amazement as Kiba began to grow bigger before his very eyes! The dog ninja swelled up and out, his biceps shredding his sleeves as they tightened around the massive muscle, a tear running down his back as it flared out, the jacket forced open wider as his pecs pushed out. His shorts were next, each pant leg exploding as the thigh that filled them bulged with more size and definition. The sandals finally gave out, the material bursting open completely while his big feet crushed the bottoms into the dirt. Before he knew it, Naruto was looking UP at Kiba as he stretched taller and taller, stopping when Naruto came JUST below the level of his pecs. Kiba sighed, relief washing through his body as the constricting clothes finally were gone. He looked around in confusion before looking down at Naruto. "Aw dammit! Not again!"

Naruto ran out of the store to get a better look at Kiba. Most normal people weren't even as tall as Kiba's brief clad bulge! He was enormous! "What do you mean AGAIN? How many times has this happened?"

Kiba scratched his head and said, "Well...I've grown three times. Once when I woke up, again an hour later by about...one foot I think. And again just now. How tall are you?"

Naruto said, "Um...over eight feet." He couldn't give an accurate measurement since he had grown since then.

"So that would make me about ten feet tall I guess..." Kiba said, looking himself over. "Heh...you know..this isn't half bad! I'm starting to like being huge! See you later Naruto! I'm going to get some better clothes!"

Kiba ducked down and entered the shop, the sound of the shopkeeper screaming and dropping something issuing out. Naruto crossed his arms in annoyance and began walking down the street, thinking. Kiba said he had grown half a foot the first time...then he had grown by one foot...and now by THREE feet...It seemed like every time he grew, he grew more but the spurts only came every hour.

"No way! I can't let Kiba get bigger than me! I've gotta be the biggest guy around here!" Naruto said, clenching his fists. He needed to grow more! And fast! He dashed back to his house and squeezed through the front door, pulling out his trashcan and grabbing the scroll. Damn...not a single speck of dust left! Naruto was about to toss the scroll back into the trash when he noticed something was written on it. The dust must have covered it up before since he couldn't remember seeing it last time. He spread it out at his kitchen table, the only chair in the room screaming in protest as he sat down on top of it. Naruto's eyes moved back and forth as he read the scroll.

"My life's work, condensed in this scroll. To open it is to release forces beyond any mortal comprehension. Such influence...how could humans create gods? If you've opened this scroll, then you are on your way. But be warned. You will not be the only one. Others will join you. At least two others. The roulette is turning. Who will be chosen?"

"Huh? What the heck does that mean?" Naruto scratched his head. It didn't make any sense. Gods? Others? Whoever wrote this scroll sounded like a nut. He shrugged and tossed it back into the trash. There was no help here. He was going to need to find some other way to stimulate his growth.
112122111222.title: Things Get Stranger

choices: Naruto wakes up an hour later, and is stuck in his room!
Naruto wakes up an hour later, now fifteen feet tall, but Kiba is still bigger
1121221112221.content:
Naruto crossed his arms in disappointment, and sat on his bed. As he did this, the wooden supports groaned and broke under his weight. It was unfair! He had been growing for what, three days now? And he now stood taller than eight feet tall! But, Kiba had only started growing this morning, and was already bigger than him! Some how, some way, he needed to get bigger... and fast!

Naruto thought well and hard about the last few days. Every morning, he'd always wake up a LOT bigger than the day before, and then he'd slowly expand throughout the day. But, he had always trained for a while before that. So, maybe him training, than eating before he went to bed had some kind of significant affect on how much he grew while he slept, and how much he grew throughout the day! But, Naruto didn't have time to train... Kiba was growing every hour, and ended up growing more each time! He decided there and then that he would just eat, and take a nap. But, when he said eat, he meant feast on as much food as he could find! Naruto then stood up, ducking slightly as he ran to the fridge for food. He smiled when realized that he had bought enough food to feed him for three days at the size he was at the moment!

"Hehehe... you won't be the biggest for long Kiba!"

Naruto warmed up ALL the instant ramen packages that he could find, and grabbed about four jugs of milk. The feast then began! He ate as much as he could, as fast as he could, without paying attention to the mess he was making. Within minutes, he had ate and drank everything in his path! Naruto let out a loud burp, and stretched out his arms. It was time for a nap! He jumped onto his bed, sending a loud THUD throughout his house, and got ready to sleep. His massive feet could now touch the floor from the end of the bed, and his arms were also hanging off the edges at this point. His clothes had once again tightened around his growing body, ripping in a few places, while his muscles felt as if they were try to show their glory. Naruto's toes and a small part of his sole were now hanging off his sandals, and the strap was getting painfully tight, but he was too focused on sleeping at this point. He soon fell asleep, and smiled as he thought about how big he was going to get.
1121221112221.title: Naruto's Catching up!

choices: They're broken up by someone or something
Naruto and Kiba get into a fight
11212211122212.content:
Naruto only slept for about an hour. He was just way too excited to sleep for too long. He kept dreaming about growing big enough to easily step on Kiba and make him beg for mercy. How awesome would that be?!? Finally, after awhile his eyes snapped open. He grinned and sat up, his head inches from the ceiling.

"Aw yeah! I'm even bigger!" Naruto exclaimed excitedly. His clothes were totally shredded, except for a few scrap remains and his overly stretched green boxers. He had crushed his bed under his bulk, the mattress nearly flat while the wood frame was in pieces all over the room. He got to his feet and slammed his head into the ceiling, breaking through head, shoulders, and chest.

"Oops." Naruto said playfully. "Looks like I'm outgrowing this little apartment!"

He knew there was no way he was going to be able to find clothes that fit him now...then again, even if he DID find clothes that fit him there was no way they would last. He STILL was growing after all. Plus, every time he ate and every time he slept he grew bigger, FASTER! He rubbed his hands together, bent down and started crawling to the front door. With a simple push of his hand the door flew off the hinges and crashed into the building across the street. He tried a bunch of different ways to get out the door....and they all failed. Feet first, arm first, one hand, one foot...nope, there was no way he was going to be squeezing himself out the door. He got to his feet, passing through the roof again. He pushed his hands up through the roof and pressed them against the floor upstairs. He pulled his leg back and kicked out. HARD. The entire wall of his apartment burst outward like a bomb went off. Naruto bent down again and easily crawled out, stretching to his full height again. He stretched his arms up and rolled his shoulders.

"Unngh!" Naruto said loudly. "Man! It feels great to be able to stand up straight in the open again!"

He was getting quite a few stares form onlookers but Naruto ignored them...for now. He was way too concerned with finding Kiba and showing off. The only question was...where would he be? He decided to head toward the Training Field. That was as good a place as any to start searching for him. At his new size he was able to easily make it to the Training Field in only a handful of minutes. He looked around...nothing.

"Darn...he's not here..." He turned around and slammed into something. He fell on his butt and shook his head. "Hey! What the...?"

His mouth dropped open as he looked up...at Kiba! He had grown again. Naruto scrambled to his feet and found himself face to...crotch. He was HALF Kiba's size now! Kiba had also saw the futility in trying to keep himself clothed. He had tied a sheet around his waist in a loincloth like set up, wearing absolutely nothing else.

"Oh...hey again Naruto. What's up?" Kiba said, scratching his head.

"Dammit! Not again! Why are you so much bigger than me? This isn't fair!" Naruto shouted, jumping up and down.

Kiba stuck a finger in his ear and rotated. "Jeez...shut up! You're so loud!"

The few other ninja who had been in the training area quickly vacated. They did NOT want to be near those two if they started fighting. They had no idea what was going on, but they DID know if they stuck around they might end up a stain under a teen foot.

"Then stop growing!" Naruto shouted, kicking Kiba in the leg.

"I can't help this you idiot!" Kiba shouted, shoving Naruto to the ground.
11212211122212.title: Not Quite There...

choices: Naruto's growth rate accelerates
Something happening with Konahamaru...
112122111222121.content:
"Hey! Boss!"

"Huh?" Naruto stood up, and looked down, "Konahamaru!? What are you doing here?"

As soon as Kiba noticed the little kid standing at his and Naruto's feet, he calmed down. He wouldn't want to step on the little guy. He WAS huge, but he wasn't that much of a prick, so he'd wait for him to leave.

"How did you get so big? And why is that guy bigger? Can you make me as big as you guys?"

Naruto sighed. "Can you leave?"

"No way!" Konahamaru yelled, "Not until you tell me how you got so big!"

"We're just growing boys!" Kiba yelled, snickering. "NOW can you leave?"

"Nah! Do you guys wanna play ninja?"

In unison, Naruto and Kiba both yelled, "NO!!! Just leave us alone!"

Konahamaru, being frightened by their booming voices, ran off. The two massive boys looked at each other, and smiled. Now that he was gone, nothing could stop them. Without hesitation, Kiba grabbed Naruto by the arm and flung him as far as he could. He could here Naruto yelling and swearing as he landing in the trees in the distance. Kiba grinned at this, and began walking back to the village.

"What an idiot." Kiba muttered.

As he walked away, Naruto got back up, looking his bruises and scrapes over. It was hard to admit, but Kiba was way to strong for him. But, he WOULD find a way to get bigger no matter what! He realized at this point, that his jacket had burst off when he was flung by Kiba. His sandals were long gone, and he wiggled his massive toes as he felt the soil under his soles. For these few seconds, he was happy about being huge and growing again. But, Kiba being bigger was ruining everything! Naruto stomped to the village, being completely and utterly pissed! This wasn't over!
112122111222121.title: They're broken up by someone or something

choices: Konohamaru, still growing, teaches Kiba a lesson
Meanwhile, Naruto goes on an eating spree for some more size
1121221112221212.content:
Konohamaru ran back into town, away from both Kiba and Naruto. Those two big jerks! He just wanted to play with them! Why were they being so mean to him? If he was bigger he could show them a thing or two! He kicked sullenly at a rock in front of him. He didn't even really question WHY they were so big. You see a lot of weird things, being a ninja and all. He just wanted to know if there was a way that he could get that big too.

As he walked along the road back home he started feeling a little strange. His scarf was feeling a bit...tight around his neck. Not to mention that his shirt was starting to feel tight...his shorts too...AND his sandals! What the heck was going on? He stopped and looked over his body.

"Huh? What's happening...to me?" Konohamaru asked, as he looked.

He was...growing! His body stretched slowly upward, his arms growing longer, his shirt riding up and showing his stomach, slight muscle definition also beginning to appear. He flexed his arms and watched as the bicep slowly, but surely, swelled up, stretching his sleeves to the ripping point. He grinned as he watched his feet fill up his sandals and begin to tear them apart, his toes and the soles of his feet slowly moving off the edge of the sandal. He eagerly ran over to a nearby guard house and measured himself against the door. He was already a foot higher on it then he normally was!

"Yeah! I'm growing! Just like the boss and that Kiba guy!" Konohamaru shouted out in excitement. "Maybe I'll get as big as them and teach them a lesson!"

Konohamaru giggled as he watched his body continue to expand. His shirt soon only covered his chest, his shorts hiking up to around his thighs. His muscles were swelling up at a faster rate as well, his thighs bulging thickly, his calves sticking out behind his legs, his biceps swollen balls of pure size, and his pecs pushing against his shirt, the muscles clearly outlined against the thin material. With a grin he leaned forward, flexing his biceps as he did so, his back flaring out. With a loud ripping sound, his shirt tore straight down the back, the shirt falling to pieces around him. His shorts clung tenaciously to his hips, holding tight even as his thighs started punching tiny holes all over the place. His thick feet had burst the material, the sandals splitting in half and falling on the ground. Konohamaru kicked them away, smiling as he noticed the door frame was level with his eyes. He was so huge! And he was still growing!

The once small boy began running back to Naruto and Kiba, ready to show them a thing or two! All the while he ran he continued to grow taller, his muscles growing thicker and stronger. Whatever was causing him to grow was blessing him with fast growth, reaching eight feet tall and surpassing it within minutes rather than the hours it took Naruto and Kiba to get there. He was looking forward to teaching Naruto and Kiba a lesson. He saw Kiba standing in the Training Field still, stretching. He grinned and ran up to him. "Hey Kiba!"

Kiba turned around and said, "What do you want now you little...squirt?"

Kiba looked UP at Konohamaru's grinning face. "Wha...?"

Konohamaru cracked his knuckles and said, "Time for you to respect the NEW boss!'
1121221112221212.title: The Ranks Swell

choices: Suddenly Naruto begins to grow, finally outdoing Kiba
Someone comes to Naruto's rescue
112122111222122.content:
Naruto landed in the dirt with a loud 'thud,' crushing a cabbage stand underneath his round, muscular butt in the process. He quickly stood up and growled at Kiba who was towering over him.

"GRRR....," Naruto growled as he stood in Kiba's shadow, "I'll show you who's bigger!"

He lunged at Kiba, grabbing a hold of the sheet and using it to fling himself up into his face. The sudden weight caused Kiba to stagger backwards, arm flailing as he toppled backwards onto his back in the wide streets. Onlookers raced for safety as Kiba's massive form collided with the ground, sending up a cloud of dust through the streets and nearby houses.

"HA!" Naruto exclaimed as he sat atop Kiba's chest.

"GRRR...You dirty cheater," Kiba roared as he grabbed Naruto under his arms and flipped him head over heels into a nearby building.

Naruto crashed through the building and into the one behind it, sending the innocent bystanders watching the two giants fight from the windows into a panic. Naruto moaned and massaged his head as he stood up among the rubble of the broken building. He charged at Kiba and latched onto his leg, biting into his flesh, and growling angrily.

"OWW," Kiba roared in pain as he stood on one leg and plucked the gnawing Naruto from his shin. "That does it! You're dead!"

Kiba reared his arm back and slammed Naruto into the ground, leaving a crater twice Naruto's size and shattering the windows of the surrounding buildings from the massive shock wave that ripped through the air. Naruto had the wind knocked out of him from the impact, which left him dazed momentarily. He shook it off and attempted to wiggle free, but Kiba's hold was too tight. He was trapped.

"GRRR...Let me GO," Naruto shouted up at Kiba who merely shook his head and applied more pressure.

"No way," Kiba growled down to him, still upping the pressure on Naruto's spine. "You're going to pay for biting me!"

Naruto continued to struggle against the hand against him, trying to milk out every bit of strength he had.
112122111222122.title: Naruto and Kiba get into a fight

choices: Naruto goes to finish off Kiba
He sees someone as he crashes through the village.
1121221112221221.content:
Naruto kept struggling against Kiba's might. Despite his best efforts, Kiba was too strong for him.
"I n-need to do s-something before he kills me" gasped Naruto, almost fainting as Kiba pressed harder.
"You're not done yet?" Asked Kiba as he placed as much pressure as possible on to Naruto. As Kiba was about to finish Naruto off, he felt his hand cover less of Naruto's muscular body. Naruto pushed against Kiba's hand one last time and finally succeeded.
"What's going on?" Wondered Kiba, giving up his assault on Naruto. Naruto only replied with a deep and bellowing roar as he stood. Naruto was once again growing, but faster than ever before. His pecs bursted with power and his abs became a gigantic 8 pack. Naruto's bicep grew more and more with the rest of his arm and his hand growing too.
"This is great" exclaimed Naruto. His eyes looked down only to be blocked by his enormous chest. Instead, he used his hands to feel the development going on below. His legs gained more power and his feet grew to amazing sizes too. Finally, he felt his crotch. He then found his boxers gave up, leaving him naked.
In delight, Naruto stood up to his full height. Kiba cowered in fear as he stood in Naruto's shadow. He was now face to crotch with Naruto! Naruto was about 60 feet tall and rippling with rock hard muscle. He let out a booming laugh as he saw his opponent only half his size.
"You scared Kiba? You should be!" Said Naruto, as he picked his foe up with one hand and threw him a few miles into the forest.
The civilians looked up at Naruto in horror, intimidated by his enormous stature.
1121221112221221.title: Suddenly Naruto begins to grow, finally outdoin...

choices: Kiba arrives at Naruto's house, and they slowly grow throughout the night
Kiba arrives with Shikamaru, who is the same size as him!
11212212.content:
Naruto sprinted out of his house, trying to avoid being stared at as he ran. It was obvious that he had grown, and he didn't want people gawking and staring at him like he was some kind of freak. However, before he could reach the store, Naruto ran in to someone at full speed. He was knocked to the ground, while the other person was pushed forward, landing a few feet away.

Kiba sat up and yelled, "You IDIOT!"

'You were in my way! It's not my fault!"

Him and Kiba both stood up at the same time, ready to continue the argument, until they saw each other. Naruto was shocked to see that Kiba stood a few inches taller than him. His muscles were even slightly thicker and more defined than his own! Kiba had also left his house without a shirt today, leaving him only in his tight pair of pants. His feet had outgrown his sandals, which was weird. Even at his size, his sandals shouldn't have burst off. Naruto snickered as a thought ran through is head. Dog boy had big feet!

"You're... bigger than usual." Naruto said, smirking.

Kiba grinned. "I could say the same thing to you! I thought this was only happening to me!"

With that, they began walking along the streets, talking. They both seemed to be happy that they had found someone else who was growing!

"That's wierd..." Kiba said. "I just started growing a day or two ago for no apparent reason. Now you're saying that a scroll YOU to grow?"

Naruto nodded. "Uh-huh. But it really doesn't matter. I've got an idea!"

"What do you mean?" Kiba asked.

"Well, why don't you come over to my house tonight? You know, for a sleepover. I've been mostly growing at night, so maybe if we stay up, we can watch ourselves actually get bigger"

Kiba looked him in the eye, and sighed. "Fine. It sounds like it could be fun!"

"Great!" Naruto yelled, as he began walking away. "I'll see you tonight!"

And, after this meeting, Naruto ran to Ichiraku Ramen. After all, it was still morning, and it wouldn't be until tonight when the sleepover started. As he sat down, he ordered the biggest bowl of pork ramen available, and began eating.

*Skipping to the later in the day, right before the sleepover*
11212212.title: A Slumber Party!

choices: Kiba wins!
Naruto wins!
112122121.content:
Naruto slammed a bag of food down onto the table in his kitchen. He had stocked up on a lot of different foods and drinks for the sleep over tonight. He smiled as he pulled it all out, putting it into the cupboards and fridge. He had never had a real sleepover before. The other kids had kind of ignored him or only put up with him while he was in class. This was his first true slumber party with a real friend. He laughed a little and pulled out one of the sodas he bought and cracked it open. He was really looking forward to this. It helped that he was going to end up probably growing bigger through the night. He bought a few caffeinated drinks as well to make sure they would both stay up all night to totally experience the sensations of growing.

"Huh...I wonder what it feels like to grow..." Naruto said out loud. The growth process usually happened to gradually you could barely tell it was happening. The way his body was growing now, however, he would be able to feel every moment of it. He didn't worry about it hurting or anything since if it DID hurt he would have felt it in the night, when it happened before.

"Oh man...I hope I grow bigger than Kiba!" Naruto said with a laugh. "That would be so cool!"

He said that, but he was more glad that he wasn't going through this whole process alone. It was amazing and he was REALLY glad it was happening to him but being huge alone might be kind of lonely.

Suddenly, there was a loud knocking sound from his front door. Naruto grinned and ran over to it, pulling it open. "About time you got here Kiba!"

Kiba pushed his way past Naruto and said, "Yeah, yeah, I'm sure you were waiting with bells on."

He laughed and looked around. "So this is where you live huh? It looks kinda small..."

Naruto shut the door and said, "You're kidding right? You're like over eight feet tall. EVERY place is small."

"Yeah, but this is just like three rooms! You've lived here your whole life?"

"Well you get used to it. There's only one bed so you're going to have to sleep on the floor."

Kiba laughed and stretched, his knuckles scraping the ceiling. "Yeah right, good joke Naruto! I'll be taking that bed if we do any sleeping tonight."

"Hey! It's my house!"

"And I'm a guest!"

Naruto crossed his arms and said, "Okay, I know how we can settle this!"

He sat down at the kitchen table and slammed his right elbow on top of it. "Let's arm wrestle for it!"

Kiba smirked and sat down opposite Naruto, lifting his arm up against Naruto's. "Alright! You want to start this sleep over by me humiliating you that's fine with me!"

He gripped Naruto's hand and said, "Here are the rules! One hand only! If any part of the hand touches the table, you lose! No whining, no cheating! The stronger guy wins!"

"Ha! Fine! Sounds good to me!"

They gripped each others hand, hard, staring into each others' eyes with a grin. "On three then?" Kiba said.

"Right! One...two..." Naruto began to count down.

"THREE!" they shouted at the same time.

Instantly both boy's put their full efforts into beating the other, their biceps bulging massively, Naruto's sleeve straining while no material was holding Kiba's muscle back. Veins erupted all over Kiba's mound of muscle, fueling his thick and powerful arm. Naruto was already starting to sweat, his arm trembling just slightly. It didn't help that Kiba had a few inches on him or that his arm was thicker. Kiba grinned fiercely and increased the pressure, moving Naruto's arm slowly, but surely, towards the table. Naruto wasn't about to give up however! He increased his force, pushing Kiba's arm back to the starting position...and started moving it toward HIS side of the table! Kiba grabbed the edge of the table, the wooden surface splintering slightly as his powerful hand crushed it. He pushed back, once again putting them to the starting position. Kiba's chest was glistening with sweat and Naruto's palm was growing sweaty. It was pretty much evenly matched...but who would come out on top?
112122121.title: Starting the Night

choices: Kiba and Naruto find something to do (They begin growing at  very slow rate)
Kiba and Naruto find something to do (Their growth is slightly noticeable)
1121221211.content:
With a final burst of strength, Kiba finally smashed Naruto's arm into the table, the pressure breaking the table in half. This caused both of them to fall down. Both of the massive boys sat up, smiling at each other.

Kiba laughed, then flexed his bicep. "I TOLD you I'd win!"

"You got lucky!" Naruto said, putting his hands behind is head. "But... a deal's a deal. So, you can have the bed, IF we go to sleep. But, I want to see what happens later into the night..."

"Heh, you're not the only one. This is going to be awesome!"

Naruto and Kiba sat cross-legged, across from each other. For the first hour, all they really did was talk. They told each other how each of them started growing, what they had done in the last few days, and how much they were LOVING it! They were SO excited o grow throughout the night! Though, they could only wonder when they would start growing. It was already close to midnight... and, they had grown more than two feet taller throughout the day, so imagine how much they'd grow tonight!

"So, what do you want to do?" Naruto asked.

Kiba smiled. "Why don't we compare a few things?"

"Heh... why not? I could be fun!"

Both of the massive , young teens stood up. The first things they compared were height and muscle mass. Naruto moaned as they stood back to back, realizing that Kiba was almost half a foot taller than him. Plus, he could tell that Kiba had developed more in the muscle apartment than he had. Naruto turned around, smiling... he had to catch up. They sat down after this, and put their right feet against each other. As soon as they did this, Naruto's jaw dropped. Kiba's feet were at least three or four inches bigger than his! He really did have big feet, even at this size. Kiba blushed, and crossed his legs once again. Usually, people didn't notice this... but, now that he was growing, more people were noticing.

"So..." He said, breaking the silence.
1121221211.title: It's Close...

choices: Kiba and Naruto eat
*knock knock* A visitor?
11212212111.content:
"What do you wanna do?" Kiba asked, leaned back against the wall.

"Hmm..." Naruto said, thinking about it. "I don't know...what do people do at sleepovers?"

"What, you've never had a sleepover before?" Kiba said, arching an eyebrow.

Naruto shook his head and said, "Nope. You saw me when we were kids. No one wanted anything to do with me."

Kiba frowned a little and said, "Yeah..." He felt a little guilty, remembering those times he had not only ignored Naruto but outright antagonized him. He blushed a little as he remembered. He was kind of a dick when he was a kid.

"Ha! Hey you're blushing!" Naruto said, laughing and pointing at Kiba.

Kiba glared at him and shouted, "Shut up! I'm not blushing! It's just too fricken hot in here!"

He got up and opened a window, a cool breeze flowing in through the window. "There. That's better."

Kiba sat back down and crossed his arms, not looking at Naruto. Naruto smirked and crawled over to Kiba. He grabbed his foot and held it up, looking over. Kiba blushed again and said, "W-What the hell are you doing?"

"I'm just looking at your foot...I never realized how big your feet were!" Naruto said, poking and prodding at each part of the foot. Kiba's toes clenched as Naruto poked at the ball. When he ran a finger down the sole, Kiba shivered a little, his back arching a bit. That felt good. Naruto grinned and pressed his foot against Kiba's again. His smile faltered a bit. "Hey Kiba...take a look at this."

Kiba opened his eyes and looked down. "What? Yeah, my foot is bigger than yours. We already figured that out you knucklehead."

"Not that! Look! Your foot is bigger but...it's bigger than it was before!"

"Huh?" Kiba looked down and said, "I don't see it..."

Naruto looked at the bottom of Kiba's foot. His toes were now pressing against the ball of Kiba's foot. They had been at the bottom of Kiba's toes before. His foot had been about as wide as Kiba's foot but now he could see the edges of Kiba's foot on either side of his foot. "You grew!"

Kiba grinned and said, "Awesome! I guess it's already starting! Hey! I have an idea!"

He stood up and grabbed a pen. He stood straight against the wall and ran the pen over the wall, leaving a dark black mark. "Hey! That's my wall!"

Kiba laughed and said, "Don't worry about it! Here, stand on the other wall!"

He pushed Naruto straight against the wall and drew a line over Naruto's head. "Okay! Now every hour we're going to remeasure ourselves to see how much we're growing!"

Naruto laughed and said, "Cool! That's a great idea!"

He noticed that he was looking up slightly more now. He didn't let that thought bother him though. He was having too much fun at his first sleepover to care about who was bigger...at least right now. Kiba set the pen down and a low rumble filled the air. Kiba chuckled and said, "Looks like I'm hungry! Got any decent food in this place?"

Naruto pointed out the kitchen and said, "I bought a bunch of different stuff so eat whatever you want."

Kiba grinned and dashed into the kitchen. Almost instantly Naruto heard the sound of cupboards opening and closing as Kiba pulled out a bunch of different foods and snacks to eat. He had a REAL ravenous appetite it would seem.

As the table was finished being set, Kiba and Naruto sat down. A dab of drool could be seen hanging from Kiba's mouth, and he started eating without hesitation. But, before Naruto could start, there was a knock at the door.

"I'll be back in a second!"

"Okay!" Kiba answered, having trouble talking as he chewed. "Hurry up!"

Naruto wondered... who could be here at this time? As he opened the door, his questions were answered, and he was also pretty shocked.

"Hey Boss, heard you were having a sleepover!"

Naruto looked down, but not as much as he usually did, to see Konohamaru. But, he was facing his chest, meaning that he was at little over six feet tall! His shirst was in tatters, barely blocking any parts of his upper body, but his muscles weren't very impressive at the moment. He was still a young child, and it was hard to form muslce. Konahamaru's pants were still in tact, but they looked as if they were a pair of shorts that were too small for him. His buldge was noticeable, and the material around it was being heavily strained. Naruto looked down to see Konohamaru's now massive bare feet, which had probably destroyed his sandals when he grew, and watched as he wiggled his toes in delight.

"I'm one of the big guys now, so I can join in the sleepover, right?"

Naruto grabbed Konohamaru by the hand, pulling him inside, and then slammed the door shut. Before anything else, he asked Konohamaru how he had grown. He simply retorted that he had began growing yesterday at a gradual rate, and it hadn't stopped since.

Naruto sighed. "Fine, you can stay..."

"Yes! Yes! YES!" Konohamaru yelled. "This is going to be awesome!"

Naruto knew that Konohamaru was growing like him and Kiba, so he didn't want him, and then them to get caught. Plus, he liked the fact that he had another person at his sleepover. Suddenly, him and Konohamaru heard a crash.
112122121112.title: The little (and growing) Brat arrives...
