1121221211121.content:
Konohamaru snickered as they heard the crash coming from the kitchen. "Sounds like Kiba is wrecking up your kitchen boss!"

Naruto groaned and said, "He must be looking for more food! I already brought most of it out! How much more could he want?"

Both boys made their way over to the kitchen where a strange sight greeted them. Kiba was sitting on the floor, amongst a few pieces of splintered wood...and his head was almost at the ceiling! Both Naruto and Konohamaru gaped as they looked up at Kiba's sheepishly smiling face. "H-Hey guys!"

Kiba had started growing, his weight being too much for the chair, shattering it, while his body took up more and more space. His head pressed against the ceiling, which forced him to duck down, leaning against the sink, knocking the taps off which caused icy cold water to splash against his now exposed back, his shirt long since having ripped off due to his immense new physique. His muscles were even more impressive now, his wide chest looking thick and powerful, his abs more defined, as an extra row had appeared on his torso, giving him an eight pack. His arms, one of which was smashing into the cupboards now, while the other was putting major pressure on the wall, were bulging with muscle, his forearms looking thick and powerful, his fingers easily putting holes in the walls, though he wasn't strong enough to push them down entirely. His head pressed up against the ceiling again as he massive knees followed, cracks radiating out from all three areas, Kiba's pecs squashing up against his chin, his toes slightly bent against the wall as the growth came to a stop, leaving Kiba crunched and uncomfortable in the now tiny kitchen. His enormous bulge, barely kept hidden from sight by a pair of underwear, was shoved against the doorway, blocking it, right in front of Naruto and Konohamaru.

Everything was silent except for the creaking and groaning coming from the kitchen. Kiba twisted and turned and tried to break free but he was wedged in just such a way that he couldn't break down any of the walls, and he couldn't even move! "Grr...raaagh...dammit! I'm trapped!"

Naruto finally found his voice and shouted, "Forget about that! Look at what you did to my kitchen!"

Kiba rolled his eyes and said, "Shut up! It's not like I did this on purpose!"

"Hey! Don't talk to the boss like that!" Konohamaru piped up, shaking his fist at Kiba.

"Oh great, you let the kid in here too?" Kiba said, unable to see Konohamaru from his position. "What did you do that for?"

"He's growing too! Since yesterday!" Naruto explained.

"WHAT?!? Him too? Even that pipsqueak?" Kiba shouted in disbelief.

"I'm not a pipsqueak anymore! I'm going to grow up even bigger and stronger than you and then I'll show you a thing or two!" The ambitious boy shouted, sticking his tongue out at Kiba.

"Yeah, yeah, I'm sure you'll REALLY put me in my place." Kiba said sarcastically. "In the meantime, can we PLEASE find a way to get me out of here? I can't move at all!"

"Okay...let's see...maybe we can, I don't know, break down the walls somehow?" Naruto suggested.

"Yeah, great idea Naruto, but HOW do you suggest we do that?" Kiba asked in exasperation.

"Let's blow the walls down!" Konohamaru suggested, pulling out a few bombs from his torn pockets.

"No way! We're not blowing up my house!" Naruto said, taking the bombs away from Konohamaru.

"Yeah! You could bring the whole roof down on my head!" Kiba shouted.

"Fine! It was just an idea!" Konohamaru pouted, crossing his arms.

As the three boys continued to bounce off ideas from each other...

Naruto was about to retort angrily, but he said, "Fine. It's not like I'll be using it once I get your size, Kiba!"

Kiba said, "Yeah, but how should I get out without the roof crashing on my head!"

Naruto was the one with the idea this time, saying "What if we just lift the roof off! If we keep it in one piece, and if we're strong enough, we can just pick up the whole roof, then Kiba can climb out of from the wall."

Kiba then said, "That's not a bad idea. I'm surprised it came from you."

Naruto said, "Shut it dog-breath! I have plenty of good ideas!"

Kiba then said, "What do you think Konohamaru? ... Konohamaru?"

Naruto added, "Where are you Kon" his sentence cut short by his head hitting the ceiling.

It turns out that while Kiba and Naruto were passing ideas back and forth, Naruto was growing.

Konohamaru had watched in a silent awe, backing away as Naruto got bigger.

"This is awesome! I'm growing too!" Naruto blurted out in delight.

"Oh boy" Kiba mumbled. There would be less people to be able to help him, and he might lose his spot as the biggest.

Naruto didn't care, however. He was loving this too much. He sat down on the floor cross-legged, facing the door, as he didn't have room to stand up anymore.

As he grew, his bulging and expanding muscles tore through his shirt and pants, leaving him in his green undies.

His chest broadened, his pecs getting thicker with muscles. His biceps became closer and closer to being spherical, as they became thick with power.

His abs became more well-defined, and he was developing a solid 8-pack. Even his legs became like tree-trunks, and were bulging with muscle.

Speaking of bulge, his was growing, becoming larger even for his current size. It strained his green boxers more and more.

As Naruto sat, his head began getting closer to the ceiling once more. He had to scoot back to make room for himself.

He got larger and larger, setting his knee on his bed, his butt hitting the couch now.

He blushed a little as he felt the fabric of his boxers rip completely, and soon after that, the waistband snapped. The material rested on his huge package, obscuring it for the most part.

When he was only about a foot shorter than Kiba, his growth finally stopped. He sat with his legs crossed and his knees in opposite corners of the room. One of his feet was sticking into the door to the kitchen, and his big toe ended up touching Kiba's package.

Naruto had a little more wiggle room than Kiba, though, as he was a little smaller, and the room was a little larger.

"Hey! Cut it out!" Kiba yelled as he felt the sudden sensation on his balls.

Konohamaru sighed in relief as he left the room, but he wouldn't be left out of the growth.

He stood on the balcony outside Naruto's apartment as his height grew quite fast. Like the other two, his muscles grew quite a bit, but not nearly as much. He looked scrawny compared to the other two, though he still looked like a regular body builder.

Most of his clothes ripped off, and he took off all the scraps. His undies were holding on, containing his package, though barely.

When all was said and done, Naruto's roof was about chin level to Konohamaru, though he was still feet shorter than even Naruto, much to his own disappointment.

Regardless, now it would be much easier to get the other two out. He could just lift up the roof with their help.

"W-What do you wanna do now?" Kiba asked, still blushing because of what Naruto had said about his big feet.

"Well..." Naruto muttered, smirking at his massive friend. "What can we do?"

Both of the young boys thought about it. They could stay in the house, and wait for their growth spurts to go into hyper drive, or maybe...

"You want to go somewhere?" Naruto asked.

Kiba smiled. "No ones out at this time... it'd be nice to go outside without people gawking at me! Let's go!"

"Your nuts," naruto replied, giving Kiba a funny look. "I love it when they stare at me!"

"Whatever!" Kiba yelled, "That's your opinion..."

Both of the massive, young teens stared at eachother, Naruto having to look up a little more to look Kiba in the eye. As Kiba stood up, his head hit the ceiling.

"OW!" Kiba yelled, wincing in pain. "The hell!?"

Naruto stood there, baffled by what had just happened. He stood up, his head about a half a foot away from the ten foot high ceiling. They both turned and looked at eachother, both yelling in unison.

"We GREW!"

They both were shocked. They were around eight or seven feet tall when the sleepover had started, and now!? They had both grown about two feet taller, give or take a few inches. Now only left in their boxers, they snickered. It was so quick! They hadn't noticed, but they were actually gradually growing larger at a continous rate!

114.content:
As Narutuo slept, he slowly began to grow. The green dust worked its way through his chakra channels increasing the flow and increasing the potential amount to nearly unlimited levels. As he slept his feet grew over the edge of his bed and were soon resting on the floor of his house. His right arm moved into his kitchen and his fingers eventually broke through the window. His left arm splintered his front door and passed through it. His back inched up the wall until his head hit the ceiling. It was at this time Naruto woke up.

"Huh, whuh, what's going on?" He muttered to himself still half asleep. He rubbed his eyes and looked around. "Whoah! Everything's so small!" He brought his hand up to his eyes and saw his fingers slowly stretching out. "No way! I'm growing!" He looked down at himself and saw his ripped pajamas. "Gah! I'm naked!" He looked around for something to cover himself with. He couldn't see anything but something forced his closet door open. He was surprised to see the jumpsuit he had been wearing that day was flowing out of the closet. Whatever had made him grow was making his clothes grow as well. Naruto grabbed his pants and tried to pull them on. Since he was now completely sandwiched inside his own house this wasn't easy. His left foot kicked out through the wall and when he tried to sit up his head went through the ceiling. The more he tried to move and adjust himself the worse the damage he caused. Finally, he was left sitting in a pile of rubble. He quickly got dressed and stood up. Judging by the house next to him he was nearing at least sixty feet in height. Not only that, he was still growing! Thinking fast, Naruto jumped and managed to make it to the outskirts of the village.

"I shouldn't cause any damage out here." He said to himself.

Naruto watched the village shrink away as he grew and grew and grew. Soon his toes were larger than the nearby houses and still he grew larger!

"How big am I going to get?" he wondered, seeing even the Hokage Mountain shrink away to a half inch before him.

Finally, the growth stopped. Naruto kneeled down and was shocked by how small everything looked. He could scoop up the entire village in the palm of his hand if he wanted to. He grinned in spite of himself. No one would mess with him or his village ever again! Not only that, there was absolutely no one who could even think of opposing him as Hokage! He laid on his stomach so that his chin was resting on the ground in back of the Hokage Mountain. No matter where one stood in the village they would have a clear look of Naruto's godly face grinning down at them. But not with malevolence. Naruto may have been mistreated as a child by these villagers, but he knew there were people who cared about him and as Hokage he had to protect this village. He smiled and waited for everyone to wake up. He was eager to start his rule as Hokage.
114.title: Mountainous Naruto

1141.content:
Naruto stared down at the village, waiting impatiently for day to break. But he'd only been asleep for a few hours when he started growing and day was a long ways away. His eyes started to close and he quickly opened them again. He wouldn't fall asleep! For the next hour he slowly toed the line between sleeping and wakefullness until, around one in the morning, he fell back to sleep. Luckily for the villagers his breath was high above the buildings and he didn't snore. But for all this good luck, there was a substantial amount of bad luck. As he slept, he started to drool. For Naruto, this was a couple of drops, a thin stream at most. For the villagers, this was a deluge! It started out slow. Drops no bigger than rain pattered the rooftops. This was no bother for most of the villagers, but Shikamaru, who'd been having trouble sleeping anyway, was annoyed by the pattering.

"What a drag!" He moaned, crawling out of bed and forcing his curtains open. His eyes bugged out of his head as threw open the window and looked at the sky. A humongous face was sleeping at the edge of the village. And, judging by the trademark whisker like markings on the cheeks, the giant was Naruto.

"Well, this is just perfect." Shikamaru said sarcastically. Before he could pull his head back in a drop of drool landed on his head. He quickly pulled his head back in and felt the spot the drool had landed on. "And now I've Naruto's spit on my head. I should've just stayed in bed."

He went into the bathroom and washed his hair before crawling back into bed and pulling the covers over his head.

As Shikamaru actively ignored the pattering, knowing it to be Naruto's drool, Naruto slept on, his stream of drool increasing. Soon, it began to puddle on the edges of the village and flow through the streets. Within the hour, a full five feet of standing drool was washing through the village and as Naruto slept on, more and more drool exited his mouth and hit areas all over the village. Shikamaru sighed as he heard something splintering next door. He moved to the window and was disgusted to see it covered in drool. He threw it open and was shocked again to see the amount of drool flowing throughout the village. Looking up as best as he could, he saw the drool falling from Naruto's slightly parted lips.

"If he doesn't stop that, the whole village is going to go under!"

As Shikimaru came to this conclusion, villagers all over the village started awakening to the flooding. In the next hour, every villager was awake and screaming as they saw the massive giant slowly drowning them in drool! Naruto remained blissfully unaware of this and slept on. With six hours before dawn, there was a good chance the entire village would be wiped out before Naruto woke up. Anbu Black Ops had been dispatched and were currently peppering Naruto's face, trying to wake him with shuriken, kunai, and any jutsu they could think of.

Five hours later, as the sun began to rise, the village was completely covered in drool. The villagers had all evacuated to the inside of the Hokage Mountain. The drool was flowing thickest there, in a waterfall, but they entered via a few secret passages. They would just have to wait this storm out.

114121.content:
Naruto carefully eased his fingers under the ground until his hand was completely under the village. He then brought his hand slowly up removing the village and a chunk of the surrounding land. The village rested comfortably in the palm of his hand and Naruto titled it ever so slightly, draining the worst of the drool from the village streets. It was the best he could do since if he tried anything else he would probably end up causing more destruction then helping. But he also knew if he didn't keep the village someplace safe, he might lose track of it and end up destroying it. He couldn't risk that, so he was going to keep the village with him at all times. In order to do that, he had to find a place big enough on his body he could place the village. He thought about putting it on his head, but he would probably end up shaking them off. The same problem presented itself with his shoulder. In fact, there was almost no place to put it that wouldn't fall off of him. Finally, he decided to keep it on his sandal. He eased it in between his big and second toe and found that the village fit quiet comfortably under his toes. As long as he didn't wiggle his toes, the village would be perfectly safe.

Now that the village was safe, it was time to start traveling to the other villages and laying down the new law. Naruto was the new giant Hokage and if any village tried to invade Konohagakure they would be instantly destroyed.

With this thought in mind, Naruto started walking towards the nearest village.

1141211.content:
Before Naruto had even taken one step, he felt a sick swooping sensation pass through him. He looked down at the ground and watched as it continued to move away from him! He was growing even more! Whatever was in that scroll, it was extremely powerful! Naruto looked down at the village to make sure it was okay and it was. Slowly, his toes grew larger and larger around the village until it fit completely between his big and second toe with quite a bit of room on either side. Naruto grinned, happy that the village was now small enough to be placed comfortably on his body. He licked his right index finger and lifted the village up with his left index finger. He very carefully placed a drop of spit on the bottom of the village and laid it back down on his sandal. It adhered instantly to the sandal's material and stuck in one place. Now Naruto wouldn't have to worry about it sliding off into oblivion. He noticed he had stopped growing for now. He wondered if he would end up growing even more before this whole thing was over. Who could say?

Meanwhile, Konohagakure was starting to settle down in it's new position. The villagers left the safety of the Hokage Mountain and looked around. Most of the drool was long gone, though it was going to take an intense cleaning to wash it all away for good. Luckily Naruto had showered yesterday morning so his feet didn't stink. As long as he kept up with regular washing, they wouldn't have to worry about beind suffocated and it was true that nothing could touch them with Naruto's massive toes on either side of them. Not to mention the extreme drop of Naruto's sandal. Yes, all in all, this wasn't such a bad turn of events at all. Within the hour, the villagers were cleaning up the mess Naruto had inadvertently made and would be done by the time the day was over. Shikamaru had managed to evade Ino and was lazing around on someone's roof. He was on his back and looking up at the sky. He could see just beyond Naruto's toe to a massive pillar of flesh clad in orange rising into the sky. Beyond that, there wasn't much to see. Shikamaru sighed as he stared. Leave it to Naruto to leave them in a situation that required so much work...

"Shikamaru! Get your lazy butt down here and start cleaning with the rest of us!" Ino shouted waving a mop from the street.

Shikamaru sighed again and rolled off the roof, sliding down the wall and landing on the street.

"Fine you nag. Let's get this over with."

"That's the spirit!" Ino said. "Let's get to...wait a minute! NAG?!?!?"

Life would soon return to normal for Konohagakure but it would be a different kind of normal. A better normal.

11412112.content:
It was a little weird for Naruto, after all he had an entire village sitting safely between his big and second toe.

Now Naruto always had an ego problem, but this was ridiculous. Having the power to crush several villages at once underfoot certainly boosted his ego, and now he had a goal. Forget becoming Hokage, Naruto wanted to become more, how about God? After all, it really couldn't be argued he wasn't godly, and anyone who did argue that fact would find themselves facing the bottom of a little toe really quickly.

Naruto stood up and decided on his direction. If he was going to rule the world, he had to start somewhere. Picking a direction, he started walking, not noticing his massive soles had already taken out a few villages below.

To the people in the village between his toes, it was a little strange. Suddenly they were pretty much surrounded by these massive mountains, so tall that light barely got in. But they weren't mountains, they were the big and second toe of a teenage boy. That would take some adjusting to.

114121121.content:
As Naruto lifted each of his mighty feet and brought them crashing down to earth, his body started to expand again. Naruto looked around him in pleasure as the ground moved further away, his power increasing, his authority as a god asserting itself all the more. The villagers looked on in shock, pausing in their cleaning, watching as the mountainous toes around them grew higher and higher. The small amount of light that was able to reach them grew more diffuse as the toes rose higher.blocking out more light. Tsunade stood on the balcony of the Hokage building and watched as the area grew darker. Since there was no way to fight Naruto, the village had decided to accept him as a natural entity.

"We're going to have to find some way to make sure light can still reach us." she thought to herself. "It would be too gloomy living in eternal night, with only the electric lights to see by."

She returned to her desk to make a note about this before addressing the current group of ninja that had arrived in her office. With no villages nearby, there was no visible way of stimulating economy. So what was the Leaf village supposed to do about food? Tsunade sighed and resigned herself to what was sure to be a very long morning.

Naruto, meanwhile, had grown even more immense. He looked down at his foot and saw a speck of dust that was the Leaf village. He grinned, knowing that everyone was looking at him. They were acknowledging him as someone who really mattered. Someone who had their lives in his hands. The idea of so much power was intoxicating to Naruto. He wondered if he would ever stop growing. Why should he? Why shouldn't the whole world be able to be cradled in his arms? Naruto laughed at this idea and continued searching for the other hidden villages. After awhile, though, he gave up on it. The villages were all indistinguishable specks to him now. So what should he do?

Naruto paused from his walking and looked down. Surrounding his toes was a faint white mist, but to the people of the earth they were thick clouds. He was so large his toes pierced the clouds.

Grinning, he lifted one foot and pressed it down into the earth. He looked at the new footprint, grinning at its size. It was many miles long and wide, and severel miles deep.

He decided to deliver his ultimatum to the world. Cupping his hands to his mouth he delivered his message.

"I AM NARUTO, AND I AM GOD! YOU WILL ALL BOW TO ME AND WORSHIP ME AS I CONTINUE TO GROW. ALL PEOPLE MUST WORSHIP ME, ADORE ME, LOVE ME, FEAR ME! I WANT A STATUE MADE OF ME IN EVERY VILLAGE OF GIGANTIC PROPORTIONS STANDING ABOVE THE TOWN. ITS TOES SHOULD BE LARGER THAN A HOUSE AND YOU WILL ALL WORSHIP AT ITS FEET."

Finishing with his ultimatum, Naruto then made a decision. He wanted to feel the earth under his soles. So he pulled off his left sandle and dropped it, and it wiped out many villages with the impact. Taking off the other sandle he slid the sandle so the village was dropped from the sandle to the sweaty skin between his big and second toe. He couldn't tell if the village was ok, but at that point he didn't care anymore.

He continued to walk along, demolishing cities, villages, forests, lakes and mountains all in one go under each foot step.

114121121111.content:
"Well, what's it gonna be?!" the titanic Naruto demanded of the village lodged between his toes. The genin, now so gargantuan that even mountains were nothing to his toes, was truly godly in stature, a force that no being on Earth could dream of challenging and emerging victorious. In addition to his size, the Hidden Leaf Village was barely clinging onto the minute amount of space between his toes as it was; one angry wiggle of Naruto's phalanges and the entire settlement would fall miles to their doom, killing everyone upon impact. After planning out the outcomes of both choices, there was really only one thing the village could do.

"Lady Tsunade, you can't do this!" Shizune protested as she followed the village leader to the top of the Hokage Mansion.

"What choice do we have, Shizune?" the buxom blonde sighed in defeat. "It's either do this or have everyone die. Besides, he won't really be the Hokage; it's just a title that'll satisfy his ego. As long as we remain alive, we can figure out something to stop Naruto and bring him back down to size."

"I hope you're right, Lady Tsunade..."

Wasting no more time lest the orange ninja become impatient, the Fifth Hokage began to perform a series of hand signs, readying a unique jutsu that was limited to only the strongest of jonin, along with the members of the Yamanaka family. "Ninja Art: Mind Link Jutsu!" she shouted as the jutsu was complete, a mental connection established between her and the towering giant above them. "Alright, let's just hope this works. Naruto, can you hear me?"

"Huh?!" Naruto asked in confusion, his voice heard for thousands of miles. "What was that? Grandma Tsunade, was that you?!"

"Ugh, just don't talk, you moron!" the Hokage barked as she covered her ears just in time to avoid going deaf. "Yes, it's me. I've established a mental connection to your mind, so I'm able to talk directly into your thoughts. Anyways, I have something to tell you, but only if you'll think it instead."

"I don't think you're callin' the shots here anymore, Grandma," he answered with an arrogant chuckle. "You can tell me right now."

"Ugh, fine! Well, on behalf of the village, I've decided to step down for the good of everyone in the Village Hidden in the Leaves. I hereby appoint you, Naruto, to be my successor as the Sixth Hokage."

"Heh, you mean it?" Naruto replied with glee. "You're not just sayin' it, right? You really mean it?"

"Of course I do, Naruto," Tsunade lied, making sure to pretend she sounded sincere in her answer. "I can think of no one better to run the village."

"Awesome!" Lifting up his other foot, the giant ninja stomped the ground in triumph as he fist-pumped with his right hand, accidentally wiping out several smaller villages beneath his sole. "Hehe, well, in that case...I don't want to be Hokage!"

"WHAT?!" the entire village protested in unison.

"I'm a god now, and gods can't be lame heads of villages," he explained. "No, if I'm gonna do this, I need to be something better, something worthy of someone like me. From this day forward, there will be no more Hokages. From now on, there is only me, Naruto Uzumaki, the First - and only - Hinokami of the Village Hidden in the Leaves! Worship and obey your Hinokami, and I'll rule the Leaf Village better than any Hokage ever did! Believe it!"

"You have got to be kidding me..." Shizune sighed.

"That idiot!" Tsunade growled as she disabled the link. "I swear, I'm gonna kill Naruto if we ever get him back to normal!"

"Now then," Naruto pondered, "what to do as my first order as Hinokami...?"

As Naruto continued to trek across the world, spreading his ultimatum (and no doubt continuing to grow), the village was still safely secure between his toes. Naruto's foot sweat had effectively glued the village to his foot, preventing it from sliding off into the abyss. Tsunade stared out at the new landscape, her eye twitching. She had been able to force the village to adapt to the sudden changes, but she was starting to get annoyed by Naruto's indecisiveness. The boy, it seemed, could not just pick a position to put the Leaf Village in. "But we can still live like this." she reminded herself. "As long as Naruto doesn't crush us, we can still live like this."

She turned to Shizune and said, "Send word to every available carpenter in the Leaf Village. We'd better start constructing that statue."

Shizune nodded and quickly set out to spread the word. Tsunade looked out the window and said, "Now we just have to find a place to put it..."

As all this was going on, Sasuke was sitting at the top of the Hokage Mountain, staring out at the landscape of Naruto's foot. Looking up he couldn't even see the massive face of his friend and rival. All he could see was a pillar of pink skin that eventually changed to a pillar of orange. Sasuke felt totally inferior to Naruto. It wasn't a feeling he normally had, or liked. Right now, Naruto had enough power to wipe out all existence on the planet if he wanted. Sasuke felt jealous and frustrated. Why did this power go to Naruto? It wasn't right, and it wasn't fair. Little did Sasuke know, the same power that caused Naruto was grow, that strange green dust, had blown throughout the village since Naruto's growth. While most of it was lost, enough had found it's way to the Mountain and Sasuke was now breathing it in. Soon, he would start growing as well, though at a much slower rate.

The race was on.

114121121122.content:
As the village built the statue of their golden god, Sasuke, up on the mountain, was feeling woozy. He had no idea about the changes he was about to undergo.

Naruto continued to walk along, expanding and loving as his large feet crushed the world below. He wondered how large he'd get, but secretly hoped he would never stop growing. Then the whole universe could worship and adore him.

But that was probably going to be difficult, as Naruto's rival was about to become some tough competition.

Sasuke looked up, and was stunned. It looked like the entire village and mountain was shrinking beneath him. However Naruto's toes didn't look any smaller. The village was diminishing, and soon Saskue stood taller than the mountain. His bare feet stood on the bare earth that was Naruto's toe-skin, as they grew larger and larger, lengthing. Pretty soon he was staring down at the tiny village that could fit under his big toe. It was still shrinking, and soon it was small enough to fit under his little toe.

In a moment of heat, Saskue raised his foot, enjoying the sensation of being larger than something else. He lowered it, and completely flattened the entire village underneath his bare soles. Grinding his foot like someone grinding a cigarret butt, Sasuke then looked up.

Naruto seemd to be shrinking. And it finally dawned on Sasuke, Naruto wasn't shrinking, he - Sasuke was growing! It seemed like the village was shrinking as Sasuke and Naruto grey in sync, but now Sasuke was expanding at a greater rate. If it held up, Sasuke would out grow Naruto, a feeling that he greatly enjoyed. He couldn't wait to have Naruto begging underneath his toe...
114121121122.title: Sasuke starts growing faster

choices: Sasuke continues to grow bigger than Naruto
Naruto's growth kicks in again, helping him catch up to Sasuke
1141211211221.content:
The last moments of the village played out slowly. Once second, Sasuke appeared on the edge of the village, enormous, and growing bigger. Sakura, Ino, and others were cheering on his sudden change, preferring being stuck to Sasuke then Naruto. However, that elation didn't last as Sasuke raised his foot over the tiny village and slowly brought it down. Everyone had different reactions.

"No! Sasuke how could you?!?!?" Sakura screamed in fear, while Inner Sakura raged and threw things around.

"I can't believe Sasuke could be so cruel!!" Ino shrieked.

Shikamaru sighed and said, "I always preferred Naruto to this guy. At least Naruto was leaving us alone.."

Tsunade slumped over the railing around the balcony of the Hokage tower and said, "This is why I never wanted to be Hokage!" She sighed and stood up, looking out over the village. "There may still be a way to save some of us though..." Tsunade thought. "I'll have to move fast though."

With that, Tsunade darted around the village, grabbing Shikamaru, Kiba, Shino, and Choji before Sasuke's foot reached the village. Running out of time, Tsunade tossed several seals around the group and cast a barrier jutsu. Seconds after the jutsu was cast, Sasuke's foot pressed down on the village, grinding it into dust. Tsunade strained to keep the barrier whole. Luckily Sasuke already considered the village far beneath him and didn't waste much time crushing it. With his growth increasing, he ran down the skin between Naruto's toes, ready to overcome him. Tsunade released the barrier and wiped her forehead looking at the destruction around them. It was cataclysmic. Absolutely nothing had survived. It tore Tsunade apart inside to see the village her loved ones had cared so much about destroyed. She felt guilt at seeing the bodies of those she had sworn to protect, obliterated until nothing was left. But now was not the time to be mourning. With Sasuke growing like Naruto, and already showing no care for the village, it was time to end this madness. She didn't know what was causing them to grow, but it would only take a few tests to find it out. She turned to the boys she had saved and said, "Alright men! We're going to find out what caused this sudden growth spurt in Naruto and Sasuke, and reverse it!"

Shikamaru groaned and said, "What a drag! How long is this going to take?"

"I don't know. Once I find out what caused them to grow, I'll be able to work on an antidote to bring them both down. But with my skill in medical ninjutsu it really shouldn't take more than a few hours."

"What did you need us for then?" Kiba asked.

Tsunade sighed and said, "If worse comes to worse, I might need someone to grow to their size and fight them down to apply the antidote. I therefore chose not only young ninja who no doubt would grow more and faster due to their developing bodies, but also those of you who have dealt with Naruto and were in the immediate are. Actually, I would've like Neji to be here, but he was out on a mission, so it couldn't be helped. Now let's get going!"

With that, the group got to work. As all this was going on, Sasuke was growing faster and faster. Within seconds he was jumping off of Naruto's toe and landing on the ground. He could tell that Naruto was still growing, but it was at a slower rate. Soon, Sasuke was half of Naruto's size, and then, the same size! He stopped walking behind Naruto and said, "Hey Naruto!"

Naruto looked back in shock as he saw Sasuke the same size as him! What the heck was going on?!?!?

"Sasuke! How did you get so big?"

"Who cares?" He said. "I'm going to be a lot bigger than you soon anyway."

"What?" Naruto started looking up in shock as Sasuke grew bigger and bigger. Naruto felt something bump into him and was shocked to see Sasuke's massive toes bumping into him. "No fair! Growing was my thing!"

Sasuke smirked and said, "You're just a loser. You could never use this power right!"

Naruto growled at hearing his now much larger rival taunt him. With a yell, he jumped onto Sasuke's foot and started charing!
1141211211221.title: Tsunade's Prepared, Sasuke's Taking Over

choices: Sasuke continues to grow
Naruto managed to survive
11412112112211.content:
Naruto was huge. That was a given. But Sasuke effectively dwarfed Naruto, making him more than huge. Forget villages between toes, forget entire mountain ranges flattened by a single toe, Sasuke gave new meaning to huge. He had grown so much so fast that Naruto, the massive Naruto was shorter than his toe nail. Naruto couldn't even see over top of the big toe of Sasuke. Naruto had tried to attack, but as the tiny villages had all learned, you can't hurt something that big. And as Sasuke kept growing, Naruto effectively seemd to be shrinking in comparison. Soon he was as tall as Sasuke's toe nail was thick.

This was bad for the world. Naruto could crush cities, mountains, lakes all in one foot step. In comparison Sasuke could crush countries underfoot. His big toe could take out many smaller countries in one go. His size was too much for the earth, as his feet had effectively heated up the planet's temperature. His head was no longer in the atmosphere, and yet that didn't worry him. Somehow he was surviving, and he'd adopted a zen attitude with his growth. What would be, would be.

Sasuke's feet continued to lengthen, and soon each monstrosity was slightly longer than the planet's length. Floating in space, Sasuke watched as the planet shrunk, pinned between his two soles, and it got smaller and smaller and smaller.
11412112112211.title: Sasuke continues to grow bigger than Naruto

Tsunade discovers what's making the two boys grow.
114121121122112.content:
As Sasuke continued growing more and more, Naruto wasn't about to fall without a fight. He wasn't about to sit down and let his rival get stronger than him. Naruto knew to stay on the ground was suicide, so he powered chakra to his feet and hands and clung to Sasuke's enormous toe. With as much speed as he could muster, he began his ascent up Sasuke's still growing big toe. Naruto finally managed to get to the top of the toe, where he stopped to rest. The first part of his plan had succeeded. At this point, he at least wouldn't be crushed by Sasuke. From his vantage point, he couldn't see what was happening to the earth as Sasuke's feet began to overcome it. Slowly, he brought his feet closer and closer together, as the earth shrank down to apple size, then ping pong ball size, then marble size, and then, nothing. When Sasuke lost sight of the planet, he instantly lost interest in it. By a miraculous stroke, the planet, though badly damaged, had still survived! It was lost among Sasuke's feet, but still there. How long it would last, was yet to be seen. Naruto, stuck on Sasuke's big toe, unknowingly had brought more survivors with him. Tsunade and her small crew of genin were still performing experiments on Naruto to try and find out what caused his growth, how to reverse it, and how they were even going to find a way to get him to take it. At his current size, they were barely able to use dead skin cells to test on. But Tsunade was determined. This had gone from a simple matter of protecting the village to a colossal matter of protecting the planet! She worked tirelessly, using all the skills she possessed as a Sanin, to discover this abnormality in Naruto. She had decided that it couldn't have been something that was created naturally in Naruto's body since Sasuke had also started growing. Therefore, it must've been something both boys were exposed to. The question was, what?

Naruto, having rested enough, looked out at the plain of flesh that lay out before him. He was so angry, angry that that jerk Sasuke had stolen his order away from him, his power. No matter what, he would grow bigger than Sasuke and crush him like the arrogant over proud bug he was!

Tsunade called all of the surviving genin together in the middle of the village ruins.

"I have good news and bad news, everyone." She said pausing for a moment to collect her thoughts. "It seems that there was some sort of chemical that altered Naruto and Sasuke to make them grow like this. There is a problem though. I managed to figure out how to replicate it but its going to take a while to create an antidote. I wanted to wait but it seems at this rate we'd be lucky if we could save the earth, one of us has to become as big or bigger than Sasuke. I trust all of you and after seeing what Sasuke had done I'm sure none of you will behave that way." She looked around and said what everyone else was already thinking "So who is it going to be?"

"I'll do it!" Kiba said almost too enthusiastically. "I want to grow and beat the crap out of that jerk Sasuke."

"I guess I could do it." Shikamaru stepped foward "I'm probably not as good a fighter as Kiba as I don't even know if my shadow jutsus would even work in space. Still I think you know I won't cause any trouble."

Tsunade sighed at the less than appealing situation at hand "Thats enough! I wish it could be me but I need to work on the antidote. With such little time I can only make enough for one person if they're going to be big enough to take care of those two. You'll have to be the one to do it.....

11412112112211221.content:
"You'll have to be the one to do it Kiba!" Tsunade said, nodding at Kiba.

"Alright! Woo hoo!" Kiba shouted excitedly. Shikamaru just shrugged and said, "It would've been a pain anyway."

Tsunade pulled out a rather large needle full of a green liquid. She pushed the plunger slightly, sending a small arc of fluid through the air, landing uselessly on Naruto's toe skin. Kiba eyed the needle nervously and said, "Where are you going to stick that thing?"

Tsunade indicated his neck and said, "The most effective place would be one of the arteries in your neck. It'll force the chemical through your bloodstream at a much quicker rate, giving you optimal growth in a short time."

Kiba pulled Akamaru out of his coat and said, "Sorry boy, but I can't take you with me. Stay with Shikamaru."

Akamaru whined but crawled over to Shikamaru, lying next to his feet. Kiba then turned to Tsunade who said, "Here's the plan. I've made this chemical more potent than Naruto's so you'll easily pass him up. I'm almost positive I've made it stronger than Sasuke's dose as well so you should at least catch up with him. All you have to do is subdue Sasuke and Naruto long enough for me to finish the antidote. Once the antidote is finished I'll inject Naruto first. When he shrinks small enough, we'll transfer to Sasuke and inject him as well. Finally, when Sasuke is small enough, we'll inject you. With any luck, we may still be able to find our way back to the earth and rebuild after this whole mess."

Tsunade said this, though without much hope. When this whole thing was over, they'd be lucky to be in the same part of the galaxy as they were. But she couldn't just stand back and watch as this devastation continued. 13.content:
It was one of those days in the Hidden Leaf Village. You know the ones I'm talking about. Nothing happening, nothing to do, just one big stretch of boring. It was days like this that brought about the easy missions. The missions that were really, when you got down to it, nothing but chores. One such team, the team of Shikamaru, Ino, and Choji, were performing one such menial task. They were up on the side of a building, the back side, away from the street, and were repainting it. Ino was the only one who at least had some focus on getting it done. Choji was alternately helping, and alternately eating. But Shikamaru was laying down, back to his teamates, listlessly brushing the same spot over and over again with a paintbrush clutched between his toes.

Ino glared at him as she noticed him slacking off. She tossed her paintbrush back into the pot, walked over to Shikamaru and grabbed him by his ear, dragging him to his feet.

"OW, hey! What are you doing?" He yelped.

"Come on Shikamaru! This isn't hard and the sooner we get done, the sooner we can go home!"

"Yeah, yeah, right. But why aren't you yelling at Choji? He's not exactly working hard."

"Don't look at me! She already yelled at me!"

Ino huffed and said, "Someone's got to take charge around here! Now get back to work!"

"Nag, nag, nag!" Shikamaru muttered under his breath. "Is is so much to ask for a little time off once in awhile? Man, why can't I ever do what I want?"

"Do what you want?" a voice asked.

Shikamaru jumped and opened his eyes. There was a woman leaning out a window, watching him.

"You want to do what you want?"

"Yeah, what's it to you lady?"

She smiled and said, "I think I have something that might help you."

She disappeared and shortly returned with a small bottle. Wrapped around its neck was a little sign that said 'Drink Me'. She handed it to Shikamaru. He stared at it and said, "You're kidding right? What is this going to do?"

The woman winked and said, "Try some and find out. It's an heirloom that's been passed down my family for generations. It has a strong imprint of chakra on it, so it should be of some help to you."

Shikamaur mumbled a thanks and picked his brush up, continuing with the work. He glanced back at the window, but the woman was gone. He shook it off and kept on painting.

Finally they were done. Shikamaru took his leave, letting Ino and Choji go to Asuma to report the completion of the work. He went back to his house, went up to his room, and laid on his bed. He pulled out the bottle and looked at it.

"I wonder if this stuff really can let me do what I want..." he wondered.

He uncorked the bottle and a small hissing sound was heard. Should he really trust some random woman and drink something like this?
13.title: Do What You Want?

choices: Nothing. He's big enough, lets get some rest

131.content:
Shikamaru turned the idea over in his head. If he just took a little of it he could see what would happen to him. If it was harmful, he probably wouldn't take enough to do much damage. If it was helpful, he could find out what it did and decide if he wants to increase the effects. It was a pretty good plan, so he tipped the little bottle up and took a swallow. He then set the bottle on a table and corked it again. It was a strange sensation. He could feel the liquid burning as it went down his throat. But it wasn't a harmful burn so he didn't think it was poison. He felt it pool in his stomach and slowly burn out. Then he felt a sudden rush of chakra through his body, pushing into all areas of his body. The feeling was incredible! He'd never had so much energy coursing through him! He felt it pushing, as though trying to escape his body. It was then, that Shikamaru noticed he was growing.

It started out slow. His perspective was suddenly rising and everything seemed to be lowering. He stood next to the door frame and watched as he grew even with the top, then passed it. He bent down for a second, trying to decide if he should try and get out of his room, then decided to wait it out. He stood back up and felt his head hit the ceiling. By this time he'd stopped growing.

"Whoah. Didn't see that coming." He muttered to himself.

The ceiling of his room was about ten feet high, and he was slightly bent over so that probably put him at about ten and a half feet tall. This wasn't anything like he had expected, and yet it seemed to work. No one could tell him what to do at this size...

Unless of course a group of people gained up on him or something...

He sat down on his bed and thought about this for a second. What should he do next?
131.title: Didn't See That Coming.

choices: Naruto had found it, thinking it was some kind of energy drink
Konohamaru had found it
1312.content:
Before Shikamaru could decide what to do, there came a frenzied knocking at his door. He grabbed the bottle and put it into his pocket before squeezing out of his room and running down the stairs. The stairs creaked alarmingly at every step making Shikamaru glad his dad wasn't home at the moment. He finally made it to the door and threw it open to get whoever was knocking to quit it. Ino stumbled into the house, nearly tripping as she had been pounding so hard and fast on the door. Shikamaru stepped back and closed the door behind her while she straightened up saying, "It's about time Shikamaru! Why are you wasting time around here when you should be with me and Choji preparing for our next...mission..."

She looked up and up at Shikamaru's face hovering somehwere near the ceiling. She pointed and shivered and said, "Wha-wha-wha-"

Shikamaru sighed and said, "Please for all our sakes dont faint! That would be so cliche!"

Ino lost all intimidation and shouted, "Faint?!?!? Are you nuts?!?!? Who do you think you're talking too?!?!? I'm not Sakura for goodness sake!"

Shikamaru covered his ears and said, "Alright, alright already, sheesh!"

Ino calmed down a little but continued to shout, "I want answers Shikamaru! How did you get so big? This isn't normal! Did Choji teach you this or something?"

Shikamaru sighed and said, "No, when we were painting that house a little while ago, a woman gave me this bottle and told me it would let me do whatever I wanted. So I drank some of it and this happened." He pulled the bottle out of his pocket and showed it to Ino.

She tried to grab it but he held it up out of her reach and said, "No way. This stuff is for me and me only thank you very much."

"Grrrr! Shikamaru you're so greedy!"

Ino tried to jump up and grab it, but it was always just out of her reach. Finally she got frustrated and said, "Fine! You can keep it all to yourself for all I care!"

Shikamaru lowered the bottle to put it back into his pocket, when Ino pounced and made a grab for the bottle. She managed to get a few of her fingers around it before Shikamaru jerked it free from her grasp. Unfortunately, it sailed out of his hand and right out the window. Both Shikamaru and Ino gasped and ran to the window. Shikamaru pulled the window open and Ino stuck her head out, looking all over for the bottle.

"There it is!" Ino yelled pointing at the street. Shikamaru looked and saw it rolling along, getting kicked around by people who didn't notice it. He ran to the door and was about to open it and run out when Ino slammed her hand on the door, pushing it back into place.

"Are you nuts?" She said. "You can't go out there like that! What'll people say?"

"I really don't care. I want my bottle back so people can't force me to do things I don't want to do anymore!"

He tried to open the door but Ino was fierce and held it in place with both hands, arms shaking with the strain.

"Okay, okay, I'll go get it and bring it right back here for you alright? Just don't cause a disturbance!"

Shikamaru let go of the door and said, "Fine, go ahead. But I wouldn't try and drink any for yourself. I've booby trapped the bottle. If anyone but me tried to open it, a bomb will off and destroy the bottle along with everything inside it."

Ino didn't know whether or not he was bluffing, but Shikamaru was smarter than he let on, so she decided not to risk it. She nodded and ran out to go after the bottle. Shikamaru walked back to the window and bent down to look out it, watching as Ino ran down the street, her eyes focused on the ground. She looked left and right for it, but couldn't see it! Little did she know, someone else had already picked it up.
1312.title: That Which is Easy to Get, is Easier to Lose

choices: It's Kiba's room
It's Rock Lee's room
13121.content:
As Shikamaru and Ino fought over who would go retrieve the bottle, Naruto came walking down the street and slipped on the bottle causing him to land flat on his face.

"Who the heck leaves an empty bottle in the middle of the street?!?" He yelled picking up the bottle, ready to toss it.

Just before he was going to throw it he heard something slosh inside of it. He brought it close to his ear and shook it. He definetly heard someting swishing around inside and said, "I wonder what this stuff is..."

Now Naruto wasn't nearly as careful as Shikamaru in these kinds of situations so he put the bottle in his pocket without even thinking about what it could be and ran home to taste it just as Ino ran out the door and started searching.

Once Naruto got back to his apartment he uncorked the bottle and smelled the liquid inside. It smelled fruity and Naruto was pretty thirsty, so he took a few good gulps of it, drinking over half the bottle. Mysteriously enough, the bottle didn't seem to run out of liquid at all. It was still as full as when Shikamaru first drank from it. Naruto corked the bottle again and said, "Man that stuff was good! Whoever dropped it was a real idiot, letting something that good go!"

Naruto put the bottle in his pocket and started walking to the door when he felt a burning sensation in the pit of his stomach. He groaned and held his belly, wondering what was causing this sudden pain. As though answering his question, chakra began to flow wildly through him, overloading him to the point that he nearly blacked out from the power. He managed to stay concious however and was left sitting on the floor, panting from the sudden surge of power.

"What the heck was that?!?" He thought to himself.

He got shakily to his feet and headed for the door again. As he reached it, he started growing. Naruto yelped as he saw the door seemingly shrink away from him. Within seconds his head hit the ceiling and he sat down hard, clutching his head only to have it hit the ceiling again. Naruto got to his feet, causing his head to burst through the ceiling and out the roof. People in the street screamed as Naruto's giant head suddenly burst through the roof, showering the street in debris and continued to panic as his shoulders and the rest of his torso appeared after him. Naruto stepped out of his apartment as soon as his knees were clear and stood in the street, being careful not to crush anything. He continued to grow until he was sixty feet tall, most buildings only up to his shins. He looked around and grinned.

"Hey, this is pretty great! I've never felt so good!"

He pulled out the bottle and said, "And it's all thanks to you, little bottle!"

Unfortunately for Naruto the bottle was a lot smaller and he was still as clumsy as he ever was. He squeezed the bottle a bit too hard, but it was made of tougher stuff than glass and didn't break. What it did do was shoot from out between his fingers and straight through a window into someone's room. Naruto didn't see which building it landed in but he definetly noticed it missing. He frantically began to search for it, wondering where it had landed.

Meanwhile, Ino had had no luck finding the bottle but noticed the streets seemed strangely deserted. Her eyes had been trained on the ground and she therefore hadn't seen Naruto explode out of his apartment. But looking up now, she saw him bending over, searching for something.

"Oh great! Naruto has it! I've got to go tell Shikamaru!"

She ran back to Shikamaru's room to tell him about this new trouble.

Little did she know, the trouble was only beginning.
13121.title: Pass it On, Pass it On Again

choices: Kiba grows! - Stay with Kiba
Kiba grows and Shika plots! - Jump to Shikamaru
131211.content:
Kiba sat in his room having just got back from training.

"Man, that was exhausting. I could really use som-" He was cut off as a bottle smashed through his window.

"What was that?!" He jumped back up against the wall. 'A bottle?'

"I am pretty thirsty..." Kiba picked up that bottle and began to drink. He continued gulping it down, determined to get to the bottom but it never came. By the time he finished drinking he had over twice as much as naruto had earlier.

"I feel kind of funny..."
131211.title: Kiba's thirsty!

The bottle is found by Rock Lee
1312112.content:
As Kiba gulped down a large amount of the mysterious bottle, Shikamaru was waiting for Ino to come back with the bottle. Finally, the door opened and Shikamaru said, "About time! Did you find it?"

Ino put her hands on her hips and said, "If you can't ask a little nicer, why should I bother telling you anything?"

Shikamaru sighed. Ino was such a pain! But he wanted his bottle back so he said, "Fine. Can you please tell me if you found it?"

Ino nodded and said, "That's better! And no I didn't find it. Naruto did."

"What?!?" Shikamaru shouted. "How did he get it?"

"Well, when we were fighting, he must've found it and took it home, because he's like sixty feet tall now."

Shikamaru groaned and said, "So that's why everyone was running. Well, since the village is probably evacuating, no one should notice if I go out."

"What are you going to do?" Ino asked.

"I'm going to trick Naruto into giving me that bottle back." He said, opening the door.

Ino didn't like where this was going. With Shikamaru and Naruto fighting over a bottle that could turn them both into rampaging giants she didn't know how safe it was to stay in the village. She walked outside with Shikamaru and was nearly knocked on her butt as the ground started to shake. Shikamaru looked up and saw Naruto, but he was holding still and looking towards an apartment a few streets over. Shikamaru couldn't see the building from his vantage point, but it didn't matter as the whole building was suddenly torn down as a massive Kiba grew out of it. Kiba grew up and up until his foot was the only thing left standing where the apartment used to be, making Shikamaru and Ino smaller than his toes and Naruto only slightly taller than them. Ino turned and ran as fast as she could.

"Where are you going?" Shikamaru called after her.

"I'm getting out of here! This place is way too dangerous for me!"

And with that, she was gone. Shikamaru sighed and said, "Man, what a drag this is turning out to be!"

He ran over to the giant Naruto and jumped on his foot.

"Hey! Look down already!"

Naruto tore his eyes from the collosal Kiba and looked down at Shikamaru.

"Hey Shikamaru. What are you doing down there?"

"I'm coming to get my bottle back, but I can see you already lost it again!"

"Oooh, that was yours huh? Isn't great? Look how big it made me!"

Shikamaru sighed and said, "Yeah, I know what it does, but I want it back!"

"No way! I'm going to get it for myself!"

"I think you two are forgetting about someone!"

Shikamaru and Naruto both turned and looked up as Kiba's huge foot crashed down in front of them. He grinned and said, "That bottle is mine now!"

"Then where is it?" Shikamaru said. "You're not holding it."

"Huh?" Kiba looked at his hand and saw it was true! He must've dropped it when he started growing! "Oh crap! I've got to find it!"

"No way you big idiot! That bottle's mine!" Naruto said, running towards where he thought it might be.

Shikamaru was unceremoniously tossed from Naruto's foot onto the ground. He stood up and said, "Well, no one's paying attention to me, but I'm going to find it first!"

And with that, they all started looking.

Kiba rapidly scanned the area for any signs of the bottle but no luck. He had an idea though. If he could find it he could simply swallow it! Although given it never runs out it probably can't be destroyed either but then again even if he didn't grow at least he would still be the biggest.

Kiba stopped looking and began to think to himself. 'Wait a minute...I am the biggest...by alot...man I'm so stupid!'

Naruto was looking everywhere for the bottle but he hadn't had any luck at all. He was on his knees searching a build he ripped the roof off of when he felt a huge pull tugging on his shirt. "What the..." Naruto turned around to see that kiba had picked him up by the neck of his shirt!

Kiba dropped Naruto, who fell onto his right foot and made a grab for the bottle in Shikamaru's hands. Luckily for Shikamaru, Kiba was holding him in a way that cast a shadow on the ground. At this point, he grabbed Naruto and held him in his left fist while his right held the bottle. But Shikamaru wasn't done growing. He grew bigger and bigger, watching Kiba and the rest of the village dwindle away. 1312112121.content:
Shikamaru sat down at the edge of the village, causing a minor earthquake in the process, and picked up Kiba. He brought him close to his face and said, "Go find Naruto and bring him to me. It'll be harder on you if you don't cooperate."

He set Kiba on the ground and Kiba, with much grumbling, went off after Naruto. Naruto hadn't got far. Seeing Shikamaru grow so huge that Naruto couldn't even see past his knees had freaked him out. He wasn't going to stick around and get captured and there was no way he'd be able to get the bottle back now. But Kiba grabbed him and said, "Oh no you don't! If I have to deal with this then so do you!"

"Aw, come on!" Naruto screamed, thrashing in Kiba's grasp.

Kiba tightened his hold on him and went back to Shikamaru. Shikamaru grabbed him and brought him back to his face and said, "Alright, I'm tired and I'm going to take a nap. But I don't trust either of you. As soon as I'm asleep, I know one of you are going to try and steal it from me. So I'm going to tie you up to ensure you don't escape."

He picked up some strings from his clothes that had ripped off of him in his growth and handed one to Kiba.

"Tie Naruto up." He ordered.

Kiba did so and as soon as he was done, Shikamaru grabbed him and tied him up. Sighing he laid back, dropped the two smaller giants onto his stomach, put his hands behind his head and fell asleep. Kiba and Naruto struggled for awhile, but to no avail. Naruto had almost rocked himself right into Shikamaru's belly button. THAT would've been a disaster.

Luckily for Naruto and Kiba, the power of the bottle was fickle indeed. The bigger you became, the quicker you eventually shrank! The only way to keep huge size was to constantly drink from the bottle, but neither of the ninja knew that, and it was a difficult rule to figure out. By the next day, Shikamaru would've shrunk to half his current size. And, being so lazy, Shikamaru could be out of it for awhile...

Bigger then the biggest thing on the planet that was the giant ninja? Oh yes, Kiba had every intention on being the biggest. In fact his laser like focus on getting the bottle back and growing again meant he didn't notice anything else that happened around him. Kiba opened the bottle and prepared to bring it to his lips once again.

13121121221.content:
In all of the chaos that had been started by one small bottle, most everyone with common sense had evacuated the village whether it was by taking refuge in the Hokage Mountain or simply leaving the village itself. However, there were a certain few that stayed behind and didn't evacuate. These were the people who decided to take advantage of the village's disarray to profit themselves. One such notable person was Konohamaru. He had watched, from the Academy grounds, Naruto expanded into the sky. Knowing something big was going on he managed to slip away while Iruka was gathering the other students to evacuate and made his way towards the giant Naruto. A few minutes later he had been thrown to the ground as Kiba erupted from an apartment building, totally dwarfing Naruto. More determined now to know what was going on, the ninja in training ran full tilt towards Naruto. By this time both Kiba and Naruto (and Shikamaru, though Konohamaru didn't know it) were searching out the bottle. By the time Kiba had grabbed both Naruto and Shikamaru, Konohamaru was only a few steps away. Of course, no one took notice of him and he didn't even have to worry about trying to disguise himself. He had been about to approach Naruto and find out what was going on when he saw Shikamaru drinking from something. When Shikamaru jumped down to Kiba's foot Konohamaru saw that Shikamaru had a bottle in his hand. It didn't take a genius to be able to put two and two together especially when Shikamaru started growing. Konohamaru quickly ran from the expanding feet, nearly tripping and getting overtaken by the lazy ninja's growing body, but successfully escaping death by hiding between Shikamaru's toes. He caught his breath as he tried to figure out what to do next. It would extremely difficult to even think of taking the bottle from Shikamaru at this point. The genius ninja was more like a living mountain to Konohamaru.

In a stroke of good luck Shikamaru stepped outside the village and sat down, near to where Konohamaru was (which was next to the gate). Konohamaru was about to go after Shikamaru when he saw Kiba dash past him over the gate. Konohamaru knew a shortcut out of the village and quickly took that ending up next to one of Shikamaru's hands. He watched as Kiba stole the bottle and ran into the forest. Konohamaru wasted no time and followed after him. He caught up with the dog ninja when he was opening the bottle. If Kiba drank the contents it would be over for him! He'd no doubt get even bigger than Shikamaru making his attempts totally futile! Thinking fast Konohamaru pulled out several smoke bombs and did the only thing he could think of doing: he launched them directly into Kiba's eyes. The smoke bombs exploded with full force blinding Kiba. The smoke was then inhaled into his super sensitive nose blocking out all of Kiba's senses except for abject misery. The bottle came crashing down from his hand, landing a few feet in front of Konohamaru knocking him to the ground. This was his chance! The bottle was bigger than he was but he wasn't going to let that stop him! When he drank from that bottle he'd be recognized as more than just the Third Hokage's grandson! Something much, much, more!

He climbed up the bottle and looked into it. It was filled with a mysterious liquid that he had never seen before but he wasn't about to let that stop him. He knew exactly what it would do when he drank it. Leaning over he stuck his face into the liquid and started inhaling, gulping down mouthful after mouthful. Kiba, his eyes finally clear and his nose no longer howling with pain, looked blearily down and saw the Academy student drinking the bottle! He reached down and flicked the boy off the bottle , sending him flying into a clearing. He brought the bottle to his lips again and was about to drink when
13121121221.title: Young and Ambitious

13511.content:
Since the pineapple headed young genius had poured the majority of the bottle into the kettle, very little of the original water remained. Shikamaru not wanting to be found out quickly exited the blondes apartment in much the same way he had entered, it a few hours passed the sun slowly sunk towards the earth and a few moments later the blonde kitsune returned from a day of vigorous training. His goal of growing stronger then sasuke driving him forward, he stumbled into his small ratty apartment kicking the door closed behind him. His orange jumpsuit was stained through in several areas with his sweat, clearly he had come home just relax after a hard day, he walked into the kitchen. He dug into pantry and pulled out a container of cup ramen, and turned his stove on to heat the kettle. He placed the container of ramen on the stove and walked out of the room to relieve himself and switch into his normal nightwear. He heard the hiss of the kettle just a few moments after dressing, he figured he would catch a shower in the morning and go back to his routine of training if his squad did not get selected for a mission. He walked casually into the kitchen unaware that this was about to his change his and many lives forever.

He casually pulled the top off the cup ramen and carefully poured the kettle water into the cup (all of it, naruto gets the jumbo sized cup ramens due to him having to buy so much of it to sate him.) he then took the slightly hot cup into his living room and sat down on his crumpled and damaged sofa, all his furniture the little that he had were in poor repair due to him being given extremely used ones instead of buying new ones. He quickly began to scarf down the jumbo cup of ramen, not even bothering with any silverware or utensils. A moments later he had finished the cup and set it on his coffee table which was littered with similar objects already. He felt a familiar warmth settle in his stomach as the noodles began to digest, but then suddenly he felt his stomach lurch forward. He fell off the sofa and landed roughly on the floor of his apartment , he let out a slight curse at the pain and just clutched at his stomach which was rumbling quite loudly. “A-Ah, what Is going on was that poisoned?” He muttered as the pain in his gut just intensified if he was in less pain then he would realize that his night outfit which had always been a little snug was just beginning to tear apart at the seams. He was therefore stuck in his room for the rest of the day. But he wasn't going to just stay put of course. If spending time with Naruto taught him anything it was that you don't always follow the rules. If you wanted to do something you just had to do it!

So he had waited patiently for everyone in the house to be gone and then had snuck out of his room. He was about to head outside and go find his friends when he ran by his granfather's room. Normally this room's door was coninually closed and locked but today it was open. Konohamaru couldn't resist looking inside. Unfortunately it was disappointingly normal. There was a bed, a closet, a bathroom, a desk covered with scrolls and a window with a curtain. Konohamaru sighed and walked over to the desk, shifting some scrolls over and looking for something interesting. His eye fell on a scroll that looked like it had come from the Akimichi's. Konohamaru remembered that his grandfather was prized as knowing every jutsu in the Leaf Village and this one must've come from the Akimichi family. He noticed that some of the hand signs had been altered as was evident in the fresh ink. Konohamaru knew he'd never get another chance like this, so he performed the hand signs and waited to see what would happen. Konohamaru had improved his skills greatly and easily performed the jutsu.

Chakra flowed around him and he felt slightly worried that he had performed something dangerous. Luckily, the chakra all flowed into his body and he felt perfectly normal. Then he started to grow. He looked around him in surprise as everything started getting smaller. He stopped a few feet from the ceiling, at about ten feet tall. Poor Konohamaru's clothes, however, were not designed to hold when such a drastic transformation occured and were now much to small for him. His shorts had shredded leaving him in his briefs while his shirt had torn down the back. His goggles and ripped off as well as his scarf. He felt exposed and surprised and didn't know what to do.

Thinking fast, he tried to get out of the room. Unfortunately, the door was much too small and the doorframe itself was ripped out of the wall. That was a problem that would have to be solved later. Konohamaru tried to release the jutsu, but it wouldn't work. Whatever his grandfather had done to tamper with this jutsu, it wasn't releasing when he made the hand signs and his chakra wasn't being depleted. His arms were jammed painfully toward each other in front of him, while his feet disappeared down the staircase. Konohamaru continued to grow larger and larger until his head burst through the ceiling and entered the attic. He sneezed explosively at all the dust in the room. The wind he caused blew throughout the room, stirring up more dust and knocking things over. As more dust flew up his nose he sneezed again and again. The last sneeze had enough force to blow open the window up there. Fortunately, all anyone in the street saw was a cloud of dust coming from the attic window. They assumed someone was cleaning up there and went about their business.

A huge groaning erupted all around Konohamaru as he felt the walls bowing away from him and floor sagging under his weight. His feet had made it down the stairs and were pushing towards the doors, his legs taking their place on the stairs. If he didn't stop growing soon everyone in the village would be greeted with the sight of a pair of giant feet bursting from the Hokage's mansion. This thought was quickly interupted by an enormous crack that came from the walls on either side of him. By this time, his head was pressing into the ceiling and that was beginning to splinter. Hearing this crack, Konohamaru tried to bend down and see what was happening, but he couldn't see through the hole that his shoulders had created. Konohamaru tried to move his arms and to his delight, he found he could! The splintering must've been from the walls giving way. Before he could celebrate, however, the floor gave way beneath him.

The people around the mansion definetly heard that and all looked toward the mansion, wondering what was going on. The Anbu Black Ops would normally respond to such a disturbance, but they were all off on other duties in and around the village. It was troubling times and guards were needed everywhere and not just around the Hokage's mansion. This was lucky for Konohamaru who wasn't hurt, but was getting annoyed. Okay, just a few rules here. Nothing too bad, I can assure you.

1. No girls. I'm not saying they can't be there, just not as giants.

2. No toilet stuff please.

3. No hard vore. It's gross to me.

4. Keep the sex, if any, to a minimum. Unless a storyline specifically makes them older, they are just kids.

5. No limits. I don't care how big they are, as long as there is still interaction.

EDIT: 1/30/11--NEW RULES

6. For the love of all that is good people, STOP with the excessive choice chapters! There should only be choice chapters dealing with characters at the beginning of the story not in the middle of a storyline. If you want to introduce new characters than write a chapter introducing them. Any further choice chapters that are merely a few sentences long that appear in the middle of a storyline will be deleted NO QUESTIONS ASKED.

7. PLEASE use proper spelling and grammar when writing chapters! I'm not a grammar nazi, but I do like to have a certain level of quality in my stories. Please proofread your chapters before adding them. It doesn't take long.

8. All chapters, beyond BEGINNING choice chapters, MUST be at least 5 decent sentences long.

That's it! Add on if you read, and let's have some fun!
